Summary: This is such an adorable diamond in the rough. We stayed here 9 months ago and had to come back again! Perfect location, fantastic staff, clean and safe! What more could you ask for?! No fills but when you are coming to spend your days at disney, you just need a quick place to lay your head at night. We will be back again!
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer, thank you for rating our services and reviewing your stay at Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites. Our staff contributes their best efforts to ensure our guests receive a premium hotel experience enriched by clean and pleasant conditions at modest rates. We're delighted to have done that for you suitably on both of your visits. The convenience of our location is a matter of pride for us, and your appreciation makes us overjoyed. We generously offer our hospitality and care to all our dear guests, so you can be assured that we will serve you relentlessly for your comfort. Let us know when you're revisiting the Disney parks so we can arrange excellent accommodation for you again! Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Discovery Inn provides a convenient place from which to access to Disneyland Resort and Downtown Disney.  After a full day, the beds are delightful and the grounds are quiet and clean.  I’ve watched this property improve over the past several years; the owner and staff is responsive to customer needs.
Manager Response: Dear Richard, Many thanks for the stellar review. We are ecstatic to hear that your experience was excellent. It feels great to know that our accommodation impressed you, and we hope everything was in order and you had easy access to your essentials. It was a pleasure to host you, and we look forward to having you back many more times in the future.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Great stay for a quick Disney trip.
Summary: This was our second time staying here. The place is clean, staff is friendly. Great little stay for a quick Disney trip. Walking distance to the park. We are pass holders and will plan on staying here for our future trips.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for rating our services and reviewing your stay at Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites. Our friendly staff team contributes their best efforts to ensure our guests receive a premium hotel experience enriched by clean and pleasant conditions at modest rates. We're delighted to have done that for you suitably. The convenience of our location near Disneyland is a matter of pride for us, and your appreciation makes us overjoyed. We generously offer our hospitality and care to all our dear guests, so you can be assured that we will serve you relentlessly for your comfort. Let us know when you're revisiting Anaheim so we can arrange excellent accommodation for you again! Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Close to Disneyland and Convention Center
Summary: Customer service was great. The room was unique, extra room with bunk beds for kids. Only bummer was the shower water wouldn’t get hot. Very convenient location if you are going to Disneyland or convention center.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, we are pleased that you thoroughly enjoyed your time at Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites. We appreciate you letting us know how satisfied you were with our rooms and customer service. It is lovely to learn that our convenient location satisfied you immensely and made your stay a fantastic experience. We apologize for the shower facility not working at the hotel, as there was a fault that we have since then fixed. We are an establishment that understands our guests' expectations when staying at a hotel and aspires to provide an experience beyond that. We look forward to hosting you again for an even more fulfilling experience! Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Great customer service! Cool interior design of each room, easy booking, the room was super clean. The location is amazing , not even a mile away from dosneyland/california adventure, i would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Tyson, thank you for rating us and reaching out to review your stay with us. Our hotel's mission is to provide great value to our guests during their stay, and we are incredibly happy to know that we successfully attained our targets. Our team is delighted that our customer service, room conditions, and location were suited to your satisfaction. Your promise to stay with us again greatly excites us. It was a pleasure to host you, and we look forward to having you back at Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites many more times. Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: This was our second stay here and everything was great. Employees were very helpful and friendly. Conveniently located within walking distance of the parks as well as reasonably priced. Will most likely be staying here again for my next Disney visit.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, it's our absolute pleasure to know you loved your stay with us at Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites. We strive to provide excellent value to our guests through our favorable location, friendly customer service, and modest prices. We are excited you found everything suited to your comfort, and we gladly expect you to join us for another incredible guest experience on your next visit to Anaheim. Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: The Anaheim Discovery Inn and Suites is clean and quiet with friendly, helpful staff. It's only a short walk to Downtown Disney (and easy, quick entry to Disneyland via the Monorail). Looking forward to my next stay!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for staying with us and taking the time to review your visit. We intend for our guests to experience bliss and peace and successfully meet their expectations at Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites. It was a pleasure to host you as our guest, and it makes us happier to hear your praise for our clean facilities, friendly services, and convenient location. We're delighted to know that you thoroughly enjoyed your stay with us, and we look forward to you revisiting us for a beautiful vacation. Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Truly enjoyed my stay here.  Quiet, great friendly service. Lots of stores nearby and walking distance to Disneyland. Comes with fridge microwave,  big TV and king bed.  Outside pool.  Very beautifully maintained landscaping
Manager Response: Dear Gary, we are happy to have hosted and served you well at Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites. Thank you for your kind words about our facilities and services, especially our well-maintained swimming pool. We are glad that you found your room clean and well equipped, with all amenities on deck. Our staff offers their best efforts to ensure that your guest experience is unparalleled in all aspects. It is delightful to read your feedback about how we offer a quaint and exciting stay at our beautiful location while still being a point of easy access to tourist attractions and convenience stores. Please book in advance for your next visit and let us know, for we shall be thrilled to accommodate you with all our facilities running at their best. Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Great location,  but needs a lot of improvement.
Summary: Need new mattresses.  Need to work on their cleanliness. Walls are extremely thin! Location is great for walking to Downtown Disney.  Price is great,  but think I would rather spend a bit more for a more comfortable bed and cleaner atmosphere.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for staying with us and sharing gracious feedback on your visit. While we acknowledge your appreciation for our great location and excellent prices, we understand that you were unimpressed with our rooms' cleanliness, the mattresses, and the thin walls. We are sorry for these shortcomings and disappointed that we could not provide a truly fulfilling experience for you at our place. We assure you that we will revisit your review and improve our facilities to reflect the quality of customer satisfaction we aim to attain. We hope you consider booking with us again next time you are in the area so that we can provide the relaxing stay you expect and deserve. Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Great spot to stay when visiting Disneyland
Summary: Clean rooms with fridge and microwave. They will allow you to drop off your car in the morning so you can enjoy Disneyland and come back later to check in. They do not charge for parking like other places.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: A great place to stay, easy check in and check out and close enough to walk to Disneyland
Summary: Great location, friendly staff. The rooms are clean and comfortable and the location is great! We were able to walk to Disneyland from the motel, which makes it very convenient. It is walking distance from everything you need.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Excellent service, free coffee, clean room, well kept walking distance to the parks, highly recommended, we got an early check in so we could park there and walk to the park around 12 noon, I want to say thank you to them for the east check in and check out.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: My go to hotel for Disneyland
Summary: Love this place! People are nice, quiet and clean! Perfect location for downtown Disney and Disneyland! I will stay here every time I make the trip! Hidden gem! Walking distance from the theme parks and restaurants! Never even drive my car once I check in!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff were so friendly and helpful to my sister and I. The man who helped us was very generous with his time and with giving us accomodations and directions. The place was very clean and convenient. One of the best stays I've had. Definitely recommend and I hope to return again soon!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great for the price. Clean and updated just a short walk to downtown Disney. We barely spend anytime in our rooms when we visit disneyland so this place was perfect. Don't expect any fancy accommodations but know you'll be first in line when the park gates open.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, we are thankful for giving our hotel a splendid rating for our services. We aim to deliver clean, cozy accommodations for our guests, along with a great hotel experience full of memorable instances and happy moments. It is a matter of pride for us that we succeeded in doing this for you at a reasonable price. We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites to serve you again with an exceptional guest experience tailor-made for our distinguished customers. Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Noisy and not so near to the theme parks.
Summary: Very thin walls so basically you will hear everything from your next door neighbors and literally felt like you're sharing the same room with strangers next door. Can be very noisy at times like after midnight from cars that are parked literally right in front of your door so can't sleep well at all. Staff was average as when asked for basic direction such as how to get to the theme park the answer was very vague answer. Walking to theme park was quite a walk, I would say with an average walking pace you will need half an hour having to go past the Disney's car parks, then past the whole of Disney downtown to get to the entrance of the theme parks, as the Inn is located at the back end of Disney California and not the front.
Manager Response: Dear Shelley, we are sorry to hear that you had such a disappointing experience during your stay. Thank you for letting us know about the issues that you experienced. We apologize for the noise disturbance from the neighboring rooms and the parking lot outside. We are extremely disappointed that we could not welcome and accommodate you comfortably, and we are determined to take serious action for the discrepancies in offering a clean and trouble-free guest experience. We have rarely heard complaints that our location was inconvenient for visiting the parks. However, we are sorry if our staff did not assist you properly when you asked for directions. We feel let down to know that you did not find our performance and services adequate. We wish to let you know that such an experience is not typical of what our beloved customers receive, so we will take your comments very seriously and do what's necessary to make our guest experience comfortable and stress-free. Once again, we express our deepest apologies for your experience. We hope to take all measures required to rectify the situation and have you back here as a contended guest! Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Fantastic , super clean and area was calm. Also walking distance to Disneyland which was perfect us with an 8 year old. If I was to go to Disney land so would definitely book here again for my stay. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, we are delighted that you had an excellent stay with us at the Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites. The proximity of our property to Disneyland and the clean, peaceful state of our premises make a stay at our hotel a desirable experience. It is pleasing that you enjoyed your visit to our pleasant location. Thank you so much for crafting a glowing review of your guest experience at our hotel. We are thrilled to get your recommendation and strongly hope you choose to stay here again on your next journey. Kindly let us know when you're passing through Anaheim so we can set up things even bigger and better. Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Great little hotel close to the parks
Summary: Very nice stay. Room was comfortable, only thing missing was coffee/tea machine but you could get free coffee in the mornings at reception. No breakfast facilities but next door to a Denny’s where you get 15% discount.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: pleasant, a quiet and pleasant place
Summary: I have always liked staying in that same place when I visit California, the staff is attentive and very professional in cleaning, 100% recommended I have liked staying  clean rooms and the service they provide is very good, thank you very much
Manager Response: Dear Guest, we are delighted to know that you had an excellent stay with us. Our guest experience is designed so that all aspects of your visit are managed well for outstanding performance, including our clean accommodations and attentive customer service. We generously offer our hospitality and care to all our guests, and your review assures us that we have served you to the best of our efforts for your comfort and satisfaction. Let us know the next time you're coming to town so we can deliver an incredible Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites guest experience! Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: I was able to check in late, after Disneyland closed, and the receptionist was very nice. The place was clean, with shampoo and soap.. and a good heater. I appreciated the blow dryer and cups for water!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Manager was very nice each time I spoke with him. Coffee offered in the morning. Just needed a place to sleep after Disney trip and this was perfect. About 15min walk total to theme parks. Dennys around the corner and a nice pizza / Italian restaurant close by as well. Liquor store inbetween.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, it's our absolute pleasure to know you loved your stay with us at Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites. We strive to provide excellent value to our guests through our incredibly convenient location and top-notch customer service. We are excited you found everything suited to your comfort, and we gladly expect you to join us for another incredible guest experience on your next visit to Anaheim. Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: My husband and I took a day out of our honeymoon to visit Disneyland and we decided that we wanted a hotel close by and didn't need anything extravagant. This hotel was perfect for that. The price was right and it was very clean. I have zero complaints about the anything. We were able to walk to the park and save on parking which was a bonus.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, we are delighted to know that you had an excellent stay with us. Our guest experience is designed so that all aspects of your visit are managed well for outstanding performance. We generously offer our hospitality and care to all our guests, and your review assures us that we have served you to the best of our efforts for your comfort and satisfaction. It is pleasing to learn that you felt our prices were perfect and matched the quality of our facilities and services. Let us know the next time you're coming to town so we can deliver an incredible Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites guest experience! Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Clean and easy walk to Disney
Summary: Very nice friendly staff! Incredibly close to Disneyland. Fast easy walk to downtown Disney. Clean and nice rooms. Two bedrooms, which was a pleasant surprise. Wonderful place for a fair price, especially with the distance to the parks.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We spent 2 nights here during our visit to Disney. Location was great, about a 15-20 min walk to Disney. Room was clean and staff were friendly. Our only complaint would be that the shower took a fair while to heat up but once it was hot it was fine. For somewhere to shower & sleep after busy days at Disney it was more than adequate.  For the price & location I'd definitely consider staying here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Very well located and very good value for money.
Summary: Very well located, very attentive and friendly staff, very good value for money. On the negative side, just to say that we had a problem with the light and they came to solve it quickly and the floor that was newly renovated and painted the socks in black
Manager Response: none

Summary: I highly recommend this hotel for anyone wanting to walk to the Anaheim Convention Center. I attended the National Council of Teachers of English (NCTE) conference and after paying $300 for conference registration I didn’t have much money left to pay for a room. This hotel cost me $114.21 total taxes included.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Anaheim Discovery Inn and Suites is a hidden gem within walking distance of Disneyland Park.  Parking is free, rooms are clean, they actually clean the rooms everyday, and the staff is very kind.  I have stayed in more than a dozen hotels around the perimeter of the park and this one ranks as one of my top favorite.  The only downside is that they don't have a washer and dryer on site for guests to use.  That is the only thing that will stop me from staying here again because I usually stay 1-2 weeks at a time (I really need laundry access).
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is a great place to stay for a Disneyland vacation. Close to everything. The parks are close enough that you can walk to. The room was clean, modern, recently renovated, and everything worked. The beds were comfortable (but of course a rock would do after a full day of walking). Shower/tub was clean with no drips or leaks. The only complaint would be they only provided two hand towels, and no wash cloths. They offer a discount to Dennys, which is just around the corner. Other places to eat and buy essentials are all within walking distance. The staff were all super friendly , professional, and offered assistance with anything we needed. This is really a great place to stay! Would recommend for families, or anyone wanting to visit Southern California attractions.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The property was an easy walk to Downtown Disney and the parks. Rooms were clean and comfortable. I liked the fact that the room had tile floors throughout. I would highly recommend this property and will definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great spot if you need somewhere cheap and close walking distance to Disneyland. If you’re looking for fancy go stay at the Grand Californian and waste thousands. If you’re fine with no frills and just want a safe, clean place to stay. You’ll enjoy Anaheim Discovery Inn. Staff are friendly and helpful. Bed was comfy. No complaints. I knew what I was paying for.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel was good but we did not have hot water coming out of the shower. It was just like warm and it was too late when we got back to let the front desk know about the issue. The sink did have hot water
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Awesome location and well appointed room
Summary: This tidy motel style accommodation was amazing! The rooms are well appointed and very clean! Staff was friendly and helpful.  The location made our 2 days at Disneyland easy to walk to and it is close to restaurants to grab breakfast or dinner.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My husband and I stayed at this property and were pleasantly surprised to find such an affordable and well mentioned hotel walking distance to Disney properties and the convention center. The staff was incredibly helpful and friendly and we would definitely come back for future trips!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for
Summary: Serves the purpose for a hotel near parks convenient walking distance.  The hotel itself was rough cockroaches, temperamental shower temperatures ect.. staff addressed the roaches coming out with hand jerks bug spray  to spray but still roaches and not being able to take a decent shower for a few days made the stay a bit difficult.  Keep in mind there are no amenities either as fast as complimentary breakfast or fitness center, not that those things are deal breakers but for similar prices you can upgrade to near by hotels with a little more comfort.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, we are saddened and shocked to hear that you could not have a peaceful stay at our hotel. While we are relieved that our location was convenient for you, it is disappointing that we could not serve you in a fulfilling manner. We have discussed with the hotel management about taking severe action regarding the issues you mentioned. We are sorry that the room conditions were unsuitable for a satisfactory visit. We apologize for everything that derailed your guest experience. We have informed the administration to review your feedback and assess these matters carefully, as we must do what's necessary to resolve them without further delay. We want you to know that we will not shy away from improving our facilities and services. Please let us know if we can do anything more to make amends. We look forward to hearing more from you and learning how we can make this right. Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: There was a very strong smell of cleaner when we checked in, but it faded quickly.  Beds were quite comfortable and it was quiet, though Disney was very busy.  Anaheim Discovery is a good value, overall.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for the lovely review of your stay at Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites. Our check-in staff finds it pleasing to make our guests comfortable from the get-go, so we are delighted but not surprised to hear the beautiful praises of our cozy accommodation facilities. Our main objective is to provide a clean, quiet stay for our guests, and I'm glad we succeeded in doing this for you. We are sorry for the strong smell of the cleaning agent at the time of your check-in. We love to listen to your appreciation for the value we deliver, so thank you for sharing your honest feedback. We look forward to hosting you again and serving another ultimate guest experience! Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: I used to come here when I was little and 12 years later it’s still amazing and even better really close to the park! It’s cheap but nice I’m a picky person and the bed and the room were clean everything was good
Manager Response: none

Summary: Overall a good hotel, very clean and the staff and lovely and very helpful, perfect location to get to Disney, nice shower and comfortable bed with very good air condition, the only down side is it could do with blackout curtains or blinds as it was very bright in the room from the lights outside and needs spare pillows and blankets and a coffee machine or a kettle
Manager Response: none

Summary: A small and respecful location right by the Disneyland park. Fernando at the check-in counter is super nice and was very helpful with tips and suggestions for getting around to where we needed and wanted to go to. The room is a comfortable size with a large tv, a larger refrigerator than other hotels we've been at in the area. And for those looking, they do have a pool area as well.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Quick weekend trip to Disneyland. The room was clean and comfortable. It was a 15 minute or so walk to the park. The room had plenty of room a fridge and microwave. I would go back again. The check in was quick and easy as well as the checkout.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, we are deeply thankful to you for honestly rating our hotel and facilities. We take it upon ourselves to provide you with an exceptional experience created by excellent conditions, exclusive amenities, and enthusiastic staff behavior at affordable prices. We are thrilled to learn that our property impressed you, as our team takes pride in the comfort and convenience our location guarantees. We look forward to your next visit to serve you again with an original Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites guest experience. Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Great location, walking distance to Disney or the Convention Center. Very friendly staff and amazing prices you can't beat, highly recommend this location. I think we will be using this place again in the future.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights, it was a great price and great location. Only a 13 minute walk for us to downtown Disney. Check in was super quick and customer service was great. If you are looking for somewhere inexpensive to stay I would recommend this place.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff was very friendly the room was nice and tidy with complementary toiletries and the location was perfect to get a little breakfast before walking to Disney. It was only a 12 minute walk from the park and the room was a great price
Manager Response: Dear Guest, many thanks for your glowing review of our hotel. At Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites, our friendly team takes great pleasure in making our guests comfortable from the get-go. We are excited to hear your beautiful praises of our convenient location, hospitality, and overall comfort. Our rooms' clean and comfy conditions make a stay at our hotel a desirable experience, and we could not have been happier to serve you to the best of our efforts. Our mission is to deliver immense value to each guest, and it sounds like you had a fantastic experience with us. We are thrilled to host you at our humble establishment and would love to serve you on every trip you take to Anaheim! Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Not the first time here, clean, and organized, parking can be tight during busy weeks, great service as always. As expected for a budget trip, but we were in the Disney park 99% of the time so just needed clean sheets, clean towels, etc, nothing fancy, great place for that.
Manager Response: Dear Luciano, thank you for your kind words, as we are also pleased that you had a lovely stay with us yet again. We are delighted to hear that our facilities and services could provide you with an excellent guest experience at our hotel. We strive to achieve maximum guest satisfaction at Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites, and your compliments greatly delight us. We generously offer our hospitality and care to all our guests, so you can always be assured that we will serve you the best of our efforts. Do not hesitate to let us know about any improvements we could bring to our establishment. It was a joyous opportunity to host you during this recent stay, and we would be more than happy if you chose us for your next vacation! Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Good place to stay when going to Disneyland parks
Summary: Enjoyed our stay with a quick walk to the park and nice to have microwave and mini fridge in room.  Room was clean. Stores close to location to pick up food and liquor and restaurants also very close that were reasonably priced.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you so much for reviewing your stay at Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites. We are aware that our convenient location provides our guests with the chance to explore tourist attractions and easily access nearby stores and dining outlets. We are glad to learn that this worked out perfectly for you, allowing you to truly enjoy what Anaheim offers, along with a clean and comfy stay. We were delighted to host you and would be more than happy to serve you again on your next trip! Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Great service and communication from the staff. Very friendly and clean establishment. Right next to everything you need & of course DISNEY LAND ! Definitely would recommend couples staying here. Very cosy!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you very much for letting us know that you had a great stay at Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites. We're glad our clean accommodations, excellent customer service, and lovely location worked out so well for you. Providing excellent facilities and pleasant services is what we're all about, so it is exciting to know that you had a fantastic time at our place. It was a pleasure to host you, and we look forward to having you back here to spend some more wonderful holiday time. Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: The staff were friendly and helpful throughout our stay. Upgraded our room because we were early. Clean and quiet despite the closeness to the main roads. Better than the more expensive hotels in the area that are further from the park and more frequented by people.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, we are pleased that you thoroughly enjoyed your time at Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites. We appreciate you letting us know how satisfied you were with our well-maintained rooms, friendly guest service, and the value we deliver for our modest prices. The greatest joy of serving our guests is knowing that we provide a premium experience that makes them feel comfortable, peaceful, and contended without worrying about any matters of their stay. Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share your honest review. We look forward to hosting you for another ultimate guest experience on your next visit to Anaheim. Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Clean no frills room. Refrigerator and microwave but no coffee maker. Free Wi-Fi lots of TV channels. Walking distance to Downtown Disney but a long walk to the park. Area seems to have been cleaned up since last visit, felt safe walking the streets. Staff not very friendly. Cocos and Dennys close by.
Manager Response: Dear Richard, thank you for choosing to stay with us and for sharing your feedback. Our customers deserve clean and comfortable rooms at reasonable rates for their vacation, and our staff contributes their best efforts to ensure our guests' satisfaction. We are thrilled that you enjoyed most of our facilities, found our property convenient for our proximity to Downtown Disney, and felt our surroundings were safe and well-maintained. We are sorry to learn that our staff team was not friendly in their approach. Such improper customer service is not what we aim to deliver to our guests at Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites, and we shall resolve the case of their unwelcoming behavior. We hope that our remaining facilities and services were up to the mark. Do not hesitate to let us know about any improvements we could bring to our establishment, as we are excited to serve you again for a fun vacation soon enough. Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Nothing fancy, but good place to sleep.
Summary: This is our go to hotel for Disneyland. It’s about a 15 min to downtown Disney security. Rooms are clean, but sometimes the AC machine is very loud. Definitely a good deal & would stay here again. Thank you
Manager Response: Dear Kerrilynn, thank you for staying with us and sharing gracious feedback on your visit to Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites. While we acknowledge your appreciation for our great location and clean rooms, we are sorry to learn that loud noises from the air conditioning unit in your room were troubling your stay. We'll be fixing the noisy air conditioner in no time. We hope you consider booking with us again next time you are in the area so that we can provide the peaceful stay you expect and deserve. Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: The location was great, only a 20 minute walk through downtown Disney to the main gates of Disneyland. The staff was very friendly and accommodating! I definitely recommend this place and will be staying there again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, we are pleased to learn that you have given us a lovely review of your guest experience. Thank you for allowing us to make you feel welcome at our hotel and for taking the time to appreciate our excellent location and courteous guest service. The joy of knowing that our guests had a perfect holiday and that they would happily revisit and recommend us is incomparable. Let us know the next time you're in town so we can set up another riveting holiday for you at Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites! Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: We have stayed here 2 times now, for a week each time. We have been very impressed. Best bang for you buck. We swam in the pool almost every day. It was very pleasant! Everything was clean and the staff was friendly. We are super grateful for everyone who made our experience great!
Manager Response: Dear Dustin, we are delighted to know that you had an excellent stay with us. Our guest experience is designed so that all aspects of your visit are managed well for outstanding performance. We generously offer our hospitality and care to all our guests, and your review assures us that we have served you to the best of our efforts on both of your visits. Let us know the next time you're coming to town so that we can deliver an incredible Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites guest experience! Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Nice little spot, close to everything. Room was clean, small tv if that bothers you, cute little side room with a bunkbed for kids. I stayed for 4 nights, had zero issues- staff was very friendly. They have a pool, parking was easily accessible, I always found a spot.
Manager Response: Dear guest ,we are always pleased to receive feedback from our guests in relation to their stays with us, and we are delighted with your rating, thank you very much. We are happy to have satisfied you so well, and we hope to remain your hotel of choice here for future visits.

Summary: Cancelled our weeks old reservation literally 1 hour prior to our arrival in Anaheim via email (!!!). Did not answer my immediate mail response to the cancellation at all, had to call twice to talk to a grumpy fellow on the line. Thrown in reason for the cancellation: “credit card declined“ (the credit card I used just minutes ago and still use). Already in our car we did not have the chance to clarify the situation on site, because “the room is already sold to other guests”.  Never experienced something like that before. Annoying, disrespectful, out of this world behavior and absolutely time wasting. Be aware if you got plans.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, we are incredibly sorry that our team canceled your reservation just before your arrival. We apologize for the hardships we have caused due to the lack of clarity from our end regarding the availability of rooms on the date of your check-in and the credit card issue. There seems to have been some miscommunication that may have caused this unwarranted situation. We are immensely regretful for canceling your booking at the last minute. We hope that you could make other arrangements for your stay. We assure you that we will investigate this unfortunate episode and take all necessary steps to ensure that such incidents do not reoccur.  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: We arrived at the establishment on Thursday around 11am so there wasn't any rooms available yet. The gentleman that was at the desk was really nice and helped us get checked in and got us a room in less than two hours. He was very attentive and professional. The room was pretty spacious, clean, quiet and the AC worked amazingly! Overall, this place did its job, Disney park proximity was great, and the Dennys next door was an excellent breakfast choice. If you don't care about hotel amenities and just need a place to sleep in this place is the perfect option. Will definitely come back.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, we are happy to have hosted you and served you well at Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites. Our guest experience is designed so that all aspects of your stay exhibit excellent performance. Thank you for allowing us to make you feel welcome at our hotel and for sharing your compliments on our friendly staff services, spacious rooms, peaceful surroundings, and convenient location. It was a great pleasure to host you, and we would gladly welcome you again many more times in the future! Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Hotel is conveniently located near Disneyland and the Anaheim Convention center.     Rooms were nice, amenities like soap and shower gel were sparse, but the room itself was nice.  Front desk reception were very helpful and friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, we are pleased that you thoroughly enjoyed your time at Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites. We appreciate you letting us know how satisfied you were with our convenient location. It is lovely to learn that our lovely rooms and all of our amenities satisfied you immensely and made your stay a fantastic experience. Our team is delighted to know you had a great time at the hotel, with our front desk staff services proving to be suitable for you. We are an establishment that understands our guests' expectations when staying at a hotel, and we aspire to provide an experience beyond that. We look forward to hosting you again for an even more fulfilling experience! Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Since 2017 we always choose to stay at Discovery Inn since it's just a 15-minute walk to Downtown Disney, We don't have to worry about crowds. Our stay is always quiet. The housekeepers and front office are nice and sweet. Nitesh is a great manager. I'd rather stay here than at a Disney hotel.
Manager Response: Dear guest, thank you for taking the time to rate your recent stay at our hotel. We are thrilled that you had a great stay, and we hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: The pool needs re-surfacing and was dirty and the bed was hard and nothing but springs and when you sit on it, it made a horrible thundering noise. Other then that it was good. I liked to neighborhood, and it was a pretty easy walk to the monorail. The staff was super nice and the rooms were clean.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, we are excited that your experience at our hotel was satisfactory and comfortable. We aspire to deliver a desirable guest experience to each customer who visits our humble hotel for clean accommodations. We're glad that our pleasant customer service and convenient location were suitable for you. Thank you for informing us of your thoughts on the dirty pool conditions and damaged bed through your feedback. Our hotel administration has been notified, and our maintenance team will take care of them soon. Do not hesitate to inform us if any other aspects of your visit were unappealing. We hope to see you and serve you better at Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites on your next visit!  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: We stayed for 3 days 2 nights and we had a wonderful experience.  Our room was nice and very clean and spacious..  the staff were wonderful assisting us in all of our needs.  This is definitely my new Disney go to hotel when we go back to disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear guest, we are delighted to have provided you with suitable accommodation for your trip here. We appreciate your kind rating, and we hope to welcome you back again before long.

Summary: Excellent location within ten minutes walk to Disneyland.  Convention centre is also ten minutes walk.  Friendly staff  and  very clean modern rooms. Denny’s is very near and short walk to shops  and amenities.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, we are thankful for giving our hotel a splendid rating for our facilities and services. We aim to deliver clean, cozy accommodation for our guests, along with a great hotel experience full of memorable instances and happy moments. It is a matter of pride for us that we succeeded in doing this for you at our excellent location near Disneyland. We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites to serve you again with an exceptional guest experience tailor-made for our distinguished customers.  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Great price and easy walking access to Downtown Disney where security lines are shorter than at the main gate. Then you can take the monorail into Disneyland or walk to CA Adventure. Rooms are bare bones and older BUT do not smell musty at all! Comfortable bed and impressive DAILY room service. Haven’t had such great housekeeping service since pre Covid days. If you’re looking for a comfortable, affordable place to mostly just sleep while you’re at the parks, this is a great spot!  I would definitely come back!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, we are thrilled to see that your experience at our hotel was satisfactory and comfortable. We aspire to deliver a desirable guest experience to each customer who visits our humble hotel for peaceful and friendly accommodation. We're glad that our convenient location, comfy facilities, and modest pricing were impressive. Thank you very much for sharing your appreciation for daily housekeeping services and informing us about the condition of our rooms through your feedback. Do not hesitate to tell us if any aspects of your visit were unappealing. We hope to see you and serve you better at Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites on your next visit to Downtown Disney!  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Underrated gem right across Disney. Basic accommodations with 2 beds, small TVs, decent sized rooms & pool but PERFECT for my trip. Recently redone and very helpful people in office!!!! Thanks again!!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, we are overjoyed to read your review of your time at Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites. Your compliments make us feel unique about the quality of our services, which is exactly what we wish to achieve. We are dedicated to hosting you and arranging an exceptional guest experience. Summary: This is our second time staying here. Its a great place to stay if visiting Disneyland. It’s only a 15 min walk. The room was clean, had all the essentials, and ac worked great especially during the summer time heat. Check in and check out was easy. Definitely will be staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for sharing a lovely review about your stay at Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites. Our check-in staff finds it pleasing to make our guests comfortable from the get-go. We are delighted to hear the beautiful praises of our clean rooms, amenities, and convenient facilities. Our main objective is to provide a comfortable experience to our guests, and I'm glad that we succeeded in doing this for you, including a smooth check-in and check-out. It is lovely to know that our location was also perfect for you. We love to listen to your appreciation for our services and feel proud to hear your promise to let us host you again on your next trip. Thank you for sharing your honest feedback. Summary: This hotel is fantastic. Great price and incredible friendly staff. I stay here a few times a year for business as well as vacations and it never disappoints. I'll be back soon, and anytime I am in Anaheim I choose this property.
Manager Response: Dear guest ,we are always pleased to receive feedback from our guests in relation to their stays with us, and we are delighted with your rating, thank you very much. We are happy to have satisfied you so well, and we hope to remain your hotel of choice here for future visits.

Summary: The hotel is a basic motel type. It looks a little older than the pictures, and the small pool us right next to the road. But the room was fine, beds comfortable. The aircon was a little loud. What makes the hotel is the location. 10 minutes walking distance to the 2 Disney parks. You can see the fireworks from the window. The staff was amazingly friendly.  There's a Dennis nearby for basic food and a convenience store for snacks, toiletries,  etc. If you want to go into LA or Hollywood, Universal Studios,  etc an uber will set you back on average 80 dollars, depending on time of day. A trip to LAX can be up to 200, as you need to consider suitcases.   All in all we enjoyed the stay and the hotel
Manager Response: Dear Guest, we are pleased that you thoroughly enjoyed your time at Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites. We appreciate you letting us know how satisfied you were with our accommodation facilities and services. It is lovely to learn that our extremely convenient location satisfied you immensely and made your stay a fantastic experience. Our team is delighted to know you had a great time at the hotel, with our customer service proving to be excellent. We apologize for the noise from the air conditioner, as there was a fault that we have since then fixed. We are an establishment that understands our guests' expectations when staying at a hotel, and we aspire to provide an experience beyond that. We look forward to hosting you again for an even more fulfilling experience!  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Wonderful experience!  Niteshis and all the staff are kind and helpful. Rooms are spacious and clean, air conditioning is amazing and having a fridge and microwave is a plus! Parking spaces are very roomy so it's easy to park. My husband and I have been traveling allot and this is always our go to stay!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, we are happy to have hosted you and served you well at Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites. Thank you for your kind words about our spacious accommodation facilities and in-room amenities. We are glad that you found your room clean and comfortable. Our friendly staff team offers their best efforts to ensure that your guest experience is unparalleled in all aspects. It is delightful to read your feedback about how we provide an exciting and fulfilling stay with perfect parking spaces and cozy facilities at hand. We hope that no disturbances hindered your experience with us. It is lovely to hear you choose our hotel as your go-to place. Please book in advance for your next visit and let us know, for we shall be thrilled to accommodate you with all our services running at their best.  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Great short stay option for those on a budget
Summary: If you’re on a budget or going solo, like I was, this is a nice option. Room was clean. Staff was friendly. My room had a large screen TV, working fridge, microwave and I had no issues with the free wifi. No issues with the AC, which worked well. Good thing, too, since the temp during my stay hit the mid 90’s. I had no issues with parking, although I stayed there midweek, which might not have been as busy as on the weekend. Motel is within walking distance to Disneyland, Downtown Disney and the Convention Center.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for sharing a lovely review about your stay at Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites. Our check-in staff finds it pleasing to make our guests comfortable from the get-go, so we are not surprised to hear the beautiful praises of our friendly team. Our main objective is to provide a clean, comfortable room with all our facilities and amenities in excellent working condition. I'm glad we succeeded in doing this for you. It is lovely to know that our parking situation was well managed for your comfort. We love to listen to your appreciation for our convenient location and overall accommodation, so thank you for sharing your honest feedback. We look forward to hosting you again and delivering an ultimate guest experience!  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Very close to the parks (15-20 minutes walking). Room was clean, good shower pressure, and comfy beds. From our room we could see the fireworks. They have a pool, so that’s nice for entertaining kids before the park.
Manager Response: Dear Angie, thank you for sharing a lovely review about your stay at Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites. It was a joyous opportunity to host you during this recent stay, and we would be more than happy if you chose us for your next vacation!  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Wonderful hotel! Clean and very reasonable price! 15 minute walk to Downtown Disney and the park! Friendly staff and you can see the fireworks right outside your room! Will definitely stay here again!

We hope to see you and serve you better at Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites on your next visit!  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Great Value! Would stay here again!
Summary: Staff was friendly! Room was bigger than expected 😃 Great Value delivered for the price. Would stay here again! Free parking a great plus! Restroom needed a little more work! Location was great for walking to the park.
Manager Response: Dear guest ,we are always pleased to receive feedback from our guests in relation to their stays with us, and we are delighted with your rating, thank you very much. We are happy to have satisfied you so well, and we hope to remain your hotel of choice here for future visits.

Summary: Amazing stay extremely close to Disney! This is 5th time I’ve stayed here and I will only stay here going forward. Affordable stay And extremely clean rooms. Staff is very helpful and helped out with all our requests l.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for rating our services and reviewing your stay at Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites. Let us know when you're revisiting Anaheim so we can arrange excellent accommodation for you again!  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: The staff was great and it was a great location to the theme parks. Will stay again in the future. We were only there for a little but the time we did we enjoyed our stay. It was affordable and it was worth it.

Summary Heading: Don’t judge by the exterior…better inside
Summary: Don’t judge a book by its cover! The exterior of the buildings leave a lot to be desired, however, the interiors of the rooms are great…they’ve been recently remodeled: comfortable beds, clean floors, fridge and microwave. Location is fantastic for walking to the park through Downtown Disney. Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for the great review!  It is great to hear we were able to provide such a great value for the area. We believe in offering modern, clean and comfortable rooms in the area at a smart rate without sacrificing quality. Glad you agree! Looking forward to welcoming you back in the future for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: The room was very small. The bed was quite hard. But worst of all, my key stopped working and the lady didn't ask for ID before giving me a new one. That is a big security risk! I won't return for that reason alone.
Manager Response: Dear guest, We are disappointed if one of our guests leaves with less than first rate experience. Our aim is to provide a clean, comfortable and pleasant place to stay. We sincerely apologize that our hospitality and attention to details left something to be desired, this is very unlike us. Thank you for sharing your feedback. Please feel free to connect if there is anything we can do to help. We sincerely hope that you will give us another chance to restore your faith in our hotel and hospitality.

Summary Heading: Perfect location at an affordable rate
Summary: Short walk to Disney. Hotel offered affordable rates  while maintaining cleanliness. We have stayed there before and I am sure we will be back. Why spend a fortune on a hotel when you are at the park most of your day?
Manager Response: Dear guest, many thanks for your positive rating – we are delighted that you enjoyed your time at our property so much. We hope to host you again successfully in the near future.  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Room was nice, clean, quiet, spacious, just a 10 min walk from the hotel to Disneyland front gate! Checking in was super easy, front desk staff was very friendly and helpful. Parking is included with your stay which is also a plus!!
Manager Response: Dear guest, thank you so much for your stellar review! This means a lot to us. Hope you enjoyed your visit and we look forward to welcoming you back next time you visit the area. Safe travels! Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: The room was clean and accommodating. The bed was comfortable and there was enough extra room to comfortably fit a pack n play for the baby. The staff was friendly and helpful. It is within walking distance of  Disneyland and works well for a family trip.
Manager Response: Hi there, we are always pleased to receive feedback from our guests in relation to their stays with us, and we are delighted with your rating, thank you very much. We are happy to have satisfied you so well, and we hope to remain your hotel of choice here for future visits.

Summary: Excellent.  The staff went above and beyond.  I highly recommend. Rooms were clean.   Parking feee. Close to the convention center and downtown Disney 1 block away.  Free coffee.  Friendly staff.  Refrigerator and iron included.
Manager Response: Dear guest, thank you so much for your stellar review! This means a lot to us. Hope you enjoyed your visit and we look forward to welcoming you back next time you visit the area. Safe travels!

Summary: Comfortably of the beds was ok for short stay. However, room was stocked and very clean. Kishan and all other staff were very friendly, informative and accommodating. There was no coffee pot in the room, but there was coffee served fresh in the lobby each morning.
Manager Response: Hi there, many thanks for your positive rating – we are delighted that you enjoyed your time at our property so much. We hope to host you again successfully in the near future.

Summary: Great place to stay. Rooms were clean bed was not bed. Pillows were horrible for myself and husband. Walk was about 10 mins to Disneyland parks and we’re nice enough to hang on to our bags before our checkin time.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for sharing a lovely review about your stay at Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites. We're glad that our clean and comfortable accommodations made your stay pleasant and that you especially appreciated the convenience of our location to get to Disneyland. We apologize for the state of the pillows in your room. We shall have our housekeeping team look into it and replace them if necessary. Detailed reviews with appreciation and criticism help us understand our strong and weak points and thereby develop the quality of our guest experience. Thank you for taking the time to share feedback, and we surely hope to have you back here on your next trip to Anaheim!  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at discovery inn. This has been our hotel for the past 6 years. We like the walking distance to Disneyland and local stores. Guest services was nice enough to upgrade our room last minute. The pool area was nice and clean. This hotel will continue to be our #1 .
Manager Response: Dear Guest, we are thankful to you for your glowing review of our humble hotel. The greatest joy of serving our recurring guests is knowing that we are able to make them feel comfortable, peaceful, and content without worrying about any matters during each stay. We take it upon ourselves to provide you with an exceptional guest experience created by excellent room conditions and exclusive customer services. Hearing your appreciation for our convenient location and pool facility makes our day at Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites. Our mission is to deliver great value to each guest, and it sounds like you have had fantastic guest experiences with us. Reviews in which our guests recommend our place and acknowledge the delight of staying with us are our most valued assets. You had the experience we strive to provide for each of our guests, and we hope to welcome you back many more times in the future.  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: This place isn't fancy but it has a convenient location for Disney and the Convention Center. It is nice to park right next to your room and not pay extra for that. There are restaurants and convenience stores within one block. The hotel is quiet, safe and clean. Room had pretty much what you need. Internet was decent. Water pressure was a bit week but that is California. I would have no problem staying here again. Sometimes you don't need the amenities of a nicer place.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you so much for positively rating and reviewing your stay at Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites. We are aware that our location nearby Disneyland and the Convention Center provides our guests with the chance to explore these attractions as well as quickly access nearby stores and restaurants. It is delightful to learn that our hotel's cleanliness, quiet ambience, safety, amenities and especially our parking facility worked perfectly for you, allowing you to truly enjoy a comfortable guest experience. We are thankful to you for including your appreciation for our location and its conveniences in your review. That information will be helpful for travellers who may be considering a stay with us. We also hope that you will consider staying here on the next journey that brings you to Anaheim. Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: The beds were rocks, the walls were very thin, the water from the tap tasted terrible, and it was very overpriced. I picked it because it is close to the convention center, which is its only positive trait.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, we are sorry to hear that you had an uncomfortable time at our hotel. We want to reassure you that your experience is not typical of what our guests receive, and we are taking your comments very seriously. We have informed our management team to look into the matters mentioned in your feedback about the quality of comfort, lack of quietness and the unpleasant tap water. We are disappointed to know that you felt our facilities and services to be overpriced. While it is a consolation that our proximity to the convention centre was a satisfying factor, we feel disheartened to have let you down. We will review your comments in detail and make changes wherever possible in improving and training our staff to ensure a better stay for our future guests. We'll be sure to make up for your troubles next time and give you a rewarding experience at our hotel, as we hope to provide you with the value you deserve.  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Great hotel stay in a convenient location. Fantastic option.
Summary: What a great deal in a fantastic location. Clean and friendly. Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites at the Park makes it so easy to book a room and get to Disneyland or Disney's California Adventure FAST!  Our room was spacious and quite. The bed was comfy which helped us get a good night's rest for the long day at Disneyland.   The main bedroom does it get a little warm if you close the bedroom door, be prepared to have the AC on low.   We are already planning a return trip and fingers crossed that the Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites has a room available for us in August. I recommend this lodging if you want a good, clean, safe deal with quick access to the Happiest Place on Earth.
Manager Response: Dear guest, thank you so much for your stellar review! This means a lot to us. Hope you enjoyed your visit and we look forward to welcoming you back next time you visit the area. Safe travels!

Summary Heading: The best “Discovery” on a Disney Vacation
Summary: Great location!!! Very friendly and helpful staff! Nice clean room rooms. Management was very welcoming and really made sure our stay was memorable. The staff was ready to help with any of our needs! Thank you
Manager Response: Dear Elias, thank you so much for positively rating and reviewing your stay at Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites. Providing our guests with excellent services and hearing their positive feedback about it makes our day. We love hearing that our desirable location worked out perfectly for our customers. Our team contributes their best efforts to ensure that our guests receive the value of a premium hotel experience, so we're delighted to see your high appreciation for our lovely staff and their services. It is indeed a proud moment for our management that our team was able to handle your needs and manage your stay in a friendly and professional manner. You had the experience that we strive to provide for each of our guests, and we hope to welcome you back many more times in the future.  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: If you’re looking for an affordable hotel walking distance to the parks this is it! Clean room, comfortable beds, AC, shower has good water pressure, clean swimming pool, free parking and wifi. Last but not least great customer service. Will book again.
Manager Response: Dear guest, we're delighted that you had such a pleasant stay with us. We believe, it's all about doing something with dedication, unique, and with care that enriches our guests' experience. Thank you very much for your feedback and noticing those details:)   We look forward to welcoming you back when you are next in the area.

Summary: Great location -  walked to Disney. Helpful staff and good coffee!! Motel type hotel with plenty of parking. Bed was comfy and convenient Dennys next door where hotel guests get a discount Would stay there again
Manager Response: Dear guest, we're delighted that you had such a pleasant stay with us. We believe, it's all about doing something with dedication, unique, and with care that enriches our guests' experience. Thank you very much for your feedback and noticing those details:)   We look forward to welcoming you back when you are next in the area.

Summary: It was convenient for our trip to be close to the convention center. The bed was hard, the shower is small, you get what you pay for! The only plus would be location for sure. The housekeeping came at 6pm so we didn’t have fresh towels when we got home. It was loud at night, you can hear everything outside, speaking of that… the walls are very light. I could hear the people next door to us having a conversation in full depth. I felt bad for them when I woke up to blowdry my hair:(
Manager Response: Dear Guest, we are glad to receive feedback on your stay but disappointed to know that we did not meet your standards. We apologise for the conditions of the room which you did not find comfortable. If you had informed us about when you prefer our housekeeping services to cover your room, we could've instructed our team to complete it before your arrival. In addition, we would have rectified the situation of loud noises immediately or possibly offered you a room move based on availability if you had let it be known to our front desk staff about the displeasure. Please know that we are always there to assist you with your needs. While we are glad that the location felt convenient to your liking, we will not shy away from making proper improvements to enhance the overall guest experience at our establishment. We hope you consider booking with us again the next time you are in the area so that we can provide the peaceful and relaxing stay you expected and deserve.  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Older hotel but very clean and well maintained. Staff was excellent and very nice. Loved how close it was to Disneyland and the Anaheim convention center. Air conditioning work well. Parking was secure
Manager Response: Dear Guest, it is so great to know that we could deliver an excellent experience for you at our hotel. Providing relaxing accommodations and pleasant services is what we're all about. We're glad that our clean and comfortable accommodations made your stay nice and that you especially enjoyed the conveniences of our quiet location. Our staff works tirelessly to bring you a well-structured guest experience with all facilities and amenities ready on deck. Thank you for letting us know that every part of the stay worked out for you. We hope to have you back here for yet another relaxing stay.  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: We traveled from Las Vegas with a birthday cake when we arrived there was no rooms available for us to check in early so we can put cake in room and the front desk men was very sweet and kind he offered us to keep the cake in there refrigerator until we come back on check in the rooms are very big we all slept like a baby the hotel is right next to Disney thank you for having us we will be back soon
Manager Response: Dear guest, it sounds as if our hotel was perfect for your needs, and we are delighted that you enjoyed your time with us so much. Thank you for your positive rating; we hope that you will have an opportunity to make a return visit very soon.

Summary: Hotel room was clean and ready to go when we arrived! It is very close in proximity to Disney. It is also very close to other stores like target, Ralph’s etc. and restaurants if you would like to eat out of the Disneyland area. Overall great experience and front office management is very helpful, flexible and attentive! No extra charge for parking and you’re allowed one vehicle parking. Kishan was very welcoming and answered any questions we had upon arrival and when we checked out!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, we are pleased to know that you thoroughly enjoyed your time at the Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites. We appreciate you letting us know how satisfied you were with our hotel's ease of access to nearby attractions like Disneyland. We take it upon ourselves to provide you with an exceptional guest experience created by excellent conditions, exclusive amenities and enthusiastic staff services at reasonable prices. We are thankful to you for including your appreciation for our location and its conveniences in your review. That information will be helpful for travellers who may be considering a stay with us. Let us know what we can do better next time to arrange another magnificent holiday for you.  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: I stayed with my daughter for 3 nights and our room was great. We booked a queen and were upgraded to one that had a 2nd bedroom with bunk beds. The room is slightly dated but clean and comfortable. It is steps from Disney and was an easy walk each morning to the parks and back on tired legs. She is high risk and we were worried about staying in a hotel to being with but we felt totally safe. The front desk staff was very accommodating and even saved us when I realized I had locked us out on the 2nd night! It is a great budget spot and I would stay here again if we make our way back to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear guest, we're delighted that you had such a pleasant stay with us. We believe, it's all about doing something with dedication, unique, and with care that enriches our guests' experience. Thank you very much for your feedback and noticing those details:)   We look forward to welcoming you back when you are next in the area.

Summary: The hotel was within walking distance to Downtown Disney. Hotel staff let us hold onto our parking space a few hours longer than checkout saving us from paying for parking! Very friendly and accommodating staff!
Manager Response: Dear guest, we're delighted that you had such a pleasant stay with us. We believe, it's all about doing something with dedication, unique, and with care that enriches our guests' experience. Thank you very much for your feedback and noticing those details:)   We look forward to welcoming you back when you are next in the area.

Summary: If your staying at Disney this is a great location . We walked to dennys for breakfast the hotel gave us a coupon that was a plus. The walk to Disney really isn’t that bad it says 15 mins but it’s not far at all.
Manager Response: Dear guest, we're delighted that you had such a pleasant stay with us. We believe, it's all about doing something with dedication, unique, and with care that enriches our guests' experience. Thank you very much for your feedback and noticing those details:)   We look forward to welcoming you back when you are next in the area.

Summary Heading: Safe and clean place to stay in Anaheim.
Summary: I just checked out this morning. I stayed two nights for a event at the convention center and visited Downtown Disney one evening. The location is perfect- everything is walking distance. The room is clean and comfortable with fast wi-fi. There is also free coffee in the lobby in the morning. Parking is located just a few steps from the rooms. Check-in and check-out was easy. The management and staff is friendly and nice, willing to help with whatever their guests needs. Will definitely recommend and hope to stay here again the future.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Nothing makes us happier than a guest leaving a good rating on our service and overall work performance. Thank you for choosing us for your stay and for such a kind review. We'd love to welcome you again when you're down here for another trip!  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: about 15-20 min walk to disneyland. the bed was comfortable and the room was perfect for 2. there's a vending machine that sells water and soda in the parking lot - stock up on water bottles before going into the park. free parking and check in & check out was very easy & quick. i recommend people to stay here if you want something close within walking distance and on the cheaper side. The only thing was that the shower water pressure is low so it takes a few extra minutes to rinse off.
Manager Response: Dear guest, we're delighted that you had such a pleasant stay with us. Summary Heading: Above cheapies, below Best Western, priced accordingly, fine for sleep and disneyland
Summary: Not sure where all the glowing reviews are coming from.  This is a basic motel above the likes of Super 8 or Motel 6 but below Best Western Plus. Our Standard King was a fairly small room with a tiny bathroom, an ‘open’ closet and a narrow bench running along the wall under the TV, which was wall mounted. The walls are painted concrete and the floor tiled throughout. Floor was dirty, had to walk around in socks especially right up to the moment we got into bed. On the plus side, the beds were comfortable and the linen clean and new, so that’s something you may not get in Motel 6. Also the wifi worked very well and the a/c functioned. But again on the negative side – no desk and no real place to use a laptop other than the bedside table, no way of making a hot drink other than

Summary Heading: Sufficient for a trip to Disneyland
Summary: The Discovery Inn & Suites is okay if you are planning to visit Disneyland. It is nothing special, but it has what you need: bed, shower, fridge, table, microwave.  Pros: The staff is friendly. They have a good Disney parking policy (can park before check-in and stay parked after check-out for a small fee).  Cons: The shower is lukewarm at best. The floors were very dirty; I took a shower, got dressed, got a snack from the mini fridge, and I went to get in bed, but the bottoms of my feet were already filthy. So you will want to make sure you have sandals or socks on when walking on the floors. Neutral: The bed was fine; it didn't really matter since we fell asleep immediately after spending each day at Disney. No breakfast, but they have coffee in the mornings if you're a coffee

Summary: The room was clean and everything was conveniently close. Parking was free but limited. The rooms look as if they’ve been recently remodeled on the inside. Overall the stay was good and we would stay here again.

We do facilitate as many guests as we possibly can, and we are very sorry for the inconvenience that our limited parking area caused you. Summary: Overall a great stay! The staff was very friendly and helpful. The rooms were very clean. The bed was very comfortable. The location was very convenient. It took about 15 mins to walk to downtown Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear guest, thank you so much for your valuable feedback. We are delighted to have provided you with suitable accommodation for your trip here. Summary: The owners are friendly and accommodating. The rooms are clean, and I was surprised and grateful that the housekeeping cleaned our rooms- even though we were in and out at odd times, as we adjusted to arrival/departure times of our family members. The location is ideal for entering the park through Downtown Disney. I would stay here again!
Manager Response: Hey Roam, Thank you for choosing to stay with us and rating your experience as positive. We really appreciate it. We are glad that you found the rooms clean, and our location convenient. We are happy to hear that you will revisit us, and we look forward to having you back many more times in the future.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: I had booked this hotel, and then read some bad reviews, in addition to reading a travel book about Disneyland where they said to absolutely not stay here. It had me a bit worried, but in the end, we had no issues. Nice staff, clean rooms, large vanity area, plenty of hot water, mini fridge, microwave, free parking, and the biggest TV I've ever seen in a hotel room. There was a pool, but it was too chilly for swimming. The beds looked to be brand new, and were comfortable. They even had a map in the lobby showing how to walk to Disneyland from the hotel. The only issue we had was the people checking into the room next to us in the middle of the night kept slamming the door to their room. I don't feel that it was the hotels fault,  though, just rude people.
Manager Response: Hey Curlibird, Thank you for your review. We appreciate the positive rating, despite facing some issues. We apologize for the noise issues that caused you some inconvenience, and we are sorry to hear that some of the guests were so disruptive. We do ask all guests to respect one another and keep the noise level to a minimum, but, unfortunately, not all of our guests abide by all rules. Your comfort and satisfaction are of the utmost importance to us, and we have taken your feedback on board for the betterment of the guest experience. We trust that the positives of your stay outweighed the downsides, and we hope to welcome you back when you return to Anaheim.  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: We were able to park our car in the morning to avoid parking fees at the park. It was walkable distance to the park. Check in was fast and easy. We were able to check in late (11 PM). The staff was friendly at all times.
Manager Response: Dear guest, thank you so much for your stellar review! This means a lot to us. Hope you enjoyed your visit and we look forward to welcoming you back next time you visit the area. Safe travels!

Summary: I really love this hotel and staff. Owner is always nice and helpful. Rooms are nice and it’s a close walk to Disneyland. I Always choose this hotel. Coffee makers in room would be nice, but hey there’s a Cocos around the corner.

Different firmness pillows, so I had choices. Yay!  Not so good: By far, my biggest issue was the floor. It's laminate, so quick and east to keep clean, right? I take my shoes off immediately upon entering my motel rooms to avoid tracking dirt and germs all over the room. After 10 minutes with my shoes off, the bottom of my socks were grey.... Summary Heading: GREAT hotel for location and price!!
Summary: I have stayed at this property several times for many reasons: price, location (two blocks from Downtown Disney and theme parks; three blocks from Conventiin Center and Garden Walk shopping/dining venue), comfort of the room and customer service. This is not a new hotel, and if you look too carefully, you'll find plenty of things that need updating. But the water is hot, the heat/AC effective,  the bed comfortable, the room spacious and clean. It is wonderful to be so close to so many things without paying out of the nose for the privilege!! The front desk staff are very helpful and eager to please. There is a pool and vending machine on site. I will definately stay here again!  HINT: Should anyone in your party require an ECV, Select Mobility Scooters is close by, and they

Summary: Overall, the motel was everything we needed for a 2 day, 1 night trip to Disneyland! We didn't need anything fancy, and found the room comfortable, the front desk agent very helpful, and whole stay very easy. Parking was my #1 priority since I live in LA and was driving down, and I was able to park my car at the motel for my entire trip, from ~8am on day one until ~midnight on day two for just $15. Highly recommend!!
Manager Response: Dear guest, thank you for taking the time to rate your recent stay at our hotel. We are thrilled that you had a great stay, and we hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: We had a great stay for our Disney trip. Close walk to Disneyland. Has everything you need, nothing fancy. Staff was excellent. We called ahead because our flight was delayed so we could check in  late. They were there to accompany our late arrival. They held our luggage in storage so we could enjoy our last afternoon in Downtown Disney. Free car parking. Would stay again for our next trip!
Manager Response: Dear guest ,we are always pleased to receive feedback from our guests in relation to their stays with us, and we are delighted with your rating, thank you very much. We are happy to have satisfied you so well, and we hope to remain your hotel of choice here for future visits.

There are two well-known restaurants in the block.  The property is easily walkable to DL via Disneyland Drive.

Summary: We stayed 6 nights in October, 2021. This basic hotel was clean and simple. The floors could have been cleaned a bit more, but they came every day and emptied the trash cans and brought clean towels. The beds were acceptably comfortable. It is a bit beyond what I would call “walkable” to Disneyland if you’re going for the day. It’s a good 15-20 minute walk. We used the ART (Ball Rd line) and stayed all day so it worked, but if we’d wanted to go back to the room mid day, not so much. We didn’t use the pool as it’s not heated and small, but it looked clean.

Summary: Hotel was clean and close to the park. Free parking. Only issue we had during our stay was the wifi was down 99% of time. Staff were very nice, rooms were clean. If you are looking for an affordable place to stay close to the park look no further!
Manager Response: Dear guest, many thanks for your positive rating – we are delighted that you enjoyed your time at our property so much. We hope to host you again successfully in the near future.
