Summary Heading: Great Help, Great Location, Great People!
Summary: Our family came to Disneyland for a trip here in October. Upon arrival, we were greeted by Jay Who is very informational on routes to Disneyland and places to eat around. They were very accommodating with our request to possibly get two queen beds instead of one, and as soon as it was available we were informed that we would be upgrading the room. As far as the distance from the in and the park, it was about a 10 minute walk from the parking lot to downtown Disney. A very convenient and easy walk even with a family.  We were very pleased, this is a place where we stay every time we come to Disneyland and we will continue to stay at this place every time we come down if possible. Jay, thank you for all your help!! -Kolton M.

TV never did work in the room, and could have had the issue fixed, but didn’t need it. Overall, no complaints, would stay again.

The rooms seem to be recently remodeled and the hardwood floors were nice. The WiFi was decent, and I was able to use it to stream from my chromecast, and though there was a bit of tech support needed to get the TV working, the service desk was helpful! The room was clean, though housekeeping was every other day and the sheets on the bed I didn't use needed changing. I felt safe walking to Disneyland from the hotel and having a microwave a fridge made it easy to have a quick small breakfast in my room. The lobby was closed mostly due to COVID, so any coffee or breakfast offered was unavailable. I didn't use the pool, so I can't

Summary Heading: I left early because I didn’t want to stay another night
Summary: The staff is nice, but the room I had was terrible. The A/C was off and my window was open when I first walked into the room. It took about 30 minutes for the room to cool off enough to sleep. People hang out and night outside and are loud enough to hear in the room while trying to sleep. I had a hard time getting hot-water in the shower. Some towels were dirty (hair) in the bathroom upon arrival. It unfortunately was the kind of room that you don’t want to sleep under the covers in. I booked 2 days but only stayed one night and left anaheim early. I did not feel it was worth it to stay in that room another night. My suggestion is to pay for parking and get a hotel further away from Disneyland for similar price.
Manager Response: Hey there, We are very sorry to hear that you were so disappointed with your stay at our hotel. We take guest feedback very seriously, and we will endeavor to find out what specifically arose and see to it that it doesn't happen again. Room has a microwave and a mini fridge, so we brought some breakfast stuff with us. Didn't have any trouble sleeping, didn't hear any outside noise.  The hotel is an easy 10 minute walk to Downtown Disney up Disneyland Drive.  We were able to leave our car parked for the day while we were at Disneyland for a $14 fee.  Well worth it,  no traffic to fight and an easy walk.  Hotel has a little pool which I think may be closed at the moment due to covid, but would be a good

We had plenty of towels and supplies for 3 people and a 2-night stay, and the tv and air conditioning was a nice way to wind down. Would definitely stay again!

They said everyone would want to get in but they only had 2 rooms rented and i was one.. who was EVERYONE?? The husband was alittle more friendlier than the wife. Our trip took place when Disneyland made the announcement to close due to the Coronavirus and the hotel was very good to work with. Thank you Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites!

Summary: We stayed here for our two days at Disneyland and it was just perfect for the both of us! its has your basic amenities and was super close to restaurants and Disneyland. The man behind the counter was nice and helpful! Thank You!
Manager Response: Dear Zavalabr, We are known for the excellent value that we offer in this location, and we appreciate your acknowledgment of this. It sounds as if our property was suitable for your stay in this area, and if you have similar accommodation requirements here again, we hope that you will choose to stay with us again. Thank you for your review.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Super great service! We were booking a set of rooms for our company and Nitesh was super helpful throughout the whole process: open to changes, working with me to ensure we had the right amount and prompt calls. Highly suggested! Thank you, Nitesh for everything!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  To see that we were able to provide our guest with such a wonderful experience is the highest compliment we can receive. Thank you so much for sharing!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: GREAT property with GREAT staff and Mgt
Summary: I recently stayed at this property in January for a trade show at the Anaheim convention center. I was upgraded to a nicer room and couldn’t have been happier with the check in process or accommodations!  Nitesh is amazing and very helpful!!! I left behind an item in my room that I REALLY wanted back. Nitesh went out of his way to take my UPS label and item to theUPS store.  He would not accept a monetary gratuity in exchange for going out of his way to help me. I tried!   Bottom line, great property with great staff, highly recommend!
Manager Response: Hi Lori, Thank you for your wonderful feedback - we are thrilled that you had such a wonderful experience with us, and that our hotel was so suitable for your needs and expectations. Thank you very much for your detailed review. We are so pleased that you left with such a fantastic impression of the wonderful service that we offer. Nitesh is a highly-regarded member of our team, and works so hard to ensure that each and every guest has the very best possible experience here. It is no surprise that he made such an effort to return your item to you. We hope that you will return soon to have another wonderful stay with us, thank you again for your complimentary review.     Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Excellent location (short walk to Disneyland), clean and comfortable room, check in area not up to ratings of the room itself. I felt uneasy checking in. That said, we had no problems. Would likely spend the extra $40 to stay at one of the Best Western’s next time.
Manager Response: Hi Katie, Thank you for your feedback; we are very happy that the comfortable, clean room that you were provided with pleased you, as well, of course, as our wonderful location, and our proximity to Disneyland. We hope that the positive attributes of your stay will encourage you to stay with us again when you are next visiting this area.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Affordable and convenient to Disney and the ACC
Summary: I picked this place for its location to the Anaheim Convention Center because it was half the price of the conference hotel yet had all the amenities I needed (microwave, refrigerator, hair dryer, tv, and wifi).  The mattress on the bed was comfortable, although the pillows were all the same firmness - hard.  I would suggest that out of the 4 they provide they include one or 2 that are less firm. I did not use the pool as the outdoor temps rarely got above 72. There is a small pool, but I didn't use it as the temps were too cool while I was there.  The bottom appeared to have debris although the water looked clear, so perhaps it just needs repainting.  Coffee is available in the office, but no breakfast.  This was fine with me since my conference offered breakfasts every day and
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed and complimentary feedback; we very much appreciate the time that you spent sharing your experience with us. It is always wonderful to hear positive feedback in relation to our rooms, thank you for those comments. We are pleased that the cleanliness of your room was satisfactory and that you had a comfortable stay. It sounds as if our hotel was very suitable for your accommodation needs, and we are delighted that you intend to stay with us again if you return to Anaheim. We hope that you will be back soon!     Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: The hotel is located close to the parks, within walking distance. The bed was comfortable and the manager was very accommodating. The room was spacious and clean. There was plenty of parking too. I will book again.
Manager Response: Dear Michelle,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and for giving prospective guests relevant information about our property. We are glad to hear that our staff was able to provide you with friendly customer service and we hope you had a comfortable stay. Thanks for saying that you will stay with us again - we look forward to having you back soon.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: We arrived at the hotel much earlier than expected. Guy at the front desk tried his best to find a ready room for us, but they weren’t quite ready. He knew we wanted to get started at Disney ASAP so he checked us in and gave us an area to change in so we could get started even though we were super early for check in. The hotel is super close to the back entrance of Disney. Easy walk (5minutes). On our last day we checked out and went to breakfast at Downtown Disney. We realized my son had forgotten his expensive new light saber in the room. We called and the guy in front ran to the room to check and our minds were at ease. He saved it for us until we got back. Honest, kind staff. This hotel is a gem. Your also right next door to a couple of diners (we got pie each night) which
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for your fantastic feedback - we are thrilled that you had such a wonderful experience with us, and that our hotel was so suitable for your needs and expectations. We appreciate your review, and the detail that you have provided for future guests at our property. We look forward to welcoming you back when you are next in the area.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: This is a locally owned and maintained property on the back side of Disney California Adventure. Always clean and the owner is absolutely fabulous. Best part NO BUGS! Hair dryer, toiletries, microwave and mini fridge. Comfortable bed, owner stays on site, and we have stayed there many times, never have had a negative experience. Rooms are very clean, DIY renovation but done nicely. Owner is very accommodating of early check in if he can. It would take an entirely free stay for us to go to any other hotel in the area. Walkway to downtown Disney takes you right past the Disneyland Hotel and through downtown Disney. The location is so great and easily walked even after a long day in the parks. You can see most of the fireworks from the parking lot as well. Ample parking and unlike
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  To see that we were able to provide our guest with such a wonderful experience is the highest compliment we can receive. Thank you so much for sharing!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: My boyfriend and I had the best time during our stay when we came for sweethearts night at Disneyland. The rooms were clean and the staff was very helpful and accommodating! Walking distance from Disneyland and many restaurants. Would recommend and stay again!
Manager Response: Dear Holly,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and for giving prospective guests relevant information about our property. We are glad to hear that our staff was able to provide you with friendly customer service and we hope you had a comfortable stay. Thanks for saying that you will stay with us again - we look forward to having you back soon.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: The staff was so nice and went out of the way to accommodate our needs.  The room was comfortable and very clean. I would definitely stay here again.   So convenient to walk to Disneyland and California Adventure.
Manager Response: Dear Cheryl,  Thank you for reviewing your most recent stay. It's a great pleasure to learn that you highly enjoyed your stay, rated us with 5 out of 5 stars and for sharing these kind words online. We hope to welcome you again when your travels brings you back this way!    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: This place was affordable, friendly, clean, and warm! It had everything I was looking for and more. Definitely a good choice to stay here.   Very close to the park, discount on meals nearby, and friendly customers.  I hope you enjoy your trip! (PS. Thanks Nitesh)
Manager Response: Dear Dalerik, Thank you for your kind words, we are happy with your report of having a positive stay at our hotel. We are pleased to have provided you with a place to stay that was ideal for your needs, and we hope to welcome you back for another wonderful stay in the near future.     Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: I've been visiting the trade music show “NAMM” in Anaheim every year. Over the years I’ve stayed in many hotel in the area. But for 5-6 years in this lovely place. Run by a young Indian couple with care. The establishment has been greatly improved since  the new owners took it over. Very friendly and helpful approach give it an almost home-like feeling’. I have already booked a stay for the next Show in January 2021.  Take care All  Jan/Prague
Manager Response: Dear Jana, Thank you for rating your recent stay with us; we are so pleased that you enjoyed your time here so much. We love hearing back from returning guests as it makes us feel like we are doing something right! We will make sure to pass on your feedback to our team; they will be delighted that they were able to add to your stay. We hope to welcome you back soon!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: I had to make a last minute booking for a Saturday night. I called early that morning and luckily they had a room available. The room was a single Queen, nice and cozy with a good heater! Since it was a cold January night. A staff member named Jay helped me out with coordinating the parking, since it was a busy day there. I really appreciated that. Great customer service guys keep up the good work!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for being our guest. We are glad to know you liked the courteous service provided by our associates and had a pleasant time with us. We hope to see you again so we can serve you even better.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Very good choice for your Disneyland vacations
Summary: Its a good place to stay, clean, close to disney ( a 10 minute walk to downtown disney) safe, free parking and close to restaurants and a cvs and walgreens. The only minus is the 2 hrs of free coffee in the reception.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your favorable feedback, we are pleased that our hotel was so suitable for your accommodation needs here. We appreciate your five-star rating and we hope to welcome you back to our hotel again when you are next in town. We would love to be your hosts again in the future.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: If you are looking for Hilton keep on driving! This motel reminded me of the motor motels of the 50’s and 60’s very cozy an quite nice. My room was smallish and basic and it fit my needs. The bed was really comfortable and I slept like a baby! The room was clean and had outlets with USB ports! The Disneyland is located just down the street but the ART bus has a stop almost in front of the motel. The front desk staff were very nice and accommodating. I arrived about 3 hours before check and I was asked if I would like to leave my luggage and head over to the park. I was not expecting this kind of customer service and proactive behavior! I will stay here again and I definitely would recommend this motel!
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed and complimentary feedback; we very much appreciate the time that you spent sharing your experience with us. It is always wonderful to hear positive feedback in relation to our staff, thank you for those comments. We are pleased that the cleanliness of your room was satisfactory and that you had a comfortable stay. We are delighted that you would stay with us again; we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back before long!     Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Birthday present to visit Disney Land.
Summary: Although the location is great, I will NEVER stay there again. I ran out of hot water when taking a shower!!! Was told to locate the maid to get more toilet paper when we ran out. Was incredibly hard to keep the room a constant comfortable temperature. I’m glad it was basically just used to sleep in.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are disappointed if one of our guests leaves with less than first rate experience. Our aim is to provide a comfortable and pleasant place to stay. We sincerely apologize that our hospitality and attention to details left something to be desired, this is very unlike us. Thank you for sharing your feedback. Please feel free to connect if there is anything we can do to help. We sincerely hope that you will give us another chance to restore your faith in our hotel and hospitality.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: My wife and I planned a day trip to Disneyland for our Anniversary. We decided to get a room close by so we could stay all day in the park and didn’t have to drive two hours home afterward.They let us park at the hotel before regular check in so we were able to walk into Disneyland. Unfortunately, my wife didn’t feel very good and we had to leave the park much earlier then we had planned and she just wanted to go home. The management gave us a full refund even though they didn’t have to. Amazing people! I encourage anyone looking for an affordable place to stay close to Disneyland to consider the Anaheim Discovery Inn and Suites.
Manager Response: Hi Marc, Firstly, allow us to congratulate you on your anniversary! Thank you for choosing our hotel amongst many to celebrate this special occasion. We are sorry that you were unable to stay with us because of your wife's illness. We hope that she has since made a full recovery, and that you will come and visit us again very soon for a belated anniversary trip.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Our rooms were good no issues. When we first checked in found a previous hotel guest under shirt on the floor by the bed. Floors did not look like they were sweeped. We did not spend much time in the room.
Manager Response: Hi Carmen, We are thrilled to read your encouraging feedback, thank you very much! We are delighted to learn that you enjoyed all that our hotel has to offer. We are very sorry that our housekeeping team did not inspect all aspects of your room to our usual standard, and we will make them of the shirt that was left. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Room was clean and had updated flooring; very close proximity to parks; front desk staff was friendly and helpful. I arrived later than expected and the staff was very helpful in letting me park my vehicle. Overall free parking was also greatly appreciated.
Manager Response: Hi Jasper, Thank you very much for your kind review, we are delighted to learn that you enjoyed your time with us so much. We appreciate your recent patronage, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.     Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Great Hotel and close to everything near Disneyland
Summary: I have now stayed at this hotel for 5 yrs during my trips to Disneyland and have not had any problems with it. Since i have stayed here, there are times i get to check-in early and if you looking for a place that has food places near it, then this is a great hotel and the staff is very friendly and is within walking distance to the parks.
Manager Response: Dear Walter, To see that we were able to provide our guest with such a wonderful experience is the highest compliment we can receive. Thank you so much for sharing!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: An awesome place to stay when in Anaheim
Summary: You can’t go wrong with this friendly clean hotel right near the Disney parks and within walking distance of eateries. Free parking and free morning coffee also available - I wouldn’t stay anywhere else!
Manager Response: Dear Darren, Thank you for your review, we are very pleased to know that we provided you with an awesome stay! This is always wonderful feedback to receive from any guest. We loved hosting you on this visit, and we hope to have the opportunity to do so again very soon.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: My wife and I drove to the Anaheim discovery inn and suites after spending a week in Las Vegas. The drive was amazing and highly recommend it. Very scenic.  Checking in was very easy. A smiling Nitesh was waiting for us and was very friendly and chatty. After quickly checking in we headed to our room.   The room we had was great! It was basic but clean and contained everything we needed including a fridge. Even our room in Vegas didn’t have one! The bath/shower worked well and easy to change the temperature. Also plenty of space for your bags/clothes. We were also able to park our car directly outside our room.   The location was excellent. It was a short stroll to the parks every morning. It probably took 15 mins to get to downtown Disney and then another 5/10 to get to the
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  It is always a pleasure to receive such a wonderfully detailed review! Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback of your visit with the online community. We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us and thank you for the compliments. We would love to welcome you back, to impress you with our service, when you are next visiting the area.      Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Started great. Then woke up to a constant chirping bird that apparently at the front lives in the laundry room. Then jack hammering at 9am on the opposite side of our bedroom without warning.  Then zero remorse from the woman at the front desk. She just wanted to argue. Thankfully at checkout,  the fella was kind and apologetic.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are disappointed if one of our guests leaves with less than first rate experience. Our aim is to provide a comfortable and pleasant place to stay. We sincerely apologize that our hospitality and attention to details left something to be desired, this is very unlike us. Thank you for sharing your feedback. Please feel free to connect if there is anything we can do to help. We sincerely hope that you will give us another chance to restore your faith in our hotel and hospitality.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: This is the second time I’ve stayed here and the rooms are very clean with comfy beds and tv. Great walking distance to Disneyland. We’re planning another to Disneyland soon and we’re planning on staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for reviewing your most recent stay. It's a great pleasure to learn that you highly enjoyed your stay, rated us so highly and for sharing these kind words online. We hope to welcome you again when your travels brings you back this way!    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: We had a super time while staying here the rooms were nice and clean, management and cleaning ladies were absolutely amazing nice and friendly and ready to help if needed be, when I first got there and saw the pool u was worried cause it looked dirty but when I got closer to investigate it was super clean, very short walk to Disneyland park and California adventure park, very close to all amenities restaurant's, convenience stores, pharmacy's and so much more, there was a huge group of us of 15 people so we took up quite a bit of rooms I for one have no complaints what so ever and loved every minute of it, I would definitely recommend this hotel management is super amazing and so friendly !
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts on your recent stay with us. We are delighted to learn that your stay was a thoroughly enjoyable experience. It was wonderful to read your comments about our staff and rest assured that we will share your feedback with them and the rest of the team who take great pride in ensuring each guest has a memorable stay.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Location and value near Disneyland cannot be beaten
Summary: Our first choice when we holiday at Anaheim. We've stayed about six times and only if the hotel is booked out, do we stay anywhere else.  The rooms are clean and serviced. The management are very accommodating to any special requirements. We highly recommend Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites for your next stay.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,    We are thrilled with your feedback and to know that you enjoyed your time with us so much. We appreciate your recommendation, and we hope to welcome you back very soon.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Very kind and friendly staff :) Rooms were nice and comfortable overall. No noise and very quiet place perfect for anyone that doesn’t want loud neighbors. Has a small pool you can swim in and enjoy!!
Manager Response: We were pleased to host you at our hotel recently, thank you for choosing to stay with us. We are pleased that the tranquility that prevails throughout our property was so appealing to you, and to know that you enjoyed your time here so much. I'm happy to read our staff was helpful and I hope you join us again soon!    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Clean, ready to accommodate last minute
Summary: While the room was slightly small, it was clean, ready and very conveniently located. The shower had warm water, the air conditioning worked and the bed was pretty comfortable. If you’re looking for a hotel close to Disneyland, this will work great.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your very kind feedback and for taking the time to share it. We are always thrilled to receive positive comments such as yours. We very much look forward to welcoming you back for your next visit.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Backyard to the happiest place on Earth!
Summary: Location is within walking distance to Disneyland and great local SoCal restaurants like Marri’s Pizza, Tiffys and Coco’s. Very clean and safe place to stay - Jay and staff work very hard to provide a family friendly environment. Lots of returning families staying from all around the world.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  To see that we were able to provide our guest with such a wonderful experience is the highest compliment we can receive. Thank you so much for sharing!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: This hotel was really nice! They have a second bedroom in the room with a bunk bed! They made the room a Disney theme with some accessories. The hotel was great for the price! Close walking Disneyland!
Manager Response: Dear Shannon,  Thank you for reviewing your most recent stay. It's a great pleasure to learn that you highly enjoyed your stay, rated us with 5 out of 5 stars and for sharing these kind words online. We hope to welcome you again when your travels brings you back this way!    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Amazing little motel, great location to Disneyland, fresh linen every day! Perfect for our short trip. Staff were really helpful and polite and full of knowledge. Bed was really comfortable, even the bathroom had toiletries. A great stay at a great price would definitely book again!!
Manager Response: Dear Emma, Thank you for your feedback; we are pleased to have provided you with suitable, comfortable accommodation, and a great stay. We are pleased to note that you would stay with us again, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back very soon!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Had a brilliant stay with only minor complaints.   Hotel was very accommodating with an early check in request, Nitesh was extremely helpful.   Room was nice size, comfy beds and plenty of space for storage with TV Fridge etc.  Fridge however had food in it belonging to the previous occupant!   The bathroom was okay however our shower's Cold and Hot faucets were mixed up which led us to think we only had cold water at first. When we arrived it did not seem 100% cleaned as there was a long black hair in the shower which did not belong to us (two short haired guys)  Hotel offers brilliant discount at a nearby Denny's which is hugely appreciated!  Will recommend this hotel to others given how easy it is to get to and from the parks and particularly how friendly the staff were!
Manager Response: Dear Anthony, We would like to thank you for taking the time to complete our online survey. Feedback from our guests is very important to us and your input helps with our continuing efforts to provide excellent service and a great stay. We really appreciate your improvement suggestions. Thank you so much for your business and we look forward to seeing you in the future.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: We stayed two nights at the Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites. We arrived very early in the morning, before normal check-in, and the management gladly stored our luggage until we were able to check in after our day at Disney. Our room was clean and neat. Our entire experience was positive. We highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear James,   We are thrilled with your feedback and to know that you enjoyed your time with us so much. We appreciate your recommendation, and we hope to welcome you back very soon.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for the price & convenience
Summary: I have an annual pass and have stayed here a few times. The location is perfect. Walking distance to Downtown Disney and Disneyland. Rooms were renovated not long ago. It's not anything fancy, but works well for a decent price. Rooms were always clean and the guy that runs the place, Nitesh, is very nice and accommodating.
Manager Response: Dear Anthony, Thank you for your excellent rating regarding your recent stay with us. We are pleased that you enjoyed your time here so much. We hope that you will choose our hotel again for your next visit to the area, we would love to see you again soon.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Spent some time here in October for Disney. Super close to the parks and plenty of onsite parking. Reception is friendly and so are the cleaners. Vending machine is handy. Room is clean and bathroom neat. Nothing fancy but if your looking for somewhere to crash after the parks this will do you.  Would stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your feedback; we are pleased to have provided you with suitable accommodation, and a great stay. We are pleased to note that you would stay with us again, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back very soon!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: management was friendly and very accommodating. The Inn is a short walk from downtown Disney and no fighting the parking garage or trolley. Will stay there again, and again, and again. will recommend to friends and family.
Manager Response: Hi Nikki, We appreciate your kind feedback, thank you, and we are pleased that you enjoyed your stay at our hotel so much. We are pleased to note that you would stay with us again, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back very soon. We appreciate your recommendation, thank you!  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Great value, nicest motel I've been to
Summary: Came for BlizzCon and found this property within walking distance of the convention center. The room was very clean & nice, front desk staff was very friendly & helpful. Free parking & WiFi. Could not have asked for better value for what I paid.
Manager Response: Hi Michael, We appreciate you staying with us recently, and taking the time to leave your review. We are grateful for your comments regarding both the location of our hotel and the wonderful team that we have, as these are important attributes of our guests' stays with us. Thank you for taking the time to leave us such lovely feedback, we hope to see you again soon!  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: We have stayed there many times and every time it as been extremely enjoyable. The front office go out of their way to make sure everyone  is enjoying their stay. The rooms are always clean and comfortable. I have recommended them to many of our friends and family in Arizona
Manager Response: We were pleased to host you at our hotel once again, thank you for making our hotel your home from home in this area. It is always our pleasure to host you, and we hope to do so many more times in the future.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: This hotel never disappoints this is my forth time staying here the rooms are clean and so close to parks it’s a great price the staff is always so kind and helpful when I need a hotel in Anaheim this is my go to place would highly recommend you won’t be disappointed
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   We are thrilled with your feedback and to know that you enjoyed your time with us so much. We appreciate your recommendation, and we hope to welcome you back very soon.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: GREAT budget motel. Clean, cheap. Good customer service. Good size parking lot. Really, really close to downtown Disney! Super quick walk. Everything was well lit and it felt like a safe environment. All the perfect qualities I want in my *budget* motel when visiting Disneyland! It is a very basic room literally nothing special, but it’s all I need and I would love to stay again next time I come back!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are known for the excellent value that we offer in this location, and we appreciate your acknowledgment of this. It sounds as if our property was suitable for your stay in this area, and if you have similar accommodation requirements here again, we hope that you will choose to stay with us again. Thank you for your review.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: We have always had a clean room and management is always friendly. The owner Natesh is always very accommodating.  very close walk to Disneyland. Good location.  The price of the room is very reasonable.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are pleased to hear that you had a comfortable stay with us and that our hotel suited your accommodation requirements so well. We would love to welcome you back for another great stay very soon!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: We booked this hotel for based off it's location to the parks.  It was very clean and the hotel staff was very nice.  You are about a 5 to 10-minute walk from Downtown Disney and about at 15 minutes walk to the entrance.  I would highly recommend this hotel it price is you main goal.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5-star review! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay with us - it sounds as though our property was ideal for your needs. I look forward to sharing your kind words with our team, and hope to welcome you back soon.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: It’s a motel. Walking distance to Disneyland. We had a room with 2 beds. Tv and internet was nice. There is a fee to check in early. The staff was nice. Not sure if there is an elevator to get to the second floor. Nice bathroom. Comfy beds. Ample towels.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your excellent rating regarding your recent stay with us. We are pleased that you enjoyed your time here so much. We hope that you will choose our hotel again for your next visit to the area, we would love to see you again soon.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Above all, the location is perfect. A nice 15 minute walk away from the park. The room was clean and it was a great price. The bed was a little hard, but I don’t mind that. I would definitely come back to stay.
Manager Response: Dear Leite, We're glad that you enjoyed your stay here and had a good time! We would love to welcome you back again and again!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: We didn't actually get to stay at this hotel as our trip was cancelled due to unforeseen circumstances. I reached out to the hotel and the staff was amazing at helping ensure my reservation was cancelled properly. Being in customer service myself, I feel the true test of a business is how it treats a lost customer. Their customer service was wonderful and I will definitely plan another stay with them.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for sharing with the online community! We are glad to know you liked the courteous service provided by our associates. We hope to see you soon!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: The rooms was clean and comfortable. I enjoyed having a fridge and microwave. Staff was friendly and courteous. Short walk (10-15 minutes) to Disneyland. Easy to the Parks and easy to get home. Good value.
Manager Response: Dear Mickey, We are known for the excellent value that we offer in this location, and we appreciate your acknowledgment of this. It sounds as if our property was suitable for your stay in this area, and if you have similar accommodation requirements here again, we hope that you will choose to stay with us again. Thank you for your review.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Great Stay, ticked all the boxes
Summary: Wife and i stayed here whilst visiting the Disney Parks for 4 nights. Friendly staff managed to extend our stay by a night at a great price. Room was basic but good shower, great bed, great tv. Just what we wanted from the room. 5/5 would recommend!
Manager Response: Dear David,   We are thrilled with your feedback and to know that you enjoyed your time with us so much. We appreciate your recommendation, and we hope to welcome you back very soon.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: My first time staying at this property while visiting Disneyland.  It was clean & comfortable and an easy walk to Disneyland and California Adventure.  Will definitely consider it again when my travels take me to Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear Maryin, Thanks for your comments. We are so pleased that you found our hotel to be a nice place to stay. We are also glad that our hotel impressed you enough that you would stay with us again. We enjoy providing a great experience for all kinds of travelers, and we are very pleased that you enjoyed being with us at our hotel. We’ll be here for you in the future if you visit the area again, as we always strive to maintain a great experience for guests like you.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Stayed here from 10/1 until today and cannot rate this place enough! Staff were friendly, the room was spotless, bed was extremely comfortable and the location is ideal if you're going to disneyland as it's only a 15 minute walk. Would definitely stay here again and would recommend to friends. The only thing I would mention is that the aircon machine was extremely loud but apart from that, fantastic stay!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your feedback; we are pleased to have provided you with suitable, comfortable, clean accommodation, and a great stay. We are pleased to note that you would stay with us again, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back very soon!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Nice place to stay on a budget
Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights in early October.  The rooms were clean & tidy, though a bit on the smaller side.  We were able to fit 4 of us pretty comfortably but more than that might be a little tight.  The owner was very nice and accommodating.  It's a fairly easy walk to Disneyland but longer than staying on Harbor Blvd.  We didn't mind because we went to the parks and stayed there all day but if your plan is to go back to the room during the afternoon for a break or to swim in the pool you may find the walk to be a bit on the long side.  We were able to book a room for less than everywhere else and were pleased with the value.  There was no breakfast (only coffee) but there was a small fridge in the room so we kept food & drink in there.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are known for the excellent value that we offer in this location, and we appreciate your acknowledgment of this. It sounds as if our property was suitable for your stay in this area, and if you have similar accommodation requirements here again, we hope that you will choose to stay with us again. Thank you for your review.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: If you are going to disneyland or a convention, your room is simply where you crash when you are done and exhausted. This place works perfectly for this.  Decent Wifi Decent Bathroom Comfortable Bed  Cons The towels are all white, so don't stain them with anything like make-up. The pillows don't do much. Even stacking two of them my head might as well have been on the bed.  Some times guests can be unruly, and the staff isn't empowered to do much about it.
Manager Response: Dear Jeremy, Thank you for taking the time to review our property following your recent stay. Although glad that our property suited your needs in terms of location, we were disappointed that you didn't love your time with us. We will take on board all of your comments and attempt to make several improvements for the betterment of future guests, Thank you for your feedback, we really appreciate it.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Great place to stay, close to Disneyland parks
Summary: I was here 2 years ago with my sister and young nephew, so decided to stay again this trip as I am on my own and it is familiar. The rooms have been upgraded since my last visit - the walls have been painted, the bathroom is much nicer, bedding is new and clean and the decor is very nice. The gentleman who greeted me on my arrival was friendly and helpful. I would recommend this hotel and will stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Debbie, Thank you for your feedback; we are pleased to have provided you with suitable, comfortable, clean accommodation, and a great stay. We are pleased to note that you would stay with us again, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back very soon!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: My family and I stayed here for a few nights. Each of us came in on different days & times. Jay was so wonderful to work with our group and with changes in reservations. Communication was great, rooms were great, staff was great.  This location is perfect within walking distance to Downtown Disney, Disneyland and California Adventure. We highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, To see that we were able to provide our guest with such a wonderful experience is the highest compliment we can receive. Thank you so much for sharing!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Cute room but a little musty
Summary: Room was a good size, bed was comfortable. However there was a sour smell coming from the A/C unit that while it wasn’t overpowering, still wasn’t very fun. But no complaints otherwise. Nice location if you don’t mind a mile walk into Disneyland before and after your day there, but an excellent location for the convention center.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Our maintenance teams have been alerted to your comments and they will ensure that the issues highlighted will be addressed. We hope that you will give us another chance to impress you during your next visit to this area.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Our family stayed here recently for three nights. The staff were very friendly and the room and property was clean and comfortable. The property was about a 15 minutes walk to Disneyland, and had several restaurants within a block. The pool was nice and felt amazing following a long day of walking around Disneyland. It was a great no-frills, budget-friendly family stay.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are pleased to hear that you had a comfortable stay with us and that our hotel suited your accommodation requirements so well. We would love to welcome you back for another great stay very soon!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Wonderful location with freindly helpful staff and clean rooms. Also felt safe. Dennys just a 3 minute walk away was very convenient and loved the kids eat free card you had for staying at hotel. Being able to walk to downtown disney entrance was a bonus as never a big wait for security like the main entrance. Walk is around 15 mins to Disney entrance. Would definetly stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear guest, it sounds as if our hotel was perfect for your needs, and we are delighted that you enjoyed your time with us so much. Thank you for your positive rating; we hope that you will have an opportunity to make a return visit very soon.

Summary: We arrived late August and are leaving today the 10th September. The room was so clean and everything we needed with a small fridge and microwave in the room. A 5 min walk to Downtown Disney. The staff are great and the pool area was a great place to cool down. I would highly recommend to anyone who wants to be close to Disney and is looking for a immaculately clean room. We will definitely be coming back.
Manager Response: Dear Louise, Thank you for your feedback; we are pleased to have provided you with suitable, comfortable, clean accommodation, and a great stay. We are pleased to note that you would stay with us again, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back very soon!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Great place to stay with great people who run the place
Summary: They were very helpful in finding last minute deal and also helping with special requests. The room was clean and the appliances worked and the fan worked to cool the room when it was really hot. The bed was comfortable. Mostly the people were great.
Manager Response: Dear Kelsey, Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts on your recent stay with us. We are delighted to learn that your stay was a thoroughly enjoyable experience. It was wonderful to read your comments about our staff and rest assured that we will share your feedback with them and the rest of the team who take great pride in ensuring each guest has a memorable stay.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Great location, close to Disneyland. Room was great, no issues with our stay. Staff were accommodating and made sure we knew the area well to get around safely. Location was quiet, even though it was so close to a busy road.
Manager Response: Dear Megan, Thank you for your kind review. We understand the importance of the details that make up a great stay and are delighted knowing our wonderful location enhanced your visit with us. We look forward to welcoming you back soon on your next trip.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Clean and close to the theme parks
Summary: Happy to have stayed. Within a 15 minute walk to Downtown Disney. The room was clean and was within our budget. For the price of one night at an on-site hotel we stayed three nights. We chose to walk but we could have easily ride shared.
Manager Response: Dear Mike, We are known for the excellent value that we offer in this location, and we appreciate your acknowledgment of this. It sounds as if our property was suitable for your stay in this area, and if you have similar accommodation requirements here again, we hope that you will choose to stay with us again. Thank you for your review.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: This was a pretty great place to stay at. We had a king size bed that was more than enough space for us. We had a microwave and fridge. Parking was good too, I was able to park right in front of our room. Free coffee in the mornings and free wifi. They also had good cable tv with all the standard channels. Walking distance from the Disney Parks and many other restaurants/stores.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us recently, and for taking the time to leave your valuable feedback. We are happy to provide many amenities in our rooms that our guests find useful, and we are pleased that you appreciated them. It sounds as if we provided you with a place to stay that was ideal for your needs, and we hope to welcome you back for another wonderful stay in the near future.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: A decent place to stay to Disney on a budget
Summary: What we liked: - The location was excellent! It's just about as close as you can get to the parks without staying at the Disney resort. There are plenty of good restaurants and convenience stores within walking distance. - The room was a good size and clean. - There was a fridge and microwave so we could make breakfast and pack a lunch to take with us. - They provided plenty of decent quality soaps and shampoos. Most motels do not. - The outdoor pool was a great place to relax and had a lift to make it accessible for all - It was surprisingly quiet and we were able to sleep well - The A/C worked very well - There was coffee available in the office Areas for Improvement: - The beds were much too firm for our liking and pillows were pretty flat - There was no coffee maker in the
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  It is always a pleasure to receive such a wonderfully detailed review! Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback of your visit with the online community. We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us and thank you for the compliments. We appreciate your constructive feedback as your comments will help us to improve our future guests' stays. We will certainly take your thoughts into consideration, and hope that you will enjoy some improvements when you stay with us again.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Comfortable motel at a walking distance from Disneyland
Summary: Ideal location just across the street from Disneyland (10-15 minutes walk to the entrance of both theme parks). Comfortable beds and super friendly staff. The pool is small, but chances are you will not have time to use it (assuming you are spending your days at Disneyland anyways).
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   It sounds as if our hotel was perfect for your needs, and we are delighted that you enjoyed your time with us so much. Thank you for your positive rating; we hope that you will have an opportunity to make a return visit very soon.  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: We enjoyed our stay , the room was spacious enough, clean and safe environment, free parking and very close to many great places. Having different fairly priced dinners close was an additional bonus 👍🏾👍🏾
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for being our guest. We are glad to know you liked the courteous service provided by our associates and had a pleasant time with us. We hope to see you again so we can serve you even better.  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: They are convenient to Disney, you can walk in less than 20 mins. Clean and roomy and pleasant management. There is a Dennys and Coco's within walking distance, also close to Anaheim convention center.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your comments. We are always delighted to receive positive feedback regarding our staff; thank you for your kind words. It is also good to hear that the location of our hotel suited you so well. We appreciate your review, and we hope to have the opportunity to host you again before long.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: It is a wonderful place to stay. Discovery Inn is walking distance to Disneyland which allows us to be at the park till closing then walk back to the hotel to sleep. Then get up,get ready and head back without having to deal with traffic.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are very pleased that our property suited your needs so well, and that you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to welcome you back for another great stay the next time you're in the area!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Outstanding, friendly staff (minor language barrier with cleaning staff) and great location within walking distance to Disneyland.  Denny's restaurant perk with room.  Hotel was very clean.  Pool was a little bit small, but clean.
Manager Response: Dear Teri, We are very happy that everything was to your liking, and that you appreciated our value and affordability. We look forward to welcoming you back again, in the not too distant future.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: This is my 5th year staying at this location and i have yet to experience any kind of problems. The hotel manager Nitesh and his wife Maribel are very friendly people as i got to chat with them during my stay there, i did have a small problem but it was taken care of quickly. The rooms are very comfortable and since i am there on my own, i find it very spacious. I  will always be a guest at this hotel and since i am there very frequent i am able to check-in early and i would highly recommend this hotel which is very close to Disneyland and has a lot of eating places very close in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Walter, We love seeing that we were able to provide you with a good experience. Our goal is to provide every guest with an exceptional stay. We look forward to your next stay!    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Nice place to stay.   Rooms were clean and well kept.   Very accessible to the surrounding things to do.  The price was also the lowest I could find.  So well worth the summer priceing!!!  Thank you for the hospitality!!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are known for the excellent value that we offer in this location, and we appreciate your acknowledgment of this. It sounds as if our property was suitable for your stay in this area, and if you have similar accommodation requirements here again, we hope that you will choose to stay with us again. Thank you for your review.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: A decent place to spend the night, where you can leave the car parked and walk to Disneyland. Weather's great too. Friendly, helpful service and discounts to nearby eateries included. Here are seventeen more characters.
Manager Response: Hi Barry, Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us - we always appreciate feedback from our guests. We are pleased to have hosted you so successfully on this occasion, and we hope to do so again if you have another opportunity to visit Disneyland.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: The property was clean and in decent condition. The rooms are basic with no frills but, served us well. Very close to the park entrance and only took about 10 minutes to make the walk to the gate. Definitely would book there again.
Manager Response: Dear Brian, Thank you for your feedback; we are pleased to have provided you with suitable accommodation, and a great stay. We are pleased to note that you would stay with us again, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back very soon!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Great value; across street from Disney parks!
Summary: This is an incredible find! Located right across the street from Disney's California Adventure, this small hotel offers newly renovated, clean and comfortable rooms for a remarkably low price. The management is friendly and eager to please. Rooms are equipped with a flat screen tv, fridge and microwave. There is a 24-hour family restaurant three doors down, Garden Walk shopping/dining center and convention center only two blocks down.  NOTE: We booked this hotel over a year ago, and were able to lock in a nightly rate of less than $75 for a week. With Disney attractions literally across the street, we can come and go easily. I highly recommend this property and the personalized attention it offers.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for sharing about your time with us. We appreciate your rating and comments and are glad you enjoyed our hotel. We take pride in providing our guests with everything they need for a great stay. We look forward to your next visit.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: This is our go-to place to stay when we go to Disneyland.  The staff are super friendly and this place has everything we need for our trips.  Close to the parks (about a 10min walk).  It not super fancy but has what we need for a comfortable stay.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  It was a pleasure having you as our guest. We strive daily to please our guests and your feedback tells us we are meeting those goals. Thanks again for taking the time to share your positive rating, and we look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Annual Disney trip - I like this spot because It’s close to the downtown Disney entrance and each time I’ve stayed here-I’ve gotten an early check in around 10 AM.  Super friendly staff and the room is always very clean. I keep a do not disturb on my door throughout my stay but I’m sure the stayover service is just as great!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for rating your recent stay with us; we are so pleased that you enjoyed your time here so much. We love hearing back from returning guests as it makes us feel like we are doing something right! We will make sure to pass on your feedback to our team; they will be delighted that they were able to add to your stay. We hope to welcome you back soon!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Quaint, clean, affordable, and great location!
Summary: Older resort that’s been updated. Super cute. Clean. Great location. Can walk to either parks or convention center. Also close to ART bus stop. Fridge and microwave in room. Was surprised with a 2-room suite, so we had lots of room. Toiletry amenities include shampoo, body wash, lotion, and soap. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Jenny, We're glad that you enjoyed your stay here and had a good time! We would love to welcome you back again and again!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Practically on Disneyland Property at Half the Price of Other Area Hotels!
Summary: Being on the corner of Disneyland Drive and Katella Drive, you can literally see Disney's Incredicoaster from this hotel, and it only took me about ten minutes to walk to the security line at Downtown Disney.  This hotel is more than adequate to meet your sleeping needs if you are in town to do Disneyland all day every day, which I did.  It was clean and comfortable and had a refrigerator.  No frills or extras - just a clean room and decent bed for half the price of a room nearly anywhere else in the area.
Manager Response: What a lovely review. We are pleased to have provided you with a place to stay that was ideal for your needs, and we appreciate your feedback. We hope to welcome you back for another wonderful stay in the near future.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: We stayed for a week at the Anaheim Discovery Inn and Suites while we toured L.A., Disneyland, Universal and all things in between. The rooms are clean and well kept. The rooms have a smaller separate room for kids (we are a family of three) of two groups of adults, and the owner is lovely. Anytime we needed information, recommendations, or an extra towel he was right there!   The inn is about a 10-15 minute walk to downtown Disney which eliminates the need for shuttles and makes it easy to leave the park for a few hours for lunch/a swim or whatever you need. We would recommend a stay here to anyone.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   We would like to thank you for taking the time to complete our online survey. Feedback from our guests is very important to us and your input helps with our continuing efforts to provide excellent service and a great stay. Thank you so much for your business and we look forward to seeing you in the future.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: About as close as you can get to downtown Disney without paying a Disney resort price. Very clean and room was pretty nice. We could even see some of the Disneyland fireworks from our room. Would stay here again. The pool was small, but we were too tired to use it anyway.
Manager Response: Dear Tracy, Thank you for your very kind feedback and for taking the time to share it. We are always thrilled to receive positive comments such as yours. We very much look forward to welcoming you back for your next visit.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Hotel is within walking  distance to Disneyland attractions. Good value for the cost. Fast efficient check in process. Staff was friendly and knowledgeable. Free parking And morning coffee but no Breakfast
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are very happy that everything was to your liking, and that you appreciated our value and affordability. We look forward to welcoming you back again, in the not too distant future.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: We have stayed here several times and we recommend it our friends and family.  Easy walk to Disneyland!  Nitesh(owner) is always friendly and accommodating.  The newly renovated rooms with the laminate floors is a nice touch.
Manager Response: Dear Diane,   We are thrilled with your feedback and to know that you enjoyed your time with us so much. We appreciate your recommendation, and we hope to welcome you back very soon.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Stayed here may of 2019. Just 4 nights. Got a great price! We stayed in one of the ADA rooms, it was very spacious! Bathroom was huge. Was able to park our double stroller in the room without having to collapse it down, which was great after a long Disney day with the kids. Wish there was one more light over the closet area as that part is very dark. Staff was friendly, took a few minutes to get someone at the front desk when we got there. Our room was still being cleaned when we got there but they let us put our luggage in the room and get changed and what not so we could head off to Disney! We thought the beds and pillows were rock hard. But what hotel beds are comfortable. We have never stayed at that side of Disneyland before usually we stay on harbor, but the price we got
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We would like to thank you for taking the time to complete our online survey. Feedback from our guests is very important to us and your input helps with our continuing efforts to provide excellent service and a great stay. Thank you so much for your business and we look forward to seeing you in the future.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Great place to stay. Clean room and conviniently close to everything.  We where able to walk to downtown Disney. The front desk staff was very helpfull and polite. All in all a great value, definitely will come back when on vacation.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are known for the excellent value that we offer in this location, and we appreciate your acknowledgment of this. Summary Heading: No Frills But comfortable for Disney
Summary: I stayed here with my son for a trip to Disneyland. The hotel has comfortable beds, and they were able to store our luggage when we got there early to start our day at the parks. Our room wasn’t ready, but they have 24 hour front desk service, which was convenient since we didn’t finish the day till very late in the evening. Convenient location in short walk to the parks.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We were glad to hear that your stay with us was to your satisfaction. We enjoyed being your host and would love to do so again, if your travels bring you back to the area.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Booking said there was a shuttle from the airport.  When we repeatedly called for info- they said we would receive ity via email.  The day of the trip, we finally were told that its a third party service that has to be scheduled and paid for two days ahead of the trip.   Also, when we arrived to check in, no one was there.  We called- no one answered.  We had to find another hotel late at night.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We're very sorry and absolutely shocked that you appear to have had such a bad experience. This isn't the usual feedback that we get and not the common experience that our guests have. Thank you for your comments - we will investigate and ensure that action is taken for improvement purposes. We would love to welcome you back, to impress you with our service, when you are next visiting the area.      Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: I loved it here. My partner and I stayed 17 nights. Great location (less than 20 minute walk to Disneyland front gate and about 10 minutes from Downtown Disney), great price, clean and nice, and great hospitable and friendly staff. I definitely plan on returning.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for your comments. We are so pleased that you found our hotel to be a nice place to stay. We are also glad that our hotel impressed you enough that you would stay with us again. We enjoy providing a great experience for all kinds of travelers, and we are very pleased that you enjoyed being with us at our hotel. We’ll be here for you in the future if you visit the area again, as we always strive to maintain a great experience for guests like you.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Stayed 5 nights in a clean and comfortable room. We didn’t need it, but it had a separate room attached with a bunk bed in it so it would be great for a family. When we return to Disneyland and bring our kids we would definitely stay here again. Waking distance from downtown Disney and many restaurants.
Manager Response: Dear Stefnie, We're glad that you enjoyed your stay here and had a good time! We would love to welcome you back again and again!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: This hotel does what it says in the tin. It’s clean, quite, has parking and I so close to Disney. Improvements I would make- safety deposit boxes and better hairdryer. But when it comes to going to Disney it is ideal.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for your nice feedback. We are glad to know you liked our convenient location. We look forward to delivering you another exceptional experience.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: I'm usually not a motel person but this place changed my view. The check-in was fast, and easy. The front desk person was nice and friendly. He wasn't bother at the fact that we checked in late (around 9:30-10:00 pm). He was very patient and at no time did he rush us. Now on to the room, we stayed in Room 109. When we first walked in, the room felt muggy (the A/C was off). After we turned on the A/C, the room was comfortable. The room was clean (like spotless). The bathroom was spotless. The room came with a mini cooler, and a microwave. The closet space was huge (big enough to fit a small airbed). The bed could be a little more comfortable. Parking was not an issue. Throrughout the entire time there, I felt safe, even at night. The hotel is literally across the street from

We enjoy providing a great experience for all kinds of travelers, and we are very pleased that you enjoyed being with us at our hotel. We’ll be here for you in the future if you visit the area again.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Fantastic place to stay. Reasonable rates, walking distance to everything you need. The staff is great. They care about you and your needs. Most places treat you nice because they need to, here they they are courteous and nice because they care. The rooms are clean and well maintained and quiet. The bed was very comfortable. I definitely recomend them and will use them the next time I'm in town.

We are pleased to note that you would stay with us again, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back very soon!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: The location is excellent, but the rest is not enough. Rooms are poorly equipped, no heating in the pool. Denny's doesn't work. The room was nicely cleaned. There was no coffee maker, and the office opened late.
Manager Response: Dear John, We are very sorry to hear that you didn't love your recent stay with us. Summary: I absolutely love this hotel. You get what you paid for and then some. The rooms are cleaned very well, they are very spacious. The staff is excellent! I will definitely be staying here next trip to Disneyland..😊
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  To see that we were able to provide our guest with such a wonderful experience is the highest compliment we can receive. Thank you so much for sharing!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Very nicely updated rooms with air conditioner, fridge, microwave, and nice toiletries. Easy late check in. Breakfast coupons a good touch. Good view of Disney fireworks from parking lot. Great deal, would stay again
Manager Response: Dear Jannette,   Many thanks for your positive rating and comments  – we are delighted that you enjoyed your time at our property so much. We hope to host you again successfully in the near future.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Me and my family enjoyed are stay it was a nice hotel. Everything is so near and it’s just a 12 minute walk to the park. Also there is a shuttle that takes you back and fourth form the park to the hotel. We will be sure staying at this hotel again for are next visit.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My family and I felt very welcome here at this hotel.  We arrived earlier than check in time and the young woman at the desk made it possible for us to check in early.  Everyone there was very friendly and helpful.  Rooms are very clean and very cozy.  It is located a short walk to Disneyland and Downtown Disney as well as restaurants.  We will be sure to return here in the future. Thank you Discovery Days Inn!!!!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,    Thank you for your feedback; we are pleased to have provided you with suitable, comfortable, clean accommodation, and a great stay. We are pleased to note that you would stay with us again, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back very soon!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: A nice place close to Disneyland
Summary: I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of this hotel. The real treat was the entire staff. They went above and beyond to make sure we were happy! They allowed us early check in and provided a place to store our bags while we left to eat lunch in order to kill some time. You can tell they are really working on sprucing things up. They were painting the lobby when we arrived and there was cute Disney artwork in the room. I would stay again!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,    Thanks for your comments. We are so pleased that you found our hotel to be a nice place to stay. Summary: Great hotel, very clean and tidy. Very friendly and helpful staff. Close to Disneyland and places to eat, but out of the centre of town. No laundry facilities but a very clean laundromat within walking distance. Thoroughly enjoyed our stay.
Manager Response: Dear Bronwyn,   We would like to thank you for taking the time to complete our online survey. Thank you so much for your business and we look forward to seeing you in the future.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: So close to Disney for a fraction of the cost of a resort
Summary: So close to Disney for a fraction of the cost of a resort. Great for families. We will definitely be back in the future. Wish it has breakfast included but the discount at Denny's is great and it's all so close together
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you so much for your kind words about our hotel. I'm very happy to hear that we met your need so well. I'm glad that our location close to Disney was suitable for you. Nothing is more important to us than a pleasant guest experience. We look forward to having you with us again soon.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Friendly staff and great location to Disneyland.
Summary: We had a great stay at this hotel. We got a really good price for our 14 nights stay. The manager was very friendly and accommodating. The location to Disneyland was very good, only a 15 minutes walk to downtown Disney. The room was comfortable, with god beds and clean sheets. It had a little fridge and a microwave. Coffee and tea was served every morning at the front desk. There were a lot of restaurants and stores in walking distance to the hotel. We would have no reservations of booking this hotel again for our next vacation to Anaheim and Disney
Manager Response: Dear Guest,    Thank you for your very kind feedback and for taking the time to share it. We are always thrilled to receive positive comments such as yours. We very much look forward to welcoming you back for your next visit.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: We were staying for 4 nights and found the hotel to be in a great position for food outlets, buses and only a 10 minute walk to Downtown Disney. Room was good size ,beds comfortable, clean, large bathroom, safe, tea making facilities. Plenty of room for suitcases.  Staff were friendly and helpful. Great value for money.
Manager Response: Dear Pauline,   We are known for the excellent value that we offer in this location, and we appreciate your acknowledgment of this. It sounds as if our property was suitable for your stay in this area, and if you have similar accommodation requirements here again, we hope that you will choose to stay with us again. Thank you for your review.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: I visit Disneyland at least once a month and can’t always afford to stay in the greatest of properties.  They give AP discounts and was given his personal email to contact them for my next stay.  It was minutes away from the gates. Walking back was quicker than taking a shuttle or Lyft! Will definitely stay here again
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review, which we greatly appreciate. We are very happy to know that you enjoyed all aspects of your stay with us, and that you would choose to stay at our property again in the future. We hope to welcome you back before long!  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Great location and comfortable accommodations in the Disneyland Resort area's typically less crowded West side. Easy walking distance to the security check point at Downtown Disney. Clean rooms and friendly staff.
Manager Response: It sounds as if our hotel and its facilities was ideal for your needs, and we appreciate your feedback, thank you. We hope that you will return to stay at our hotel when you make a return trip to Disneyland!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: I was in Anaheim for  a dental convention .  I have never stayed at the discovery in prior to my visit .  I was a little nervous because it was a small hotel .  But upon entering,  my  concerns  disappeared .  I was greeted at the front desk  buy a gentleman with a huge smile . During my stay there ,  I met two other  people that worked for the hotel .  All of the staff there were very friendly. Check-in was very quick. And my stay there was pleasant. I would definitely go back.
Manager Response: Hi Casandra,   Thank you very much for taking the time to review our hotel. I'm happy to read our staff was helpful and I hope you join us again soon!    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Great place to stay, very close to Disneyland. Just a nice walk. Convenient. Close by food and markets. People are really nice. Rooms are clean Enough. Good size. Has the necessities.AC works, beds are good enough, shower is good enough, bathroom is a good size. Really just a good enough place to put your stuff at and go to Disneyland for the rest of the day. It is still comfortable, so that is a bonus
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback; we are pleased that you had a good stay with us. We appreciate the fact that you chose our hotel for your stay here, and we hope to welcome you back when you are next in town.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: I stayed here for 3 nights in May 2019, during a solo trip to the Disneyland Resort.    It took 5 minutes to walk to the Paradise Pier Hotel, under 5 more minutes to Downtown Disney, and then another 5 to to get in the park.  The security checkpoint for the Resort on that side (where Downtown Disney meets the Disneyland Hotel) is habitually the least crowded, so that's a bonus!  I was happy with the location of the Discovery Inn, in that coming back there for a refresh wasn't too hard.  I don't think I would have wanted to have to walk any further, though.    The rooms look like they have been and are going through a remodel, and I was happy with my room.  Small microwave and a rectangle 'dorm size' fridge were very handy.  Laminate floor felt very clean.  Bed was comfortable (a
Manager Response: Hi Suzanne,   It is always a pleasure to receive such a wonderfully detailed review! Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback of your visit with the online community. We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us and thank you for the generous compliments. We look forward to your swift return to Anaheim and thank you again for staying with us.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Great location to walk to Disneyland.  Great staff.  Too bad the pool wasn't heated as our group of 6 had brought bathing suits but weren't able to go in the pool wasn't warm enough.  Bed was very comfortable.
Manager Response: Hi Bert,   Thank you for your review and your perfect rating! We were very pleased to host you during your extended stay - thank you for choosing our hotel. We are happy to know that you enjoyed such a great stay with us, and we hope to be your hotel of choice for future visits here!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Okay if you got a good deal.
Summary: The boyfriend and I affectionately called this place the Bates motel haha. We had room 101 (right next to the room where they keep all the spare sheets, and the laundry machines are in there). The room smelled clean upon first entering, the furniture had to be at least 100 years old (very antique). The bed was comfy enough and the sheets were immaculately clean. We only really needed the room for sleeping and showering so it was okay. Showering felt gross... very old and kinda yucky feeling. Took a long time for hot water to heat up. Quite the hike from the park entrance... you have to trek all the way through downtown Disney. The last hotel we stayed at was on the opposite side and was a much shorter walk to the park entrance. Wouldn’t stay in this area again, although we got
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed feedback which is likely to be very useful for anyone considering staying with us. We are pleased that your stay was successful, and that you had a good time during your visit. We are also pleased that the attractive rates that we offer appealed to you so much. We hope that you will have another opportunity to visit our hotel soon.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Low price but there are drawbacks
Summary: The room was a great size and the bed was extremely comfortable. Everything was clean but the furniture was worn. There was NO water pressure in the bathroom sink, barely a dribble. The tub could not be plugged and used as a tub as it was (or used to be a Jacuzzi and no longer worked) and so it was shower only. This is a huge negative in my opinion as I like to soak in a hot bath after days of walking around amusement parks.
