Additionally, once the in room air conditioning unit was turned on there was a very strange smell we could not get rid of. If those minor issues were taken care of I would consider staying again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your stay at our hotel. We appreciate you pointing out all of the key aspects of your stay. We are known for the excellent value that we offer in this location, and we appreciate your acknowledgment of this, thank you. We are looking forward to your next visit and hope you are planning for it very soon.     Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: First time in a motel and wasn’t sure what to expect.....it’s just like you see on the films 😊 Excellent location for Disney which was our reason for staying with restaurants nearby. Rooms were large and spotless complete with fridge and microwave. Beds comfy and toiletries in bathroom. Came back from first day at Disney and rooms all cleaned again. Coffee available from reception on a morning too.  Very impressed and highly recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful feedback, it is always lovely to read positive comments about our guests' stays. It was our pleasure to host you, and we hope to do so again very soon. We sincerely appreciate your recommendation, thank you!  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Awesome location and nice clean place
Summary: This place was in a great location with wonderful staff and clean rooms. The price point was reasonable and my daughter had a blast. We will definitely stay here again next time we come to town. We are thankful to have found this gem
Manager Response: Meander266153, thanks for joining us! We hope you make it back again soon.  Best,  Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites Team

Summary: The staff were wonderful. The room was clean and quiet with comfortable beds. It's an easy 15 minute walk to Disneyland through Downtown Disney. It was perfect for a family trip. Nothing fancy but comfortable and felt safe, definitely value for the price. I will stay here again.
Manager Response: Hi there, thank you for staying with us, we pride ourselves on providing our guest with a clean, comfortable and safe place to stay while they are in town. We really appreciate you noticing our efforts:) This means alot to us. Thank you for the positive review. We look forward to welcoming you back again next time you visit the area.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: If all your looking is a place to sleep right next to the park.  This place can’t be beat.  Super convenient and low key. You get what you pay for...Management was super friendly and informative.  Thanks for a great trip!
Manager Response: TahoeCdub, thanks for taking a moment to leave this recommendation! Hoping you'll be back our way.  Best,  Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites Team

Summary: We have just spent 7 weeks travelling and would have to day Jay was the most fantastic host we met in that time! Such a friendly helpful man. He goes above and beyond to make you feel at home. The resort itself is really well located, just a short walk to Disneyland or you can catch the shuttle. Lots of restaurants nearby, and Jay had helpful suggestions with places to eat and groceries. Loved that the room had a mini fridge and microwave. Basic but very comfortable rooms. We don't have kids, so didn't factor in that all of our neighbours would be up early with excitable loud children, but that was no fault of the hotel (Just good to keep in mind that a sleep in may not happen) Very quiet at night though. Thanks again Jay
Manager Response: EmNDan, we're grateful for you taking a moment to leave this review! Don't hesitate to reach out if there's anything else we can do.  Best,  Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites Team

Summary: Me and my boyfriend stayed here for our Disneyland trip. The staff was amazing and management was excellent. I had foot surgery and couldn’t do stairs so when I called to see if I could get a downstairs room, the manger offered us an accessible room. It was really helpful to have a larger room and the grab bars in the room helped a lot. Also the room was big enough to store my motor scooter. We’re already looking for rates to book again!
Manager Response: We love to hear feedback like this! Thank you so much for your support -- if you need anything else, don't hesitate to reach out!  Best, Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites Team

Summary: My family and I come to Disneyland one to two times a year and we always choose to stay here.  The owner is very accommodating and makes sure that everything during our stay meets our needs.    The rooms are always spotless and the staff is very friendly.  They remembered us from previous trips and it makes us feel more welcome.  Plus there are great restaurants right down the road and we are only a 15 minute walk from Disneyland.    We love staying here and will continue to do so.   Thanks for making our Disney vacation great! !
Manager Response: Feedback like this is fantastic to hear! Thank you so much for making us your go-to getaway stay -- we can't wait to see you back soon!  Best,  Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites Team

Summary: Stayed in a nice large room with my son & his family with plenty of space. Bed was very comfortable and the room was nicely decorated. Very accommodating staff. Close walk to Disneyland. I would definitely recommend staying here.  Can’t wait to come back again!
Manager Response: Krissy, feedback like this is fantastic to hear! I;m happy to hear the room you and your family shared was spacious and the ambiance was just to your tastes. We can't wait to see you again!  Best,  Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites Team

Summary: We have stayed here twice now and will every time we come! We recommend it to family and this is where they come to stay too! Great rooms, great prices, and very clean and friendly staff! Close walk to Disneyland, and with close restaurants to eat at. I would recommend this hotel to anyone! Nitesh does a great job with remembering us from our previous trips as well as family that has stayed too!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful feedback! Our team is here to make you feel right at home -- once you stay here, you're our family, too! We can't wait to see you guys again!  Best,  Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites Team

Summary: Great place to stay that is close all amenities. Close to Disney and Convention Center  I had a enjoyable stay and keep coming back every year Small clean friendly place to stay I strongly recommend that wants to stay close to everything
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to host you, and we are delighted to read your feedback and to know that you enjoyed your time with us so much. We look forward to welcoming you back! Thank you for your recommendation!  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: great value and extremely clean room close to Disney and walking distance to many restaurants. Love the charging ports next to both sides of the comfortable king size beds. Room has fridge and microwave. will stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback; we are pleased to have provided you with suitable accommodation and a great stay. We are pleased to note that you would stay with us again, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back very soon.     Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: The room was nice and updated. It was great having USB ports to charge all our electronic devices without needing electrical plugs. The hotel was only a short walk to downtown Disney which saved us needing to drive there and pay for parking.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback; we are pleased that you had a good stay with us. We appreciate the fact that you chose our hotel for your stay here, and we hope to welcome you back when you are next in the area.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Location is the best, walk-able and saves parking charges if one is willing to spend whole lot of the time in Disney Parks. Convenient to hop on to I5 North and South and has good restaurants around just a block or two away.
Manager Response: Dear guest, we are delighted to have provided you with suitable accommodation for your trip here. We appreciate your kind rating, and we hope to welcome you back again before long.

Summary: A close safe walk from down town Disney. The room is decent and was comfortable for our needs. The front desk staff is awesome! The room was clean, however the water gets very hot so be careful. There is coffee served in the morning
Manager Response: Dear guest, we are delighted to have provided you with suitable accommodation for your trip here. We appreciate your kind rating, and we hope to welcome you back again before long.

Summary: Great place to stay if you are going to Disneyland, but are trying to not give all your money away to big corporations. This little gem has cathedral ceilings in the single floor rooms, which made the good sized space seem even larger. It has nice decor, some of the furniture shows a bit of wear, but not enough to want to pay double or more at some of the other hotels on the street. There are several eateries within 3 minutes of walking. Some of the other hotels charge a parking fee, not this one. Jay, the desk man, really was the topping on cake. He helped us with making last minute changes on our reservations and was just enjoyable to chat with in the morning over coffee.
Manager Response: Thanks for staying with us! It's great to hear we could make your Disney trip even more magical. And we're happy to see Jay was such a big help to you. If you're ever in the area again, we hope you'll be back to see us.  Take care, Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites Team

Summary: I’ve been coming to Anaheim for the past 20 years or so to a big Music Exhibition (NAMM Show) After the general price increase I stopped using the official hotel at the so-called corporate rates and was looking for something more sensible price-wise.   This place is just opposite Disneyland and a block away from the rear entrance to the Conference centre. It was taken over by a young Indian family just few years ago and every year I can see the great improvements. The owner is really caring for his property and year-by-year it is getting better - still for the some rates (so far:) As I’ve already written in the previous review - If you do not need to stay in Hilton to be happy so this place is definitely for you. For me is doing great for the past several years..
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing such gracious remarks and for staying with us! We'd love to have you back soon.  Thank You, Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites at the Park

Summary: The room was somewhat updated which was nice, wood floors seem so much cleaner than hotel carpet. Everything was clean and the check in guy was very friendly. Parking was free which is a big bonus. Only real downsides were the bed was pretty uncomfortable, the ac/heater was very noisy and I actually ran out of hot water in the shower (short shower too...) 🤔overall though it was great for the price!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us recently, and for taking the time to leave your review. We are happy to hear that you felt that the accommodation that we provide is appropriate for the price that we charge; thank you for your comments. We are happy that you enjoyed your time with us so much, and we hope to welcome you back many more times in the future.      Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Clean room, great staff, but minimal conveniences
Summary: Very helpful staff. Very clean room. But spartan accommodations. Only one chair - straight back and creaky. Garish lighting. Tiny desk. TV with minimal channel selection. A convenient location to park and convention center, but just not the level of comfort and accommodation I was looking for.
Manager Response: We are happy that you had an enjoyable stay with us. We love guests commenting on our cleanliness - we pride ourselves on providing a clean comfortable room for all of our guests. We're also happy to hear that you found our staff to be their usual helpful selves. We hope that you will stay with us again the next time you need a room in the area.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Really noisy (room doors open to the middle of the parking lot), unhelpful staff. Location is great but that's about it, you're much better of being a bit further away and then getting a cab to go to Anaheim convention center.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are sorry to read your review of our hotel. While it is somewhat discouraging, feedback such as yours helps us to improve upon our service. We will take all of your observations in relation to our property and attempt to make several improvements for the enjoyment of our future guests. Thank you for your feedback. We really appreciate it and hope we will have the opportunity to host you more successfully in the future.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Great hotel for the price with super friendly and helpful staff
Summary: Great hotel for the price and location. Very close to Disneyland resort - approx 20 minute walk from the park to the hotel (sounds long but it’s because you can’t cut through the park and Downtown Disney). Staff was very friendly and helpful. Would absolutely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your feedback; we are pleased to have provided you with suitable, comfortable accommodation, and a great stay. We are pleased to note that you would stay with us again, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back very soon!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: The only reason I don’t give it a “5” is because we visited in January and the heater kept coming on in the night and waking us up. The room was perfect for a family and very affordable. I wish I had brought food to use in the microwave since there was both a microwave and refrigerator.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, It was a pleasure having you as our guest. We strive daily to please our guests and your feedback tells us we are meeting those goals. Thanks again for taking the time to share your positive rating, and we look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Booked 2 rooms for my family and out of state guests. Both rooms were nice and clean. Within walking distance of all things Disney. Easy parking spaces and friendly staff. Great value, would highly recommend.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We are thrilled with your feedback and to know that you enjoyed your time with us so much. We appreciate your recommendation, and we hope to welcome you back very soon.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: We were at the convention center for a sporting event.  It was close and I felt comfortable walking around.  We ate at Denny’s with the discount from the hotel and walked to Downtown Disney.  The staff was nice and parking was better than most places around Disney.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for your sharing such a great feedback. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed all your experiences. We all look forward to welcoming you back "home" soon   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: This place was awesome very close to Disneyland like 10 min walk to the park and 5 min to downtown Disney. Staff was very polite and room very comfortable will definitely try and stay again on my next trip
Manager Response: Dear Sanchez, Thank you for your feedback; we are pleased to have provided you with suitable, comfortable accommodation, and a great stay. We are pleased to note that you would stay with us again, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back very soon!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Where do I begin? So happy to see all the nice changes this hotel has made. This place is a great value, very personable, nice and clean. They have redone the pool, all the rooms, and the exterior. I have timed how long it takes to get to Downtown Disney from this hotel, total of 8 minutes. Dennys and other restaurants are close by. I understand seeing reviews about hotels and being skeptic about how accurate they are. I can tell you that I have a graduate level education and take my family to this hotel often. When you can trust a hotel with your family, that is everything. To my annual passholder family, this is great hotel for us. Check it out. They even have discounts for us.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  It is wonderful hearing back from our satisfied guests and we are glad to hear that you had an awesome stay with us. We would love to welcome you back, when you are next visiting the area.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: The Discovery Inn is truly a great place to discover!
Summary: The Discovery Inn is not situated in the most ideal location, it is ran by the friendliest staff. The rooms are always clean and I will always be a returning customer. I admire the quality of customer service!
Manager Response: Dear Elias, Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts on your recent stay with us. We are delighted to learn that your stay was a thoroughly enjoyable experience. It was wonderful to read your comments about our staff and rest assured that we will share your feedback with them and the rest of the team who take great pride in ensuring each guest has a memorable stay.     Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: This was the 4th year that i have stayed at this hotel and have yet to have any problems there. This trip i arrived earlier than i usually do but the hotel manager knew i would already and when i arrived there at 10 AM they had a room ready for me. I like this hotel as it is very close to everything and is only a 10 minute walk to Disneyland which comes in handy. I will always stay at this hotel in my future visits as i do come from Oklahoma.
Manager Response: Dear Walter, Thank you for your feedback; we are pleased to have provided you with suitable, comfortable accommodation, and a great stay. We are pleased to note that you would stay with us again, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back very soon!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: My husband, almost 5 year old son, and I stayed at Discovery Inn from Dec 26-30. We had a fabulous stay. The room was a perfect size, with a large bathroom, soap, shampoo, cream, shower gel, etc. Room was clean and beds were quite comfy. The fridge was great for the groceries we ordered online before we got there. The parks were easy to get to everyday (we went through downtown Disney) and I felt quite safe. I highly recommend this hotel and will stay there again on our next Disney adventure!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for your comments. We are so pleased that you would recommend this property and that you found our hotel to be a nice place to stay. We are also glad that our hotel impressed you enough that you would stay with us again. We enjoy providing a great experience for all kinds of travelers, and we are very pleased that you enjoyed being with us at our hotel. We’ll be here for you in the future if you visit the area again, and we always strive to maintain a great experience for our guests like you.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Convenient Location. Room needed some repairs.
Summary: PROS: Excellent location. Only a 14 minute walk to the security and bag check at Downtown Disney. Friendly staff upon arrival. The room had a laminate floor (no carpet) which greatly helped with the cleanliness of the room. Plenty of wall outlets and a refrigerator were appreciated. Plenty of parking.   CONS: Room in need of some attention/repair. The bathroom door would not close. The bathroom shower head was not working properly. The front door would stick upon entry so you had to hit/push it with your shoulder to open the door. The thermostat on the heating unit did not work. These are all minor things that could easily be repaired to make the next visitors stay a bit more pleasant.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Our maintenance teams have been alerted to your comments and they will ensure that the issues highlighted will be addressed. We hope that you will give us another chance to impress you during your next visit to this area.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: For the price and given its proximity to Disneyland, it was good. The Internet dropped out a lot, the shower was either boiling hot or freezing cold but we paid way less than other places around so I must say, for the price, it was fine. I would pay $50 more per night next time and stay somewhere else but like I said, for what we paid, it was fine
Manager Response: Dear Kez, We are very sorry to hear that you didn't love your recent stay with us. Our management team have been alerted to your comments about our property and they will ensure that improvements occur as a result. We hope that you will give us another chance to impress you during your next visit to this area.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: We arrived much later than planned for check-in and greatly appreciated them accommodating us so late at night as well as letting me leave my vehicle there both days while playing at Disneyland. It's a quick walk to the park as well. Everything was easy, so it helped us to relax and enjoy ourselves more.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  It was a pleasure having you as our guest. We strive daily to please our guests and your feedback tells us we are meeting those goals. Thanks again for taking the time to share your perfect rating, and we look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Fabulous location and prices.  Restaurants and Shops close by.  Easy walk to downtown Disney.  Staff helpful and kind.  No frills place, well maintained, clean, quiet.  Discounts to nearby restaurants.  Would stay here again and again and again.
Manager Response: Dear Jim, Thank you for your feedback; we are pleased to have provided you with suitable, comfortable, clean accommodation, and a great stay. We are pleased to note that you would stay with us again, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back very soon!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Great place to stay if you are on a budget. discount at Dennys, pool and friendly service. About a 20 minute walk to the Dineyland Park, Coffee and toast available in the lobby of the hotel.  ATM and  soda machine on site.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thanks for all the great compliments. We are so glad you enjoyed our property. Please come back and stay with us again soon - we'll be waiting!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: I was thoroughly impressed from beginning to end with our stay at Anaheim Discovery Inn and Suites! As soon as we checked in the front staff lady was super friendly and helpful, and when we entered our room we were pleased to see it appears to be newly renovated. Beds were comfortable which is a bonus, and rooms were meticulously cleaned each day by the cleaning staff! Great location to Disneyland, about a 10-15 minute walk or a 7$ Uber/lyft ride. Highly recommend this hotel for the price and the atomosphere. You also have a great view of the nightly fireworks!
Manager Response: Dear Chelsea, We are very pleased that our property suited your needs so well, and that you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to welcome you back for another great stay the next time you're in town!   We appreciate your recommendation!  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Small, not fancy but super clean and a great price. Perfect for our week long Disneyland/LA trip. Came back everyday to a made bed and new towels and cleaned room. Pool and pool area clean too. Close to many restaurants and amenities and on the main Katella strip. 10 min walk to downtown Disney. Great value. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We are thrilled with your feedback and to know that you enjoyed your time with us so much. We appreciate your recommendation, and we hope to welcome you back very soon.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: ntiallyas the worst hotel experience I've ever had in my life, no exaggeration. I'm well aware that check-in is not until 2 but because we got into town early I called (around 11am) to see if we could check in early (this is not an unusual practice in the hotel industry), to which the extremely unprofessional front desk person (who answered the phone with nothing but a confused hello, didn't say his name or the name of the hotel) told me we could check in at 12:30. When we arrived, we were told the room wasn't ready, and to wait until 1:30, then that's when the manager who overheard the conversation while walking by told us, in passing, that we weren't allowed to check in until 2:00… very inhospitable considering we had a tired three year old with us and all of us needed to use
Manager Response: Dear Darien, We appreciate your candid and detailed feedback, many thanks. We are very sorry that so many aspects of your stay disappointed you. We will review in detail all of your comments with our management team, and we will investigate what actions we can take to improve our future guests' experiences with us. Again, we really appreciate your constructive review, and we apologise profusely for all of our failings.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Good, friendly hotel for a Disney stay. Close to Disney with friendly reception and clean rooms.Would stay there again in future Disney trips. Close to several restaurants and possibility to go to the outlets with bus 16.
Manager Response: Dear Yves, It was a pleasure having you as our guest. We strive daily to please our guests and your feedback tells us we are meeting those goals. Thanks again for taking the time to share your perfect rating, and we look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: I enjoyed my stay here in October to enjoy Halloween time at Disney. I have stayed here many times and always look forward to seeing what improvements have been made since my last stay. Since my last stay the floors were redone, rooms had been painted, and new vanity's were placed in the rest rooms. The staff here is always friendly and they always go above and beyond to ensure my experience is a pleasant one. I would recommend this hotel to anyone staying in the area, as an added bonus it is an easy walk to Disney!
Manager Response: Dear Jan, Thank you for rating your recent stay with us; we are so pleased that you enjoyed your time here so much. We love hearing back from returning guests as it makes us feel like we are doing something right! We will make sure to pass on your feedback to our team; they will be delighted that they were able to add to your stay. We hope to welcome you back soon!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: DO NOT STAY HERE! There were bugs in the room, stains on the sheets, a 2 inch gap in the door, the air conditioner was so loud we could not even hear the TV. The shower was not cleaned from the previous guest, I did not walk around barefoot as the ground seemed dirty. The shower temperature did not work, it was either too hot or too cold. We stayed for 4 days and had to shower. This was the worst place I have ever stayed.
Manager Response: Dear Pattie, Thank you for your feedback. Your stay does not sound like the type of stay that we generally provide for our guests, we apologize for all of the issues that you had during your time here. We will review your comments in detail as a team, and we see what changes that we can make in terms of both improving our property and training our staff, to improve our future guests' experiences. Thank you again for your comments, we really appreciate them.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: The room was very nice, clean, and updated. the location is great and is just a short walk to the parks. the service was excellent! the owner was very helpful and took care of our needs. definitely will be staying here again!
Manager Response: Dear Bailey, Thank you for taking the time to review our property following your recent stay. We're glad that you enjoyed your stay here and had a good time! We would love to welcome you back again and again!  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: We visited late September 2018. I would highly recommend staying here. You are close to Disneyland, yet far enough away to get away from the crowds at night. You can view the fireworks from the pool which we all loved. They have small suites available which were great. We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Madison, Thanks for your comments. We are so pleased that you would recommend this property and that you found our hotel to be a nice place to stay. We are also glad that our hotel impressed you enough that you would stay with us again. We enjoy providing a great experience for all kinds of travelers, and we are very pleased that you enjoyed being with us at our hotel. We’ll be here for you in the future if you visit the area again, and we always strive to maintain a great experience for our guests like you.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Great location to fun parks, shops and restaurants.  Walking distance to Disneyland, Bubba Gumps, California Adventure World etc.Great service at reception and very helpful and friendly family who own the business.
Manager Response: Dear Tasha, Thank you so much for your nice feedback. We are glad to know you liked our convenient location and that the attentive service provided by our associates added to your joy. We look forward to delivering you another exceptional experience.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Staff was super helpful when we got a flat tire! Rooms were spacious and beautiful with hardwood floors and large closet. Beds were not the most comfortable but great value over all! Walking distance from the park - definitely recommend!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts on your recent stay with us. We are delighted to learn that your stay was a thoroughly enjoyable experience. It was wonderful to read your comments about our staff and rest assured that we will share your feedback with them and the rest of the team who take great pride in ensuring each guest has a memorable stay.     Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: After a long flight and the usual trauma of a "hit the ground running" use of the freeways in a hire car arrival at the discovery inn was welcoming. The reception staff were great and very helpful. The room on the first landing of the courtyard style layout was very spacious, The beds are larger than a UK queen size and very comfortable. The other in room facilities were good with a fridge and microwave. A bedside power point with USB connection. The free WIFI was super fast and a large TV (not used) would be a boon if you traveled to watch TV. the daily housekeeping was good and to my knowledge the bedding and towels, which were plentiful were changed daily. The choice of his hotel was based on its location being close to the Disney attractions was great and was a 20 minute
Manager Response: Dear Martin, We would like to thank you for taking the time to complete our online survey. Feedback from our guests is very important to us and your input helps with our continuing efforts to provide excellent service and a great stay. Thank you so much for your business and we look forward to seeing you in the future.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: This hotel was great for the price, a close walk to Disneyland, and the staff was very friendly. However one of our beds had a large stain on the top sheet which made us questions the cleanliness of the whole room.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Although delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us overall, we were sorry to hear that your room was not prepared properly before your arrival.   Our housekeeping team works hard making sure rooms are prepared well daily, so we are very sorry that you did not find your room clean and well maintained. Please know that we are looking into this to ensure this does not happen again. We hope this won't dissuade you from staying with us again.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Very convenient to all local attractions. All the times I have gone to Disney I have never stayed here. I will make this one of my go to motels now. Walking distance to everything, remodeled rooms, pool.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for sharing about your time with us. We appreciate your rating and are glad you enjoyed our hotel. We take pride in providing our guests with everything they need for a great stay. We look forward to your next visit.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Stayed here for 3 nights while visiting Disneyland. The price was great for the quality of the room. The bathroom was clean, the decor was new and the bed was comfortable. Check in staff were friendly and helpful. Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Michelle, Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and for the excellent rating. We are glad you enjoyed the many amenities that we have to offer and that you found our service to be excellent. Thanks for spending your time with us, and we look forward to welcoming you back.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: This hotel is a pretty good place to stay at . The pool is nice there hotel is some why Disney themed and the room are ok. The room are a little to small for me just re bed an there bathroom is a little small. But walking to the park in little torments what sell me to the hotel. I love stay there.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for sharing about your stay. We appreciate the generous remarks and are glad you enjoyed our hotel. We take pride in providing our guests with everything they need to explore and enjoy the surrounding area! We look forward to your next visit.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: This was the perfect place to stay for our trip to Disneyland. It was a short walk to the park and the hotel was clean and comfortable. The price was right and the service was really great. I would highly recommend staying here.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to review our property following your recent stay. We are thrilled with your feedback and to know that you enjoyed your time with us so much. We appreciate your recommendation, and we hope to welcome you back very soon.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Great Room at a Great Price
Summary: We don’t stay anywhere else. We have been coming to Disneyland for years and our last 6-8 stays have been at Anaheim Discovery Inn. Great price. Clean, newly renovated rooms. Very convenient walking distance to the parks. On top of it all... Jay (the owner) is almost always available and VERY good to us. This is our favorite place to stay!
Manager Response: Dear Nikki, Thank you for rating your recent stay with us; we are so pleased that you enjoyed your time here so much. We love hearing back from returning guests as it makes us feel like we are doing something right! We will make sure to pass on your feedback to our team; they will be delighted that they were able to add to your stay. We hope to welcome you back soon!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: We usually stay at Wyndham Garden so this was quite a shock to see this place. I didn't expect it to be so old and rundown.  Bed was very uncomfortable. I won't stay here again. On the positive side, the man at the front desk was very nice!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We're truly disappointed that you had such a poor impression of our hotel, and we apologize sincerely. We will discuss your review together as a team, and we'll ensure that the necessary procedures and improvements are implemented to ensure that such issues don't arise again. Thank you for your comments, we appreciate them and will use them constructively to improve our hotel.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Wonderful vacation. The room was clean and comfortable. Staff was great, and the location to the parks was great. Affordable and convenient. Close to the parks, shopping, food and transportation routes.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We love seeing that we were able to provide you with a good experience. Our goal is to provide every guest with an exceptional stay. We look forward to your next stay!    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: I chose this hotel for it's proximity to my conference site, for it's rate and because this was the only hotel with no bad reviews that I read. I was not disappointed by anything during my stay, but I know that other travelers might prefer a better breakfast. That would surely increase the room rate and with two good breakfast restaurants very close by, I'm glad to have the lower rate instead of breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We are known for the excellent value that we offer in this location, and we appreciate your acknowledgment of this. It sounds as if our property was suitable for your stay in this area, and if you have similar accommodation requirements here again, we hope that you will choose to stay with us again. Thank you for your review.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Excellent location for walking to the Disney theme parks. The manager was a very friendly guy that was  eager to offer advice about surrounding area. Clean room and comfortable beds. Coffee in the lobby was good. Continental breakfast was pretty much non-existent.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for sharing your time with us. We appreciate your rating and are glad you enjoyed our hotel. We take pride in providing our guests with everything they need for a great stay. We look forward to your next visit.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: The Anaheim Discovery Inn was the perfect, economical place to stay. It started months before our trip when we emailed with J, the owner, and asked lots of questions. He was quick to respond. When we arrived, he welcomed us and answered even more questions. The room was clean, spacious and comfortable. Disney was only a 15 minute walk down Harbor Ave. When we arrived, we took a quick drive to Food 4 Less and stocked up our little fridge. Each morning, J offered small danishes and coffee in the lobby. The pool was small, but just right for a quick dip.
Manager Response: Dear Cathy, Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and for the excellent rating. We are glad you enjoyed the many amenities that we have to offer and that you found our service to be excellent. Thanks for spending your time with us, and we look forward to welcoming you back again and again.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: I absolutely loved my experience at the Discovery Inn & Suites. It is a good location, walking distance from the Disney Parks and Downtown Disney District, as well as multiple restaurants. The room was clean and the staff was friendly. Additionally, our maidservice tucked in all of our plush dolls when they made the beds and I thought it was absolutely precious. This was the cheapest hotel in the area, and made my Disney vacation more affordable. I would absolutely reccomend this hotel to others.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are known for the excellent value that we offer in this location, and we appreciate your acknowledgment of this. It sounds as if our property was suitable for your stay in this area, and if you have similar accommodation requirements here again, we hope that you will choose to stay with us again. Thank you for your review.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Spent 4 nights here. Overall was decent for location. Quite inflated price but I knew this because how close it is to Disneyland. Check in and check out were slightly slow, although not a big issue. Free parking was nice to have. Wish there was an actual breakfast included aside from just coffee. There were a couple cockroaches in the bathroom, but we didn’t say anything until checkout so not sure what their procedure would be. I possibly would stay again if the price was low, but wouldn’t spend anymore than I did for the quality.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are very sorry to hear that your stay was spoiled by the fact that there were cockroaches in your room. Unfortunately, these pests are difficult to keep at bay in our climate, although we do work consistently with a professional pest control company to ensure that they are controlled to the best of our ability. We are very sorry that your stay was impacted to such an extent. We appreciate you choosing to stay with us on this occasion, and we are sorry that we didn't provide you with a better stay. Thank you for your feedback.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: This hotel was close to Disneyland. The housekeeping service was great! The housekeepers were friendly and helpful. The manager of this hotel was amazing!! I witnessed him handling a problem visitor. He very professional and effective! I would definitely stay here again!!
Manager Response: Dear Stacy, We love seeing that we were able to provide you with a good experience. Our goal is to provide every guest with an exceptional stay. We look forward to your next stay!    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Management was very friendly and helpful. Room was clean and quiet both during the day and night when we were sleeping. Beds were comfortable. Shower head was very nice. The room was comfortable with the AC unit, but a table fan helps circulate the air more efficiently.
Manager Response: Dear David, Thanks for all the great compliments. We are so glad you enjoyed your room and our property. Please come back and stay with us again soon - we'll be waiting!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: My husband and I Stayed here for the first time and was extremely pleased with the room and location and convenience. We come to Disneyland often but never stayed at this specific hotel, We will definitely be staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We love seeing that we were able to provide you with a good experience. Our goal is to provide every guest with an exceptional stay. We look forward to your next stay!    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: I have never had a more terrible experience than the one I had at this hotel and with an employee Jay! I know a lot of the other reviews say you pay for what you get but this hotel is not only extremely run down and dirty but the customer service and the way they run the business is down right slimy. I strongly advise to LISTEN to the negative reviews they will save you time, money, feeling completely manipulated, and energy. I could only spend 5 minutes in the room before I had to find another place for myself and two year old daughter!
Manager Response: Dear Lawrence, We're very sorry and absolutely shocked that you appear to have had such a bad experience during your recent stay with us. This isn't the usual feedback that we get and not the common experience that our guests have. Thank you for your comments - we will investigate them further and ensure improvements occur as a result.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: This is a nice little spot. For the money, you can’t beat this location. Beautiful short walk to Downtown Disney. Breakfast options on both sides of the hotel. Clean minimalistic room. Firm mattress, but enjoyable after a day at the park! Definitely will stay here again for the location.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for your kind review. We understand the importance of the details that make up a great stay and are delighted knowing our wonderful location enhanced your visit with us. We look forward to welcoming you back soon on your next trip.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Great location(ideal spot since on main Boulevard adjacent to Disneyland, unless you don't want to hear the nightly Fireworks around 9?) and helpful staff.Separated small 2ndBedroom for the kids.Free parking for 1space, walking distance to DL.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for sharing about your time with us. We appreciate your rating and are glad you enjoyed our hotel. We take pride in providing our guests with everything they need for a great stay. We look forward to your next visit.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: The greatest value with friendly staff
Summary: I highly recommend The Discovery!!! Such a great place to stay. Home away from home! Staff is extremely nice and they make sure you are well taken care of. Along with it’s great location, the Discovery is a must!
Manager Response: Dear Elias, Thank you so much for your nice feedback. We are glad to know you liked our convenient location and that the attentive service provided by our associates added to your joy. We look forward to delivering you another exceptional experience.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Close to Disneyland at a good price.
Summary: We stayed at this hotel with my family in August. The rooms were well priced and we were pretty close to restaurants, the convention center, and Disneyland. I would recommend the Anaheim Discover Inn & Suites as a good inexpensive place to stay for the whole family.
Manager Response: Dear John, We are known for the excellent value that we offer in this location, and we appreciate your acknowledgment of this. It sounds as if our property was suitable for your stay in this area, and if you have similar accommodation requirements here again, we hope that you will choose to stay with us again. Thank you for your review.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: A good trip overall, the man at the front counter was very friendly and even let us check in early. The room smelled good and was very clean. Had two beds so that was a nice surprise if me or my partner needed more space. The beds were a bit hard but since we were not in the room for too long during our trip it was not a huge deal. The t.v was a nice bonus with decent channels. It is a very close walk to Disney which is a great bonus. Housekeeping did not go into the room per our request which was great. Overall, would stay again for another short trip to California.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for the kind comments. We are glad you were able to take advantage of everything our hotel offers, like our comfortable rooms as well as the convenient facilities. It was our pleasure serving you and we hope to welcome you again on your next trip.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Very friendly staff, clean room inside and out! We will be returning! Pool was very clean, staff went out of way so we had clean towels even though we were suppose to bring some from the room. Perfect place close to Disneyland
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for sharing about your time with us. We appreciate your rating and comments are glad you enjoyed our hotel. We take pride in providing our guests with everything they need for a great stay. We look forward to your next visit.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: The owner of the place was amazing and extremely flexible. I appreciated the kindness he shared with me as I had made a mistake in my reservations. He did everything he could to ensure we had an enjoyable stay. It is only a 10 min walk to downtown Disney and a 15 min walk the park as well which is a bonus!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, It was a pleasure reading your review. We have an exceptional team whose top priority is making sure every guest is comfortable and satisfied, so we look forward to sharing your compliments with them. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to this area.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for
Summary: My boyfriend planned a surprise trip to Disneyland and we decided to stay here because it was the cheapest in the area. It’s very close to Disney so you can save on parking. The room wasn’t exactly clean though, there was hair in the shower from the guests that stayed in the room before us. We also found blood stains in the sheets.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Although delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us overall, we were sorry to hear that your room was not prepared properly before your arrival.   Our housekeeping team works hard making sure rooms are prepared well daily, so we are very sorry that you did not find your room clean and well maintained. Please know that we are looking into this to ensure this does not happen again. We hope this won't dissuade you from staying with us again.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: I would recommend to everyone owner was very helpful room was big and clean, restaurants ans convinient store is close by. I would recomment to my friends and family, towels are clean. the owner can arrange the tour abd shuttle etc. complimentary breakfast available
Manager Response: Dear guest, Thank you for rating your recent stay with us; we are so pleased that you enjoyed your time here so much. We love hearing back from guests as it makes us feel like we are doing something right! We will make sure to pass on your feedback to our team; they will be delighted that they were able to add to your stay. We hope to welcome you back soon!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: I will say I wasn’t thrilled about the hotel... but the general Mangaer was AMAZING nicest man! We had a small issue that he came to the rescue for and thank god!! But after that the following morning asked us how was the rest of the night and gave us $50 for breakfast to make up for the small issues and I swear my husband and I have stayed in many five star hotels and have never had anyone care like this man... we would stay there aging just cause of him!! So accommodating and just so caring very hard to find these days!! Thank you!!!
Manager Response: Dear Zsalou, Thank you for taking the time to review our property following your recent stay. It was a pleasure reading your review. We have an exceptional team whose top priority is making sure every guest is comfortable and satisfied, so we look forward to sharing your compliments with them. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to this area.     Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: We stayed here for 7 nights.  It was within walking distance to Disneyland and the convention center.  The rooms were clean, staff were very nice and it was a nice place to get some rest.  The pool was clean.  Our room was upstairs, so the view was nice.  I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Deana, Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and for the excellent rating. We are glad you enjoyed the many amenities that we have to offer and that you found our service to be excellent. Thanks for spending your time with us, and we look forward to welcoming you back.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: This is my 4th year staying at this hotel and i have yet to experience any problems. The hotel manager is very knowledgeable regarding my stays there and since i first stayed at this hotel my room has been upgraded without saying anything. He also books my room a  year in advance since i go out there from Oklahoma twice a year to visit Disneyland. I will continue my visits at this hotel as the rooms are very comfortable and no problem with the wi-fi.
Manager Response: Dear Walter, Thank you for rating your recent stay with us; we are so pleased that you enjoyed your time here so much. We love hearing back from returning guests as it makes us feel like we are doing something right! We will make sure to pass on your feedback to our team; they will be delighted that they were able to add to your stay. We hope to welcome you back soon!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: The staff is always so kind and welcoming and accommodating to people with special need the rooms are clean and roomy and super cute and it’s so close to Disney walking distance for such a great price
Manager Response: Dear Stefanee, We would like to express our gratitude for your kind words. We are always pleased to hear that our guests were impressed with the service as well as the quality of the room features. We  will pass on your comments to the team and we all look forward to welcoming you back again soon.     Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: We stayed here while we visited the DisneyLand parks. This was across the street from the DisneyLand Resort hotel and Paradise Pier. It couldn't be better! The site on staff allowed us to leave our bags at noon and check it at 1am after we left the parks! The staff was onsite and so helpful the entire duration of our stay! Can't wait to return!
Manager Response: Dear Brittany, We are pleased to hear that you had a comfortable stay with us and that our hotel suited your accommodation requirements so well. We would love to welcome you back for another great stay very soon!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: I arrived to this hotel, and was truly impressed with the friendly service, amenities, and cleanliness/safety of our room. I would definitely recommend this property to others, and would consider booking it again in the future.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We're glad that you enjoyed your stay here and had a good time! We would love to welcome you back again and again!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: The room was perfect for a vacation like Disneyland. Clean, well maintained, with comfortable bed. The staff is friendly and helpful. I'm amazed such a good hotel in walking distance of Disneyland is so value priced.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are known for the excellent value that we offer in this location, and we appreciate your acknowledgment of this. It sounds as if our property was suitable for your stay in this area, and if you have similar accommodation requirements here again, we hope that you will choose to stay with us again. Thank you for your review.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: It was moderate living space average room with no rugs on the floor. there was no breakfast just coffee and a danish. Swimming area was very small and it seemed to be locked the whole stay. could have been a little cheaper for the price of the room. Only stayed for two days the door was hard to open had a lot of trouble opening the door.
Manager Response: Dear Michelle, Thank you for rating your recent stay with us. We are sorry if certain aspects of your stay did not please you, and we do wish that you had made us aware of these during your stay, so that we could have remedied them for you. We hope that you might enjoy a better stay with us in the future.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: The stay was really nice for the purpose. It was a very close walk to Disney.  The staff was very friendly from the moment I checked in and checked out. The air conditioning was amazing after a long day at disney. It was perfect!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your very kind feedback and for taking the time to share it. We are always thrilled to receive positive comments such as yours. We very much look forward to welcoming you back for your next visit.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: I decided to take my husband on a surprise date to Disneyland. It was a last minute idea. I quickly found that there was no availability where we usually stayed, and then saw the positive reviews on Anaheim Discovery Inn. We took the chance. When my husband and I arrived, we were greeted by the friendliest clerk, whom I believe is also the manager. Knowing we were arriving early, he had our room cleaned and ready for us, despite being only an hour after the last guest checked out. It’s unusual to find such genuinely helpful and friendly service in this area, and he went above and beyond our whole trip. He made our trip enjoyable. The room was exceptionally clean, and just perfect for being visitors to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Thia, We love seeing that we were able to provide you with a good experience. Our goal is to provide every guest with an exceptional stay. We look forward to your next stay!    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: I've stayed at several Value Hotels in the area over the years and this was by far the best.  Walking distance to Disneyland.  Clean, comfortable room. Easy access parking. Friendly staff.  Worth the Stay
Manager Response: Dear Joey, Many thanks for your positive rating – we are delighted that you enjoyed your time at our property so much. We hope to host you again successfully in the near future.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: We have always stayed here when we make our trips to Disneyland. Easy walk to Downtown Disney. The rooms are always clean. Never had any issues. We love that it is a smaller hotel. Also, FREE PARKING!! The staff is great and have made us feel welcome every time we visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us recently, and for taking the time to leave your valuable feedback. We are pleased with your comments regarding our staff and the wonderful service that they provide. This is always a key priority for us. It sounds as if our property was suitable for your short stay in this area, and if you have similar accommodation requirements here again, we hope that you will choose to stay with us again.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: I stayed for one night, the staff was super friendly. The room was perfect for 3. I would stay there again. It’s a close walk to Disneyland, I would say a 15min walk. Limited parking so make sure you get there early!
Manager Response: Even if you only got to stay with us for one night, I'm glad we made it a great one. Since we're so close to Disneyland it can get a bit busy, hence the limited parking. Although, it didn't seem to be much of an issue, because we're walking distance from the park. We look forward to having you back next time you're in the area.  Thank You,  Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites at the Park

Summary: We were tight on money but wanted a clean, comfortable place to stay near Disneyland for one night. Upon calling the hotel, I immediately felt comfortable by the demeanor of the desk clerk. He answered all of my questions and was also very, very helpful during our stay there. The rooms are not big, but were big enough for the four of us. The bathroom was large and the water could get really hot if you needed it. The rooms were astoundingly quiet. I could not hear any of my neighbors. The parking lot was a bit tight, but hey, that's California for you. The beds were comfortable and the AC /Heater worked very well. I would have liked more space, but for the money, it was worth the sacrifice.  The room was simple and clean. Great stay, here, and I easily saved $100.00 or more.
Manager Response: What a lovely review. We are pleased to have provided you with a place to stay that was ideal for your needs, and we appreciate your feedback. We hope to welcome you back for another wonderful stay in the near future.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Too Expensive for a Cheap Motel
Summary: The only reason we chose this motel was its proximity to the Anaheim Convention Center. We most likely will not stay there again. The staff are very friendly, however the motel is in need of some serious upgrades. The carpeting and upholstered chairs smelled very bad.
Manager Response: Dear Trina,  We're very sorry and absolutely shocked that you appear to have had such a bad experience during your recent stay with us. This isn't the usual feedback that we get and not the common experience that our guests have. Thank you for your comments - we will investigate them further and ensure improvements occur as a result.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Great location, only a short walk to Disneyland and California adventure land. The staff at the front desk are super helpful. There is free wifi and the rooms are quite large. It has been my favourite place to stay since I have been in the US. It is the perfect place to stay for a few days.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for all the great compliments. I'm so glad you enjoyed our property. Please come back and stay with us again soon - we'll be waiting!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Great location, so close to our destenation-Disneyland.  Hotel was clean and staff very friendly.  Bed was a bit stiff, but still comfy.  Will definitely stay here again and recommend to other family members.
Manager Response: Dear Verdin, Thank you for your kind words. We are always delighted to hear that our guests were impressed with the service as well as the quality of the hotel facilities. We all look forward to welcoming you back again soon.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Great Sleep within a short walk to Disneyland.
Summary: Clean, comfortable no frills property, managed by the owner.  I’ve already reserved my next stay.  Short walk to the park thru Downtown Disney.  Quiet after the Disney fireworks.  No breakfast.  Free wifi.
Manager Response: Dear Richard, Thank you for your kind words. We are always delighted to hear that our guests were impressed with the service as well as the quality of the hotel facilities. We all look forward to welcoming you back again soon.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: As an annual passholder I use this hotel every month. Each time they keep surprising me with new renovations and more amenities. The staff is always hospitable and cater to your needs immediately. I timed myself during this visit. To walk to to checkin point at Downtown Disney it took my family 8 minutes. Very safe and beautiful at night.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for rating your recent stay with us; we are so pleased that you enjoyed your time here so much. We love hearing back from returning guests as it makes us feel like we are doing something right! We will make sure to pass on your feedback to our team; they will be delighted that they were able to add to your stay. We hope to welcome you back soon!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: I found this hotel on Hotwire and now stay here everytime I go to Disneyland. The rooms are being remodeled with a modern look and wood floors, way better than carpet. More importantly the owner is very hands on, making sure everything is good. Fantastic owner!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your very kind feedback and for taking the time to share it. We are always thrilled to receive positive comments such as yours. We very much look forward to welcoming you back for your next visit.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: This is a clean establishment.  We felt safe staying here even though an older property and doors on the outside. The staff was very friendly and helpful.  It is within easy walking distance and bus stop close by.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We would like to express our gratitude for your kind words. We are always pleased to hear that our guests were impressed with the service as well as the quality of the room features. We  will pass on your comments to the team and we all look forward to welcoming you back again soon.     Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: We are always very well taken care of when we stay at Discovery Inn and Suites. Rooms are clean and most of them are newly renovated. Excellent value! I highly recommend the hotel for anyone traveling to Disneyland on a budget.
Manager Response: Dear Melanie,  Thank you for rating your recent stay with us; we are so pleased that you enjoyed your time here so much. We love hearing back from returning guests as it makes us feel like we are doing something right!  We would love to welcome you back, when you are next visiting the area.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: My husband and I were celebrating our first wedding anniversary in Disneyland. The host was very welcoming upon hearing it was our anniversary he upgraded us to a king bed suite. The bed was VERY comfortable ! They had coffee every morning and we were able to walk to the park not worrying about parking. Very enjoyable experience will definitely be going back on our next visit !
Manager Response: Dear Danika,   It is such a compliment to receive such a wonderful rating. Thank you for taking the time to share about your experience with us. Please come and stay with us again - We'll still be here ready to greet you!    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: We chose this hotel because of its closeness to both Disneyland and the convention center. I was pleasantly surprised with the room since it was on the cheaper side. The manager at the front office was amazing and very accommodating during our 4 night stay. It’s definitely not a high end hotel but worked well for the price and what we needed. Will stay again
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are known for the excellent value that we offer in this location, and we appreciate your acknowledgment of this. It sounds as if our property was suitable for your stay in this area, and if you have similar accommodation requirements here again, we hope that you will choose to stay with us again. Thank you for your review.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: I think up dating the rooms would make a great difference  but w will stay again it is a short walk to Disneyland an the area feels very safe  restaurants  are very close The staff was very nice  and helpful
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for rating your stay with us - we are so pleased that you had a good stay. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back before long.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Stayed at Anaheim Discovery Inn and Suites with my daughter for a holiday and highly recommend this place. Amazing value for money. Fantastic customer service, Extremely friendly and helpful, rooms are spotless and so comfortable. Has free wifi and car parking. coffee and breakfast. Close to Disneyland. All walking distance. Restaurants very close and great prices.  Can’t to come back here. Highly recommended
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  It is such a compliment to receive such a wonderful rating. Thank you for taking the time to share about your experience with us. Please come and stay with us again - We'll still be here ready to greet you!    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: We stayed at this place for 4 nights. The location of this hotel is great as it's near Disneyland Park and it took us atleast 10-15minutes walk from this place to Downtown Disney excluding the queue for security checks and  another 10-15 minutes walk from Downtown Disney to Disneyland Park/Adventure excluding shopping at different stores. We always return to our hotel in the afternoon as our 3 yr. old toddler need to take a nap and it's so convenient for us. Our room was spacious and clean, bed and pillows are soft and comfortable. Excellent wi-fi, free parking, able to view the fireworks from our room and great value for our money. Staff is approachable. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are known for the excellent value that we offer in this location, and we appreciate your acknowledgment of this. It sounds as if our property was suitable for your stay in this area, and if you have similar accommodation requirements here again, we hope that you will choose to stay with us again. Thank you for your review.  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Close to Disneyland and shuttle right next door. No breakfast but right next to a couple restaurants. Free parking and great service! Man at front desk always willing to help! Beds kind of hard though. Good for quick trip.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for rating your stay with us - we are pleased that you had a good stay. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back before long.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: This was a very good hotel for the price on the rooms. Yes the rooms are slightly outdated and a little small, but that doesnt matter if you are gone for most of the day. This hotel has gone through a few renos like flooring and painting so they are doing there best to update it. Really good walking distance (15-20min to Downtown Disney, Disneyland, Bubba Gumps, Cheesecake factory, IHOP). Everyone of the staff were very helpful and friendly. I would definitely recommend this to someone doing Disney on a budget. Only concerns are the bed were slightly hard and there was no safe/lock box for valuables. If your not a hotel snob then this will work perfectly for you.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We loved your review! Thank you for taking the time to leave such detailed feedback. We were delighted that you enjoyed your time with us so much. We would love to be your host again, when you are next visiting the area.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Great place to stay. as the location is perfect. Rooms were very clean and comfortable. Would highly recommend this place to stay the next time you are in Anaheim! They also have free coffee in lobby every morning!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, It is such a compliment to receive such a wonderful rating. Thank you for taking the time to share about your experience with us and we hope to see you again very soon.  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Very close to Disneyland about 10 minute walk. Rooms were very clean and staff was very accommodating. Very quiet.  Good family restaurant was just down the street. If you are looking for a reasonably priced hotel without all the bells and whistles of the fancy resorts then this is the place to go
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us recently, and for taking the time to provide us with your rating. We were happy to welcome you to our hotel, and we are pleased that you had an enjoyable stay. We would love to welcome you back, when you are next visiting the area.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: I got the room at a decent price and was even upgraded! The staff was very hospitable!! They let me check in early, upgraded my room, and let me keep my car parked there while I was at Disneyland the next day. (after I checked out.) The location was nice if you enjoy Downtown Disney. We would just walk through downtown disney to get to the park.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We appreciate your review, thank you, and we are happy to have provided you with a suitable place to stay, along with the friendly, hospitable service that we are known for. We appreciate you detailing your experience, and we hope that you will return to have many more fantastic stays with us in the future.  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Nice Place to Stay if Visiting Disneyland
Summary: This hotel is within easy walking distance to Downtown Disney and offers free parking.  We were pleased with the prompt and friendly service, clean room, and reasonable price.  We plan to stay again on our next visit.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for rating your recent stay with us; we are pleased that you enjoyed your time here so much. We hope to welcome you back soon!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: The manager Jay was very friendly and accommodating. The rooms were clean, and comfortable for one night. The bathroom was a little dingy from use, but not unclean. There was a gap under the door, potential for bugs and things to enter, but this is a simple fix. When you are looking for a night of rest after a long day at the parks, this is a good spot. Also can save yourself 20$ in parking, it is a quick walk to Disney.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We were delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We really appreciate your business and your feedback. Thank you for your improvement suggestion. We will ensure that we address this issue. We would love to be your host again, in the not too distant future.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: The hotel was quiet, clean, and our room seemed semi-updated (new flooring and blinds). The street wasn’t busy and the walk to disney was decent, but we usually stay across from the front entrance. It was a good hotel for the price!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We were happy to hear that our property suited your needs so well. We would love to be your host again, when you are next in town.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: We sought a good price close to Disneyland and this place delivered.  Much better accommodations than we were expecting.  Roomy, clean, excellent service.  Thank you so much for helping to make our stay very comfortable and filled with many great memories!  Would definitely like to return and stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, From all of us, thank you for the fantastic rating! It was an honor to have you as a guest. Please choose us again on your next visit to the area!  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: The front desk manager has always been courteous and professional each time we've stayed here. He takes his time to go over attractions guide in the area. The location is very convenient for those going to Disneyland and DCA and surrounded by numerous places to eat
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for choosing to stay with us recently, and for taking the time to provide us with your rating. We were happy to welcome you to our hotel, and we are pleased that you had an enjoyable stay. We would love to welcome you back, when you are next visiting the area.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Check in was quick and simple. The person on reception was very welcoming and gave me directions to Disneyland after finding out this was the purpose of my trip. It was a short 10 minute walk to the entrance of the parks.  The room was clean and welcoming. There was a large fridge to keep water and snacks in with no extra charge for this amenity.   I was a solo female traveller and felt very safe during my stay. The area surrounding the hotel had plenty of families walking to and from the parks so I felt comfortable walking on my own, even at the end of a long day in the parks.   I would definitely stay here again. It is an excellent base for those wishing to spend the majority of their time at the parks.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for the incredible rating. We are so glad we were able to provide you with such a wonderful experience and we hope to see you very soon!  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Was looking to get a good nights sleep after driving 1000 miles to get there and before spending 16 hours at Disneyland the next day. Other guests were loud coming back from the park well after midnight. Thin walls and you could hear everything.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We are very sorry to hear that your stay with us was marred by the noise from other guests. We do ask our guests to respect one another. We wish you'd let us know about this, as our staff would have done everything possible to have resolved this issue for you. We would love to welcome you back, when you are next visiting the area.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Loved the room & staff! Clean and with the smaller more family-run feeling. I am not a fan of the big chains. Very friendly & responsive owner and desk staff. Wonderful housekeepers too. Very pleasant stay. I felt at home. Close to restaurants and mini mart. All you need!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you so much for your kind review and rating! We aim to provide clean, quiet and comfortable stay for all our guests, so we are pleased to see that we did just that on your visit. We hope to welcome you back again next time you visit the area. Thanks again!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Trip to Disneyland with kids? This is the place. Close to restaurants and the park Nice pool to relax after long day in park  Close enough to stop for a break mid day If the kids are too tired you can still watch the fireworks from your room
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for your perfect rating and lovely comments! We are very pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us so much, and we hope to welcome you back the next time you're in town!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: I have nothing but great things to say about staying here at this hotel, we arrived an hour early for check in, i walked in to see if we can check in early and the gentlemen at the front desk was so helpful, he went ahead to see if our room was ready and it was and handed us our room key, the room was great i loved it so did my daughter and niece, it was very spacious and clean, the location is great especially to downtown Disney and food places all around, they even responded to my messages right away and was very quick to let me know if a rollaway bed was available, a night before checkout i walked in to the front desk to see if it was possible to even stay another night since we all didn’t want to go home just yet lol and the gentleman was so kind and understanding, we’ll be
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We loved your review! We are very pleased to hear that our property suited you so well, and that our staff were so helpful to you. We certainly aim to please our guests to the very best of our ability. We appreciate your review, thank you, and we are delighted to know that you will be staying with us again!  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: This hotel is within walking distance of Anaheim Convention center and also Disneyland (a bit farther walk now that you can't cut through Grand Californian). The property is pretty much no frills, there is a small pool (no Jacuzzi) but the rooms are always clean and there is a mini fridge and microwave and a decent size TV. I love the location of this place... there are even several restaurants within walking distance!!!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We loved your review! Thank you for sharing. We loved being your host and were delighted that our location, suited your needs so well. We would love to be your host again, in the not too distant future.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Great location. Close to Disneyland, easy to walk to or catch the ART bus system. My Mom and my 2 daughters enjoyed our stay. We don't ask for much,  just a clean bed and a good price.  We keep busy with activities so we were only in the room for naps during the day and sleeping at night. Would stay again. It was perfect for us.
Manager Response: Dear Jean, We were thrilled that you enjoyed your time with us so much. Thank you for sharing your comments. We loved being your host and would love to be again, the next time you are visiting the area.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: This hotel suited our needs perfectly. Convenient, clean, comfortable, quiet. The front desk person who checked us in was very helpful. The bed was so comfortable. The location is near several eating places.
Manager Response: Dear Rhonda, Thank you for taking the time to complete our survey. Feedback from our guests is very important to us and your input helps with our continuing efforts to provide excellent service and a great stay. Thank you so much for your business and we look forward to seeing you in the future.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Great hotel, clean and close to the parks! Had an issue with the toilet in my room leaking a little water, was immediately moved to another room where I had no issues. Staff was friendly and helpful, would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to share your comments! We were so happy that your time with us was so enjoyable.
