We are delighted that the issue in your room was resolved quickly by our staff. We apologize for any inconvenience that this caused you. We would love to welcome you back, when you are next visiting the area.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Good location. Friendly, helpful staff. Quiet area close to disney parks. Stores, restaurants, shuttle stop nearby. Furniture, fixtures, and decore dated. Bed uncomfortable. Free amenities. Nice pool area. Would visit again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Although happy that you enjoyed your overall stay with us, we were sorry to hear that you didn't love your stay. Next time, please be sure to let us know if there's anything we can do to make your time with us more comfortable. We will ensure that your feedback rating is discussed with our team, for any improvements to be made. We hope you will allow us to be your hosts again next time you're visiting the area!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Good value and close to Disney
Summary: Walking distance to Downtown Disney and Disneyland. Parking was free. Hotel was clean and comfortable. Nothing spectacular but a good value for the money. Check in was pleasant and room was not ready but they hurried it up for us.
Manager Response: Dear Glenn, We were thrilled that our property was so suitable for your needs. We loved being your host, and would love to be again, when you are next visiting the area.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Good location, room needed some work
Summary: Stayed here for 5 nights with my 5yo son in late February.  Our room looked nice at first glance but there was old food on the floor around the beds.  The TV would not turn on.  I asked the front desk clerk about it the next morning as there were no instructions to do so in the room.  There were also some bugs in our bathroom- they were small, brown and had antennas.  There were a few dead ones on the ceiling above the bathtub as well.  I felt this could have been cleaned before guests arrived.  The location of this hotel is great as it is an easy walk to Disney.  The other item housekeeping needed was there was never a liner for the ice bucket.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to rate your recent stay at our hotel. Whilst it is good to hear that you had a reasonable stay, we are sorry for the issues that you encountered that marred your time with us. We hope to remain your hotel of choice in this area, and to give you a better stay on a future visit.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: We have stayed here 3 times in the last couple of months and the staff has treated us like VIP's every time! The rooms are clean and it is just a short walk to the park. Highly recommend this to anyone looking for a budget friendly option :) my only suggestion would be new pillows as the current ones are way to firm for me to sleep on, but that was fixed by me bringing my own the last couple of times.
Manager Response: Dear Melanie, We love being your host and we really appreciate you sharing your comments each time. It is our pleasure to welcome you back to our hotel. We will try to have new pillows in place, for your next stay with us! Thank you again for your repeat business and your lovely comments. We really appreciate both.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: This place worked perfectly for two girls traveling on a whim. A friend and I stayed here one night, as we were going to Disneyland for the day. It was great for it's class and the staff was very kind and accommodating. I would recommend this to anyone who's traveling in a smaller group.
Manager Response: Hi Kelcee, Thank you for your recommendation! It pleases us immensely to know that you enjoyed your time with us so much. We very much appreciate your feedback, and we hope to see you again very soon!     Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Hotel is just a short walk from the Disney Parks and Downtown Disneyland area. If you plan on spending your entire day at Disney then this is a great value. If you want some pool time then you probably want to stay somewhere else as the pool is small and right next to the main road. Room was clean and comfortable.
Manager Response: Hi Laura, We are delighted that you enjoyed your recent stay with us, and that you found your room to be comfortable and clean. Our main priority is to provide this for all of our guests. We are happy that you loved our location, and our proximity to disney, and we look forward to welcoming you back when you are next in the area. Thank you so much for your review!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Outstanding value in a place that is desperately short on value
Summary: People don't think of Disneyland as a place to save money.   Yet, the Discovery Inn appeared to offer a pretty good deal for a tourist visiting the Magic Blingdom.  It is about a 20 minute walk from the motel to the Disneyland/Cal Adventure front gate  (assuming you go through security at Downtown Disney) and you save yourself $20 in daily parking fees.  Beyond that, our room was clean, quiet and we feel like we got full value for the $85 per night rate that we got.....BTW, we called the Inn directly rather than booking online and we got a very competitive rate.    Overall, we recommend this lodging option.  The money we saved definitely got spent at D-land.
Manager Response: Dear Michael, We were so happy to hear that you enjoyed staying with us so much. We loved being your host and would love to do so again, in the not too distant future. Thank you for sharing your comments.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Nice quaint motel that is easy walking distance to Disneyland
Summary: Anaheim Inn and Suites are in the process of renovating and upgrading their rooms in a single fashion so don't worry you won't be bothered. The towels have been replaced with new fluffy warm soft towels the bedding seems to be nicer than in the past and the beds were very comfortable. The shower was lovely with lots of hot water unlike some of the motels in the area would seem to run out unless you're the first to get there. The front desk manager is most delightful in the happy and helpful. He remembered us from visits past and made us feel welcome and like family. The rooms or spacious we stayed in a two queen room and we had lots of space the Air Conditioning Heating units are new and worked efficiently and quietly and the bathroom was impeccably clean. For The Adventurous
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for leaving such a detailed review. Your comments will really help future potential guests who are considering staying with us. We were so happy that everything was to your liking, during your stay. We look forward to welcoming you back again and again. Thank you for sharing your comments. We really appreciate your business and your feedback.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: This trip was for our daughters birthday and for going to Disneyland for the first time. Check in was so easy and quick! The stay was peaceful and the room was clean! I couldn't have asked for a better place to stay on our first Disney trip! We will definitely be returning!
Manager Response: Dear Antoinette, We were so happy to read your review! We were thrilled that you enjoyed your time with us so much. We would love to welcome you all back again, in the not too distant future.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: The manager was extremely hands on. He upgraded us to a king bed room without us requesting. Had to have him start TV but other than that it was a pleasant stay. Property close walk to Disney properties. Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We were so happy that you enjoyed your recent stay with us. We would love to be your property of choice for this area. Thank you for your business and review. We really appreciate both.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Another year has passed and we visited this lovely place again for a big trade music show NAMM at the end of January. As opposed to many places (hotels) we’ve been before and where you could see an ageing in progress you can see the genuine afford to improve the things here. New floor in the whole room better wifi coverage (the owner has confirmed to instal the more powerful routers and ariels. Also the room service (cleaning - bed fixing - etc..) was very good - well might that be a USD1.00 on the bedside table each morning - I don’t thing so - this is a standard there. If you don’t insist on spending loads of dosh just for the sake of it and if you can be happy with what’s really needed then this place is for you - definitely.. The Disneyland just across the road can't be bad
Manager Response: Dear Jan, We love hearing back from returning guests. It makes us feel that we are doing something right. We were delighted that our property suited your needs so well. We would love to welcome you back again and again.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: There is no better place to stay than the Anaheim Discovery Inn and Suites. This hotel is in perfect walking distance to the Disneyland Resort, has great places to eat and shop nearby and a short drive to I5 and the heart of LA. The rooms are always clean and the staff friendly. All for a reasonable price. Can't beat that!
Manager Response: Dear Darren, Thank you for taking the time to review our property. We were so delighted to hear that everything was to your liking. We really appreciate your business and your comments. We would love to welcome you back, when you are next visiting the area.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: A modestly priced hotel that is next to Disneyland
Summary: I like the place overall. It's clean, close and modestly priced. The people who run it are nice. Don't expect anything more than a cup of coffee in the morning, but there are plenty of nice places to have a real breakfast near by.
Manager Response: Dear Sirrage, We were delighted to read that our property suited your needs so well. We would love to be your host again, when you are next visiting the area.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Friendly assistance by all means, located within walking distance from the Convention Center. Nice and clean rooms, free parking. Pool has sun early in the morning! I can definitely recommend a stay at this hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Christian, Thank you for taking the time to review our property. We loved hearing about your recent stay with us. We were delighted that everything was to your liking. We would love to be your host again, when you are next visiting the area. Thank you for sharing!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: over the last 15 years I’ve visited the Anaheim Convention Center annually and always stay at this hotel. The hospitality is warm and personal, the rooms clean well equipped and comfortable and the location next to Disney and the convention Center is unbeatable.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We love to hear back from returning guests. Thank you for sharing your comments. We would love to welcome you back again and again. It is our pleasure to be your host. Thank you for your business and your review. We really appreciate both.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: The room is by no means fancy, however for the price and location it is an absolute gem and my preferred hotel when going to Disneyland! Just a short brief walk to the parks and with free parking and no resort fees I don't know why you would stay anywhere else on Katella Ave.
Manager Response: Dear Scott, Thank you for taking the time to review our property. We were thrilled to hear that we are your property of choice for this area. We look forward to your next visit with us.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Ever since I started staying at Discovery, I’ve had such an enjoyable time! I highly recommend! Accommodations and staff are always so hospitable! Great location and convenient for all Disney and Anaheim needs!
Manager Response: Dear Elias, We love hearing back from returning guests. It makes us feel that we are doing something right. Thank you for your business and comments. We really appreciate both.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: On our recent USA trip we had two stopovers in Anaheim where we stayed at our favourite hotel. We had family and friends joining us for various days. Walking distance to Disneyland makes the stay so much easier. The staff are so friendly and helpful. The rooms are well maintained and comfortable.  We have another trip in March and have booked again to stay here. Can't wait.
Manager Response: Dear Wayne, Thank you for taking the time to leave us such a lovely review. We were so happy that everything was to your liking. We will look forward to March!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Not A Single Good Night's Rest
Summary: This is a budget motel near the Disney Resort that is not at all a bargain if you wish to sleep at night. The room is quiet but the bed was only slightly more comfortable than the floor. Both my spouse and I are side-sleepers who woke up stiff and sore each morning--after horrible nights tossing. We chose this property strictly due to previous reviews. We liked the free parking and didn't need amenities like free breakfast. The barebones approach did not pay off as Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites may be the worst place to (attempt to) sleep near Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Cynthia, We were so disappointed that we failed to provide you and your husband with a restful nights sleep. This is unusual feedback for us, as our guests normally love our beds. We wish you had of notified us of this issue during your stay as our staff would have done everything possible to have resolved this for you, including moving you to another room, or changing mattresses etc. We are very sorry that you did not thoroughly enjoy your time with us. We hope this will not deter you from staying with us again, as we would welcome the opportunity to impress you with our service.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: We stayed for 4 days and let me tell you, the value is amazing. The staff is very nice and rooms were clean. If you need certain amenities I would make sure they have them as it’s not super frilly but this place gets the job done.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for sharing your comments! We were so happy that everything was to your satisfaction. We hope you come back to see us again soon!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: We stayed in this hotel for Christmas and new year, it is a walking distance from Disney parks.  You can even watch fireworks from your room, that's how close it is.   If you are a coffee drinker, you can only have coffee in the morning and a bread which they only serve at front desk/reception, there is no coffee maker in the room.  However the hotel is just a minute walking distance from restaurants, which give you some choices.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We loved being your host and we were thrilled that you had an 'awesome' experience with us. We were delighted that your stay with us over the Christmas period was an enjoyable one. We would love to welcome you back, when you are next visiting the area.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Room had a horrible smell and 2nd. Bedroom OMG
Summary: Booked this hotel for New Years Eve 12/30 & 12/31(we checked in at 9pm) at the last minute because other hotels were booked. The smell of the room gave me a migraine & the second bedroom was in a dark closet. I could not stay in the room and checked out an hour after checking in & was NOT given first night stay of $175 back. I will learn to ALWAYS book a REPUTABLE hotel. The man at the front desk was the only real good thing about this place, he was super nice and accommodating. Other than that I would NEVER give this place a second look. I will stick with the Homewood Inn & Suites or another reputable hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We are so sorry that our property was not to your liking. Please accept our sincerest apologies that our rooms were not to your satisfaction. We are glad that our front of desk staff was able to help you. Your comments will help improvements to be made.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Its easy to get around. Walking distance to disneyland and convention center. The room is clean and love the staff there. They are super helpful and friendly. I would surely stay in the inn again if i visit anaheim again.
Manager Response: Dear Jacqueline, Thank you for taking the time to review our property. We really appreciate your business and your feedback. We were thrilled that everything was to your satisfaction and we were so happy to hear that we will be your property of choice for this area. Thank you again.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Great hotel to stay as it is close to Disneyland parks and the management is always very helpful if you do have a problem, this is my 3rd year staying there and the rooms are very comfortable and using the wi-fi has never been a problem and they are tons of places surrounding the area, I will be staying here again and again.
Manager Response: Dear Walter, We love to hear back from returning guests. Thank you so much for sharing your comments. We love being your host and we look forward to welcoming you back again and again!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: I stayed here with my husband for two days at Disneyland. It's a short easy walk to the parks. Denny's and other diners/restaurants are also within walking distance. The room was very large. It is basic and older, but clean and great if you're just there to sleep after visiting the parks. We could park our car directly outside our room. Good value for money and I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Katrina, We loved your comments! Thank you for sharing! We really are in a great location for visiting Disney, and we were so delighted that this added to your trip. We would love to welcome you back again and again!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Rooms were clean.  Staff were very friendly.  Short walk to Downtown Disney and then the Disneyland theme parks.  Walking distance to food.  Stayed with only adults but seemed family friendly.  Coffee every morning in office till 9:30 AM.   Hard beds and a loud air conditioner were only complaints we had.
Manager Response: Dear Billie, Thank you for taking the time to share your comments. We were so happy that your stay with us was an enjoyable one. We are in a great location for Disney and we were glad that this suited your needs so well. Thank you for leaving us some improvement suggestions. We really appreciate your feedback, and action will occur as a result. We would love to be your host again, when you are next visiting the area.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Great value and walk to Disneyland.
Summary: Simple but clean and pleasant rooms for not much money.  Beside, you’re spending time at Disneyland, not in the room.  Free parking and WiFi are great perks.  Close to restaurants, and other shops and services.
Manager Response: Hi Richard, and thank you for your kind review. We appreciate your comments, and we are happy to have provided you with such suitable accommodation for your requirements in this area. We would love to welcome you back soon.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: A clean, quiet, comfortable place to stay hosted by a generous and kind staff at a value price. What more can you ask for within walking distance of Disneyland! Talk with a manger if you are a frequent visitor and he will provide the details about their free night program.
Manager Response: Dear Mark, We loved your review. Thank you for sharing your comments. We would love to be your host again, when you are next visiting the area.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: You can safely walk to Disneyland in under ten minutes. Allow a lot of extra time to get through security in Downtown Disney. One day it took us 30 minutes! There are several restaurants close to the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Randall, We were delighted that our location suited your needs so well. Thank you for sharing.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Greet staff and great room! Highly satisfied with how accommodating the staff was since we arrived very early and were able to check in early and go to Disneyland without having to worry about interrupting our day to come back and check into a room.
Manager Response: Hi Nicole, We were delighted to be your hosts recently, and we are very happy that you enjoyed such a great stay at our hotel. We are always happy to facilitate our guests with an early check-in when business permits, and we are pleased to have been able to do so for you. We would love to have the pleasure of hosting you again in the very near future. Thank you for your kind review.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Good spot, they're in the middle of renovations so I can't wait to stay again and see how it turns out. Great location near food and drinks. Also, glad to have met the proprietor. He was amazingly helpful and courteous in every way possible.
Manager Response: Dear Joser, thank you for your kind review. We really appreciate it. We were so happy that you enjoyed your stay with us so much. We look forward to your next stay with us. Best wishes, Hotel Management.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: A little banged up and priced high but good enough to stay with family. Beds are fairly comfortable and spacious room. Showers are okay. A little narrow. Water pressure and hot water check.   The front counter staff is awesome though.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to review our property. We were glad that overall your stay with us with to your satisfaction. Our front counter staff really are awesome, and we were so happy to hear them being acknowledged. Thank you for sharing. We would love to be your host again, when you are next visiting the area.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: We booked last minute when we arrived in Anaheim and they were so nice to accomodate us. The room was spacious, super clean and just right-- tv, microwave and a fridge! And its also close to the Anaheim Convention Center and Disneyland! You dont need to worry about the noise, the place is quiet and you can relax all day if you want. We stayed in their hotel for a week and it's great. Good deals, budget friendly and close to everything.
Manager Response: Hi Yeilah, Thank you for your 5-star review! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay with us - it sounds as though our property was ideal for your needs. I look forward to sharing your kind words with our team, and hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Best Inn by the convention center!
Summary: We came here to this hotel to attend Blizzcon 2017. I am so glad this place had vacant rooms left still because it was just right by the convention and very good prices! The staff was very kind. The room was very clean. We had quiet nights!
Manager Response: We are delighted to have been such a great choice of hotel for you, and to hear that we met your needs so well. Thank you for your review, we would love to welcome you back for another great stay very soon.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: room was okay, fridge didn't work, finally fixed on our last day. The room was clean, don't count on any kind of breakfast and coffee was never ready by 6. It is over a mile walk to the park. Friendly staff, nice pool area. Probably wouldn't stay again given the distance to the parks.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to review our property. Our guests normally love our location and its closeness to the parks. If you should change your mind, we would love to be your host again. Thank you for sharing.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Friendly man working the reception area..love the Disney decor..our room was not ready so we were accomdated with a room that had two queen size beds no extra charge...perfect...r he room was very nice and clean..I appreciated that the room had a refrigerator and microwave..especially since my son was with me....convenience store was down the street. .that was a plus.. very convenient overall..close to the parks...we are planning  our trip.for next year. .we definitely will stay here again..
Manager Response: Hi Sandy, We were delighted that everything was to your liking, during your recent stay with us. We would love to see you and your son again, when you are next visiting the area. Thank you for your lovely review. We really appreciate it.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Amazing. The front dest man was extremely helpful. Felt very safe for being just us two girls (age 19 and 18). Pool area was great. Super close and easy walk to Disneyland/Downtown Disney and lots of restaurants. Would say it is perfect for families or friends visiting Disneyland while trying to stick to a budget. Room is not fancy, but good for the price you pay. All amenities worked well. Breakfast not included but cheap grocery store is about a mile walk. Overall so satisfied!
Manager Response: Hi Brooklyn, Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. We were so happy to read your review. We hope that we will see you again, in the not too distant future. Thank you for sharing.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Had a great stay the staff at the hotel were great. Rooms were clean. We stayed 4 days and the parking was included. Also very close to Walgreens And Other Restaurants. Has a free delivery service to a grocery store available. Literally across the street from the Disney campus. 👍🏼
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We were so delighted that everything was to your satisfaction, during your recent stay. It is our aim to provide clean, comfortable, affordable accommodations, in a great location, and it looks like you were happy with this. Thank you for your business and your review. We really appreciate both.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Better than expected, would recommend to anyone.
Summary: We did not go to Disneyland to hang out in the hotel. One of the most affordable places to stay around the park and it exceeded my expectations. The rooms are, clean and the beds were more comfortable than my high dollar sleep number. The walk to the Monorail @ downtown Disney will take you 8 to15 minutes depending on pace. You aren't paying for the Grand Californian so don't expect it and you won't be disappointed. We were there for 5 days and I can't think of one complaint I had. We plan on another visit in 2 years and unless we suddenly have money to burn we will be staying here. A+
Manager Response: HI Randy, We loved your review! Thank you for sharing. We were so happy that everything was to your liking, during your recent stay with us. We look forward to your next visit. It was our pleasure to be your host! Thank you again for sharing your comments.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Overall a fairly average room. Good location though- a 20 minute walk to Disneyland. Our room had a water leak from the shower and smelled like damp as the water had gone through the wall to the carpet in the bedroom.  Also, bugs were floating in the pool.  The room was cleaned daily so very good housekeeeping but the constant permeating smell of mould and damp each time we were in our room was very off-putting. We didn’t request an alternative room because we had arrived late after a long drive and just wanted to sleep! We have since advised the manager of this issue and he has assured us the leak has been fixed.  Also, parking is not guaranteed. It’s a first in, best dressed scenario so keep this in mind.
Manager Response: Dear Elese, Thank you for taking the time to review our property. We were delighted to hear that our location suited your needs so well. We can only apologize profusely for the issue you had in your room. Although the leak has been fixed, we can understand, it was not a pleasant experience for you, and certainly not the usual level of service, that we provide our guests with. We hope that this will not deter you from staying with us again. We would love to welcome you back, and we are confident, that your next stay, will be a much more pleasant experience.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: The price was good, the staff was great.  Super friendly. The two things my husband was really unhappy with was the A/C notice thru out the night,  and the smell of the room. Other than that is was a good stay with my family. Really close to down town Disney to go walking.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Although delighted that you enjoyed your overall stay with us, we were disappointed that you didn't love your stay. We are sorry to hear about the problems that you had with your air conditioning and the smell in your room. We wish you had of notified us of these issues, during your stay, our staff would have done everything possible to have resolved this for you, including relocating you to another room. We hope that these issues will not deter you from staying with us again. We would love for you to have a first rate experience with us.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Actually, this is my second time staying at this place. We liked how reasonable the room price was and the rooms were very clean. No loud disturbances at all. Also, a very short walk to Disneyland which is plus!!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We loved your review! Thank you for sharing! We love to hear back from returning guests. It makes us feel like we are doing things right! We look forward to being your host, the next time you are visiting the area. Thank you for your lovely review.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: I made a last minute reservation last week so I could bring my family to Disneyland.  I made the reservation on hotwire and things got a little mixed up as to the beds.  I called and talked to Jay.  He helped me get things fixed and then I also got a second night to stay.  Jay was so pleasant to work with and was very customer friendly.  I saved his information and will be visiting again.  Thank you Jay for a great experience!!!!
Manager Response: Dear Raymond, Thank you for your lovely review. It is our constant effort to deliver such hospitality and it is extremely rewarding when colleagues are recognized for embodying true hospitality, so we are very thrilled to hear that Jay had made such a positive impact on your stay. We hope to welcome you back soon! Thank you again for sharing!!!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Great price.  Good location.  Walking distance to Disneyland, so you don't have to pay parking at Disneyland.  Even my 7 year old could walk to Disneyland and back at night.  Clean room, comfortable beds.  We spent all our time at the park, so this hotel provided what we needed at a good price. Pack earplugs; I could hear children in the next room.  Staff was very nice.  Fridge was a great extra.  We packed stuff for sandwiches to bring into the park.  Had one bed in own room, perfect for putting tired children to bed while adults prep for next day.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for your lovely review. We were thrilled to hear that our property met all your needs. We would love to be your host again, when you are next visiting the area. Thank you for sharing.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: This motel has become our favorite place to stay when we visit the Disney parks. The first time we stayed here it was obvious that the property was being renovated. This time we opened the door to our room to find a completely renovated room. The room is nothing fancy but it's clean and tastefully furnished. The owners and staff are very friendly and accommodating. We love this motel.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We were so delighted that you enjoyed your newly renovated room. We love hearing from our returning guests as it makes us feel we are doing things right! We look forward to welcoming you back, when you are next in town. Thank you again for your business and your review. We appreciate both.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: I stay here every time I come to Disneyland! The staff is helpful and friendly. The rooms are always clean. The location is perfect for your trip to Disneyland. I would recommend Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites to everyone!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, we loved your review! Thank you for your awesome comments! We love to hear back from returning guests. It always makes us feel, that we are doing things right! Thank you for sharing and we look forward to seeing you, in the not too distant future.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: We stayed for three nights while visiting the Disney parks. We were able to walk to the parks and dining. The staff were friendly and helpful. Our room was adequate for our needs - mostly sleeping, however the bed and pillows were a bit too firm for my liking. The air “freshener “ used every day was overwhelming and we had to open the door and window to air out the room. My luggage and some of my clothing still smelled of it when I returned home. All things considered, I would probably stay again.
Manager Response: We were delighted to read that you found our property to be affordable and convenient, and our staff helpful and friendly. We really appreciate your feedback, as it helps us to constantly improve our guests' experiences. We have passed on your comments to our housekeeping team, and improvements will be made as a result. Thank you again for sharing. We look forward to being your host again, when you are next visiting the area.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Great room for the value.  Only recommendation is to bring your own pillow.  Their pillows don't have much fluff in them anymore.  Other than that the room was great.  The room was clean and within walking distance to Disneyland.  We didn't spend much time in the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to review our property. We were delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us so much. We have forwarded your comments concerning our pillows, to our housekeeping team, and new pillows will be ordered as a result. We appreciate your feedback. It is from such feedback, that we can always implement improvements, and provide a better service for our guests. Thank you again for your review and your business. We appreciate both. We hope to see you again, when you are next visiting the area.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Stayed here for one week from 18th to 25th sept.   No the hotel isn't the Sheraton, and first impressions make you suck in your breath  However:  It is within walking distance to Disney parks ( and we were given a handy map when we checked in thank you )  The beds are clean - ( although one bed on inspection had a mark on it on our first night, luckily we could use the other bed)  The beds were then changed the next day with no issues  The bath is clean - looks to be updated with a clean shower curtain with no mold  The owner is v friendly, always asked if we had had a good day  The free coffee and pastries were v handy for a park day, recommend the berry ones!  We didn't use the pool, but seemed clean Would be happy to stay here again
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time out of your busy schedule to review our property. We were thrilled to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us, and that everything was to your liking. We really appreciate your business and your feedback. We look forward to being your host again, when you are next visiting the area.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: This was my 3rd or 4th time staying at this hotel. It's one of my go-to hotels when I'm doing some sort of Disney trip on a budget. It's nothing super special, but it's a decent bed to sleep in and the rooms have always been clean. The front staff was very nice and helpful this time around.
Manager Response: Hi Brianna, Thank you for your review. We love to hear feedback from our returning guests. Thank you for sharing your comments and we look forward to seeing you again, in the not too distant future! Thank you again for sharing! We appreciate your business and your review.    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: This was our second stay at the Anaheim Discovery. It's clean, comfortable, close to the park, and the management is friendly and helpful. There is no in-room coffee maker, but coffee is available in the lobby every morning.
Manager Response: Hi Angela, Thank you for sharing your comments. We love to hear back from returning guests. We are so thrilled to hear that once again, we provided you with all the right ingredients for you to enjoy your stay with us. We look forward to your next visit!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: It was warm & welcoming atmosphere at the hotel.  It was clean.  The staff was very kind, helpful and accommodating!  Only downfall to me was that the pillows were a little hard for my liking but is a personal preference not a flaw of the Hotel.  I would recommend! 👍🏻
Manager Response: Hi Lee Ann, Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. We were delighted you enjoyed your time with us. If you had of notified our colleagues about your pillow preference during your stay, they would have done everything possible, to have resolved this for you. We look forward to welcoming you back in the not too distant future.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Excellent value given the location and what is offered. Great proximity to Disneyland. The hotel is not luxurious by any means but it is clean and they make coffee in the lobby every morning. Staff is always very nice and friendly, willing to accommodate our late check in as well. This has become our go-to hotel when booking Disneyland trips.
Manager Response: Hi Scott, we loved your comments! Thank you for sharing. Your review best described our hotel. Location, great price, clean rooms and friendly staff. Thanks for acknowledging us. We would love to see you again soon.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Small, quiet property within walking distance to Disneyland Resort via Downtown Disney.  Appears that rooms have been recently refurbished, and are clean and comfortable.  Not fancy, but if you're spending your time at Disneyland, who cares!
Manager Response: Hi Richard, Thank you very much for choosing to stay with us for your trip to Disneyland; we are happy to have been so suitable for your needs. We hope that you will make a return trip to Disneyland, and to us, very soon.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Great place to hang your hat at night for Disney Parks visit
Summary: We have stayed here twice now and have been pleasantly surprised.  We used to stay at a place closer to the park on South Harbor and then they started raising their rates, charging for parking and it got to be too much.  We are looking for a safe, clean, friendly place to sleep at night.  We are up early and in the parks at rope drop and are not usually back in the room until after park close.  So we do not need anything fancy. We are also annual passholders  so we are at the parks at least 3 times a year.  So the last time down, we decided to make a change.  We looked at reviews, price and proximity to the park.  Even though some of the reviews seemed borderline, we booked this place.  We were not disappointed.  First, if you are looking for the Marriott or the Taj Mahal-this
Manager Response: Hi Jim, We are very happy to see you enjoyed your stay. Your stay best described our property; location, low price, clean rooms and friendly staff. Thanks for acknowledging us. We are thrilled with your feedback and look forward to seeing you back in December.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: If you're looking for a cheap place to sleep and shower within walking distance to Disneyland, this place fits the bill.  We stayed for a weekend, so it fit our needs just fine.  The bed was comfortable, one of those memory foam mattresses.  There were a couple small tears/holes in the bedding, but it was clean.  The shower was hot, once you finally got the water to heat up.  The room was tiny.  There were only 2 of us, so it worked, but any more than that and it would've felt cramped.  There is no coffeemaker in the room, but the lobby puts a pot out in the morning.  It's terrible.  Just get Starbucks as you're walking to the park.  The walk takes about 15 minutes through Downtown Disney.  You could also just catch the monorail and take it into Disneyland if you don't want to
Manager Response: Hi Shannon, thank you for taking the time to share your comments with us. We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us and you found our amenities, location and price suitable for your needs. We do have a range of rooms available at our property, and perhaps during your next stay with us, we can help you choose a more suitable option for your needs. We look forward to welcoming you back to Disney, and to us!  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for disney
Summary: We had a great time. Great place to stay for the money.staff was so friendly and professional. I would definitely recommend this place to enjoy your trip to disney. They accommodated us with every need that we asked for.
Manager Response: Hi Fred, We are very happy to see you enjoyed your stay. Thank you so much for your 5 star rating! We are very happy that you enjoyed our location, low price, and friendly staff. Thanks for acknowledging these aspects of your stay. Customer service is our primary focus and we are so glad you found this to be the case. We will make sure to pass your feedback onto our entire team, they will be thrilled!    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: I can't express how great this hotel is. Great cost, clean rooms, excellent customer service, what more could a person ask for? So close to Disneyland. Easy to get to the park and great for annual passholders.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Wow! Thank you so much for your review of our property! We are so excited to hear our guests loving their stay with us. It makes all the hard work and effort that are colleagues put in, worthwhile! We hope that we have the pleasure of welcoming you back soon.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: My family and I travel to Disneyland every few months. We found this gem a few years ago and have not stayed anywhere else since. The rooms are clean and the staff is friendly. It is an easy walk to both the Disneyland Resort and the Convention center. I recommend this place!
Manager Response: Hi Jan, We love to hear reviews from returning guests to our property. It is our pleasure to host your family each time. Our closeness to Disney; our affordability; our cleanliness, and our excellent staff are a great combination, when considering which property to stay in when planning your vacation here. We look forward to hosting you all again on your next visit to the area. Thanks for sharing!  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: This hotel was nice . Clean and well maintained .  Close enough to walk to all Disney parks.  Staff was very accommodating and friendly . We were able to watch the fireworks from our hotel on nights when we were not at the park . We will definitely stay here again
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay. I was truly delighted when reading your lovely comments. We look forward to your return and welcoming you back in future.  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: I have stayed here at least twice a year for the last 4 years. The rooms are always nice and clean and the staff is very friendly and helpful. I travel alone with my granddaughter's and I feel safe at this hotel.
Manager Response: Hi Cathie, We are always delighted to welcome you to our hotel, and we are delighted to hear that, once again, you enjoyed a great stay with us. We are so pleased that you feel safe here, and we hope to welcome you back many many more times in the future.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Room was big and did the job. the walk to the park was easy. Free Parking and the manager was really helpful and friendly. No real breakfast and the towels were tough, but no complaints for the price I paid!
Manager Response: Hi Brigid, Thank you very much for your review and your perfect rating. We are very pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us so much, and we hope to welcome you back the next time you're in town!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: I chose the Anaheim Discovery Inn because of it's location and reasonable price. The management was helpful and pleasant both on the phone and in person. I enjoyed the stay and will return. I would recommend this Inn to others.
Manager Response: Hi Steve, We are so happy to hear about your impression of our hotel. It is wonderful to hear we made your stay so positive. Thank you for your recommendation, we hope to welcome you back again soon!  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: This was my 5th stay at this hotel and i have never had a problem staying here and it is close to Disneyland which is where i want to go on my vacation. I will be staying at this hotel again on my next trip in December.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us once again, we are delighted to be your hotel of choice in this area. We appreciate your loyalty and your continued trust in our hotel and our staff. Rest assured that we will do everything it takes to make us deserving of your loyalty. We hope to see you again very soon!  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Greta location and value for the price!!! Needed a place near Disneyland. The hotel was super close, very clean, and the staff was great. We left my son's bedtime plush behind and they saved it for us.
Manager Response: Hi Melissa, We are very pleased to hear that our location suited you so well, and that our staff were so helpful to you. We certainly aim to please our guests to the very best of our ability, and thank you for mentioning that we kept your son's precious bedtime companion for him, we were delighted to assist! We appreciate your review, thank you, and we hope to welcome you back when you're next in town.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Clean, cheerful, safe, low price and close to Disneyland
Summary: Clean cheerful room, friendly staff, very close to Disneyland and low price!  Someone I met at the Disneyland Hotel several years ago mentioned that he had stayed at many hotels around Disneyland and he recommended this inn for those very reasons.  When I tried this inn myself I discovered he was right:  no frills but clean, safe, everything works, low price and only a block from Disneyland and the Anaheim Convention Center.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. I was delighted to learn that your stay was up to your expectations and you were satisfied with the services provided. We are looking forward to your next visit. It is great to hear that you stayed with us because of a recommendation, and we hope that you will also recommend us! We hope to welcome you back again soon!  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Great place to stay when you're visiting Disneyland Resorts. Comfy beds & surprisingly quiet. The only thing is I wish the curtain to the window fit better so no one could see in. Other than that great place to stay.
Manager Response: Hi Elis, Thank you for your review. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay. I was truly delighted when reading your lovely comments. We look forward to your return and welcoming you back when you next have an opportunity to visit Disneyland.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Easy access to Dieneyland and DownTown Disney. Worth the price for the location. Nice room nice shower. Like the mini fridge. Bathroom was good not great. Liked that the property was small made me feel safe.
Manager Response: Hi Michelle, We are pleased that our hotel was so suitable for your needs, and that you felt so safe with us. We hope that you enjoyed your Disney visit, and that you'll make another trip again soon!  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Wanted an inexpensive hotel for 6. 3 Adults & 3 small children. We wanted to walk to Disneyland & avoid the parking fees. Walking there was OK, but coming back after 10 pm was difficult. Should have brought 3 strollers & 3 wheelchairs or scooters. We were hot & tired & hungry! Food was expensive at Disneyland, so having a Coffee Bar in the morning was great! We didn't use the pool, because walking back & forth was not an option with 3 kids to go back & forth, but it looked nice.
Manager Response: Hi Jablo, It's good to hear that our price and proximity to the airport suited your family's needs so well, although a day at the park is always tiring, and it can be hard work to get home! We hope that you will consider staying with us again if you are making another trip to Disneyland. Thank you for taking the time to leave your review.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: best place on a tight budget
Summary: the room is small the matress is almost too firm and the pool out front looks polluted and the size of it is so small its a joke but the room is clean and close to the park so you can walk there, avoiding the hassle of paying for parking and waiting for the transportation to carry u onto the park. the staff are very friendly and helpful and if u need a cafe there is a cocos next door that i highly recommend
Manager Response: We are very pleased that our hotel suited your needs in so many ways - in terms of our location, the friendliness of our staff, and the cleanliness of our room. Our pool is cleaned regularly, but a slight breeze can blow leaves in very quickly, and we are sorry if you felt that it was unsightly. We hope that you will choose our hotel again if you are in this area.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Great location! Not the most luxurious place, but when we do Disney, we sleep and shower in the room. The staff was great and friendly, the area is nice, lots of restaurants and an easy walk or close bus stop to Disney!
Manager Response: We're delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us, and that you benefited so much from our great location. Thanks very much for your review, in particular your comments about how friendly our staff are. We really hope that you'll visit Disneyland again, and that once again, you will allow us to be your hosts!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Okay for one or two nights.
Summary: The pool was nice and not crowded. The property is a bit run down. Very nice staff  let us leave our car after checkout so that we could enjoy the day in Disneyland. Close to the shuttle stop and Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hi Laura, Thank you for choosing to stay with us recently; we were delighted to welcome you to our hotel, and we are pleased to have provided you with a convenient base, from which you could explore Disneyland. It's also great to hear that our staff were so accommodating towards you, and that you enjoyed our pool. We hope that you will stay with us again if you have another opportunity to visit Disneyland.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: I will never stay here again! And recommend to anyone considering this place to spend a couple more dollars and stay somewhere else. Dirty floors, dirty towels, rock hard mattresses, people smoking and marijuana outside our room. The smell of the room was ridiculous. I checked out early and got another room elsewhere.
Manager Response: Dear guest, we are very disappointed to read of your stay with us. This is not at all the usual experience our guests have. We aim to maintain high-quality standards when it comes to cleanliness and our rooms are aired well and always smell fresh.   Rest assured that this is not a common issue at all with us, and we operate very strict policies in relation to such matters. Please know we will be checking the rooms again. However, we sincerely hope that you will give us another try to restore your faith in our hospitality. We are confident that you will have a wonderful experience as the vast majority of guests do.  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: My husband and I were visiting Disneyland as part of our honeymoon and picked this hotel because of its reasonable prices and proximity to the parks.  I'm really glad we decided to stay here because it exceeded my expectations! I would definitely return to this hotel again in the future.   The guy at the check-in desk is really nice and friendly.  He congratulated us on our wedding when we came in and gave us a free upgrade to our room because we were on our honeymoon!  We were not expecting that at all, and was so nice! He also made sure we knew which way to go to get to the parks, told us a bit about the nearest restaurants and shops, and explained about their free coffee  in the mornings and some breakfast nibbles they also offer free of charge.  We made use of the free
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your very detailed, comprehensive review, it is much appreciated, and should be very useful for future guests to our hotel! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay with us so much, and that you would definitely stay with us again if you were in this area. We appreciate your recommendations, and we will see if we can put some of your suggestions in place for your next visit. We hope that you will have an opportunity to return, we would love to welcome you back!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: This hotel is very convenient to downtown Disney. The grounds were clean and the room was clean. We had a room with two queen size beds. There was really no room to spare, but it was fine for us. The rooms have been updated with laminate floors, which is  so much better than carpet. The only thing that would have given this place a better score is that the no-slip strips in the bottom of the bathtub need to be scrubbed to white,  and the adjoining door to the next room had a gap down at the floor. I could see light coming from the other room and I could hear the TV and people talking in there. I put a bath towel along that strip to block it. You can tell this is an old  motel that has been refurbished. But it was great for our needs.
Manager Response: Hi Kim, Thank you very much for choosing to stay with us for your trip to Disneyland; we are happy to have been so suitable for your needs. Thank you for your feedback in relation to the issues that you had in your room, we will see if we can have that sorted out for the next time that you stay with us. We hope that you will make a return trip to Disneyland, and to us, very soon.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Clean, well apportioned, and a great deal!
Summary: Is this a five star hotel, of course not. It does not have the amenities you would find in a  five star, and it was VERY clean and facilities were well cared for. It is small and has a small pool, like you would find in an average back yard. And my guess is, folks do not choose a hotel with in walking distance of dLand because of the amenities!  It was clean, very quiet, plenty of parking that you are not gouged for an additional cost, and the staff were helpful and very pleasant. An easy walk to Downtown Disney and a very good price!  We come to Anaheim a half dozen times a year, we have found our new place to stay!
Manager Response: Hi Mark, Thanks for your review! We're delighted to hear that you found us to be such a great base from which to explore Disneyland! Thanks for choosing to stay with us, we hope to welcome you back when you have another opportunity to visit!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for!
Summary: We thought we got a bargain but it turned out we got what we paid for. Room was small and smelled a bit. There were no coffee or tea making facilities and we shared a communal balcony. We would have preferred to pay extra for better, but if price is number one, perhaps you can put up with the negatives. Staff were friendly enough though.
Manager Response: Although we are pleased, you enjoyed our affordable prices and our friendly staff we are sorry to hear that our hotel was not better suited to your needs. We are disappointed you found your room small; we do offer a variety of room sizes, and if you choose to stay with us again in future we would be happy to suggest a room more suitable for your needs.  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: We booked this hotel as we thought we would be right next to Disneyland and knew we would be out all day, so we thought there was no reason to spend too much on accommodation, but when we arrived, we realised the hotel was still a 20 minute walk to the park entry. Add this to walking all day and it's just too far. The rooms are old and have a communal balcony, so there is no privacy unless you close the blinds. There is a stale smell in the rooms, the carpet is old and grubby looking, the bed had torn sheets, and the bathroom was tiny. There is no tea or coffee facilities in the room. Only at the front desk between 6 & 9 in the morning. There is free wifi, and the air conditioner worked well which was important in the tiny musky room. The bathrooms were really clean which is
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear that we are situated further from Disneyland than you were expecting. It is also a shame that the style of our hotel did not appeal to you, we pride ourselves on providing clean, comfortable, great value accommodation in this area, and we are sorry that our offering was not suitable for your needs. Thank you for choosing to stay with us, we appreciate your business.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Very friendly staff! We arrive an hour early and they allowed us to check in. Not a lot of rooms at this site so that makes for a quite stay. Walking distance to downtown Disney Is about a 10 minute walk. 3 restaurants within a 2 minute walk If that. We will be back soon!
Manager Response: Hi Jennifer, We are very pleased to hear that our location suited you so well, and that our staff were so helpful to you. We certainly aim to please our guests to the very best of our ability. We are always happy to hear that our guests intend to stay with us again, we hope to see you soon!    Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: This site was within walking distance to Disneyland and the price was right. Friendly host and owner who provides discounts for season pass holders to the park. Not bad for the price and location. Walls are not real soundproof and looks a bit questionable from the outside but to us it was worth the stay. Provides hot coffee in the morning at the office, ATM available with soda machine.
Manager Response: Hi, and thank you for choosing to stay with us recently! We were happy to welcome you to our hotel, and we are pleased that you had an enjoyable stay. Customer service is a key focus of ours, so it's good to hear that you were so happy with the service that our staff provided. It sounds as though our hotel was very well suited to your needs, and we hope to welcome you back again when you next visit Disneyland.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Great and friendly customer service. Close to Disneyland. Cleanliness was superb. Although it's on a busy street, it was quiet in the room when it was time to go to bed. Easy check in and out. Welcome candy at the front desk. I'd stay here again and again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your fantastic review. We are so happy that you enjoyed our great customer service, our cleanliness, and our convenient location. We are delighted to hear that you will stay with us again in future.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: I feel I got what I paid for. The room was clean, there was fresh linens and towels and I had no problems with noise. The front desk gentlemen was super friendly. The bed was decent. We will be back again!
Manager Response: We try to offer all of our guests a clean and comfortable room with great amenities and first-class customer service, and we are thrilled to hear that this was your experience on your recent stay. We are delighted that we will be your hotel of choice again next time you are in town.  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: I went with my best friend to Anaheim to visit the parks, and we're looking for an affordable yet comfortable and clean hotel. This hotel was the best choice for us. We decided that if we were to come back we'd stay again :)
Manager Response: Thank you for your first class review. We are delighted you found your stay here clean, comfortable and affordable. We are always pleased to hear that our guests would stay with us again in the future - we look forward to welcoming you back next time your in the area.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Perfect Budget Spot Walking Distance to Disneyland
Summary: We our annual passholders and live about an hour away. Traveling with a 13 month old we like to stay overnight and sometimes 2 nights at a time. We love this place because it is walking distance to the parks(10-15 min), super clean, afforable, and does not charge for parking or a resort fee. Yes, the rooms are a bit outdated. That being said, we don't spend a whole lot of time in the room anyways. Afterall, this is not the Four Seasons here. For what you get and the location this hotel has become our spot when we travel to Disneyland; especially when you add the large fridge and microwave in the rooms. Coco's is right next door and their are pharmacies about 2 blocks away. We look forward to returning in a few months!!
Manager Response: Hi Scott, We are just delighted to be your family's "spot" when you come to Disneyland! We are always delighted to see you, and we really appreciate your lovely review. As you say, we are not the Four Seasons, but we like to think that we provide clean, comfortable accommodation in this area. We can't wait to welcome you back in a few months!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: I give a three for the services but the rooms need to be updated and cleaned better. The manager fixed the tub immediately and was very nice. The bed was not okay, the housekeeping needs to give more detail to the sheets... hmmm.. I used my own. Everything was functioning and overall if your saving money this will work if you can sacrifice comfort.
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear that you experienced good customer service during your stay but we are very sorry to hear that there were some housekeeping issues on your recent visit. Our team works hard to prepare each of our rooms for our guests, and we are very sorry that this was not evident to you on your recent trip. We hope we will have the opportunity to welcome you back again in the future.  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: This was a great room for the price. Walking distance to Disney which is what we wanted. Stayed one night. Bed comfortable. Although outdated it was very clean and staff very helpful. I would absolutely stay here again.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us, and that you would choose to stay with us again - this is exactly the feedback that we want to hear from our guests! We aim to provide all of our guests with a clean, comfortable room with great amenities and friendly service, and we're really happy that's what you received. It's great that our hotel is such a great match for your needs, and we hope to see you again soon!  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: So close to downtown disney and the disney parks. Really nice staff. The rooms are always up to par, clean, and spacious. I stay here everytime i travel down to disneyland! The coffee is good in the morning aswell as the pastries.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us, we are always eager to hear from our regular customers. We are delighted that you enjoy our clean, spacious rooms and friendly staff and it is brilliant to know that we will be your hotel of choice in this area in future.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: The room was clean with a good amount of space...frig, microwave, tv, wifi(free) all were great...They have a pool and parking was included...The bathroom had very good water pressure and plenty of hot water...They have drink vending machines in the front along w/ continental breakfast.  The bed and pillows were comfortable.   The a/c worked well - it runs a little loud but this an older building.  Maintenance and grounds seem fine.  The buses stop every close to the front.  Restaurants are very close too. Lastly - the staff is very nice and helpful.
Manager Response: Hi Kyle, We were delighted to welcome you back to our hotel recently! It's really good to hear that you had another great stay, and that our hotel and facilities are so suitable for your needs. We hope to see you again soon!  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: When I first booked, I honestly didn't know what to expect when I arrived. My sister and I booked for a trip to Disneyland and it ended up being the perfect place! We arrived at 2am, checked in with no issues and arrived to our room that was clean. When we checked out, we were even able to leave our car for a couple more hours to explore Downtown Disney. It's only like a 10 minute walk to the parks, so even after walking around the parks all day, the walk back isn't bad at all, and you save on parking costs which works for me! I would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Hi Kristin, We were delighted to host you and your sister for your Disneyland trip, and we're really happy that you found us to be the perfect hotel for you in this very special area. We're thrilled to hear that you would stay with us again, and we hope to welcome you back soon!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Would definitely stay here again! Family and I stayed two nights while visiting Disneyland. Great price, awesome service, and within walking distance to Disney parks. Room security and parking were great too.
Manager Response: We are really happy to read your review! We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed such a fantastic stay with us! You had exactly the experience that we want to provide for all of our guests, and we are delighted that you intend to stay with us again. We hope to see you again soon!   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Perfect place to rest after your  Disneyland adventures. We were too tired to drive home and we couldn't  pass up the low price, especially for last minute booking.  We will be using Anaheim discovery Inn and suites again.
Manager Response: Hi Brandon, Thank you so much for your kind review. We are delighted that we were able to offer you a comfortable stay at a low price after your Disneyland adventures. It is fantastic to hear that you enjoyed your experience here so much and that you will return to us on your next visit.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Feels like people want to come in, they are checking doors. Cleaning ladies in the morning assume everybody left so they come in and apolgize angrily. I would not reccomend even if the price is cheap, the area isnt comfortable at all.
Manager Response: We are very sorry to hear that you had a poor experience during your recent stay with us. We do try to provide all of our guests with fantastic customer service, and we are disappointed to hear that you did not find this to be the case. We hope you might consider staying with us again to allow us to restore your faith in our services.  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: We stayed here while we went to Disneyland and it was perfect! The room was simple but clean, the bed was comfy, the bathroom nice and a big TV, all for a decent price. The front desk staff were very friendly, parking was easy here, and the walk was quick to Disneyland (~15min). We had a great stay!
Manager Response: Hi Hannah, It was our pleasure to be your host on your recent visit. We are so happy to hear that you had such a lovely stay with us and that you enjoyed all aspects of your visit. Thank you so much for your review. We hope to welcome you back again soon!  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: We are travelling to the USA this year as a family of 7. We tried to book this hotel but in the end, it just got to hard. First we did not get a booking confirmation, then after chasing it for a week, we had the most rude woman on the phone who wanted to cancel our reservation as the manager was not in and it was to hard to email to us! We finally got the manager and when we complained that the service thus far had been poor and the confirmation was still not correct he said he did not want to disappoint us upon arrival so cancelled the reservation himself! Utterly terrible service before we even stayed!
Manager Response: Michael, We are very sorry to hear of your reservation experience. It is a shame that there were so many issues with your reservation, and that you did not get to stay with us. To be honest, our reservation process is quite straight-forward, and not something that we generally get complaints about, so it is most unusual that there were such issues with yours. Thank you for trying to stay with us, maybe it will work out better on another occasion.   Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: We have been customers for over 13 yrs. and its our place to stay, it's close to Disneyland, Disney California Adventures and Downtown Disney, their staff is always friendly and their price it's right.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us once again. We appreciate your loyalty and your continued trust in our hotel and our staff. Rest assured that we will do everything it takes to make us deserving of your loyalty, and we hope to be your hotel of choice when you visit Disneyland for many more years to come!  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Stayed there with my bro, perfect hotel for us. Very affordable, good location (very close to Dysney, great neighborhood), and the people at the front desk were so nice. Rooms were clean, big and well equiped. House keeping everyday, free parking... can't find any cons. Everything were perfect. We would stay there again, we highly recommend it!
Manager Response: Thank you for your rave review! We are so glad you and your brother enjoyed your recent stay with us. We are very lucky to have such a great team working at our hotel, and they will be delighted with your comments. We appreciate your recommendation, and we hope to welcome you back to our hotel again soon. Best wishes, Hotel Management  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: The room was very clean and we were never bothered, front desk people are really nice. The location is perfect snd walking distance to disney. Theres a little grocery store and restaurants that are also very close, we enjoyed our stay. Thank you!
Manager Response: Hi Mayra, We're delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us, and that you benefited from our great location. Thanks very much for your review, in particular, your comments about how comfortable and clean your room was, and our great our front desk team is. We really hope that you'll visit us again.   Sincerly,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Price was right and close to Disneyland Parks. Plenty of parking, clean inside and out. The staff was friendly and helpful. Looks like they went through a remodel recently as paint inside and out looked clean as well. Great room for the price when you'll only be in it to sleep after spending all day at the parks.
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us a perfect rating! I'm sure our entire hotel staff enjoyed catering to your needs as much as you enjoyed your stay, and we're very happy to hear that you liked our rooms so much. We hope that you'll have another opportunity to visit Disneyland again, and that you will choose to stay with us on the next occasion also! Best wishes, Hotel Management  Sincerely,  Customer Care Team

Summary: Pros: Clean, Walking Distance to DL, Fridge & microwave  Cons: Old, worn furniture, HARD bed, expensive for the quality  Stayed here twice now. 1st time room was okay, not bad but not good it was clean and cheaper. This time around it was more expensive and the room we got was pretty bad. Still Clean but the bed was so hard it didn't indent when you sat or laid on it. I actually took a video to show my husband how hard it was. The furniture, tile, basically the whole room was in pretty rough shape. Because the room was mid priced, (there were nicer more expensive hotels & cheaper hotel right around this one) The quality was not worth the price. And when I go I'm just looking for a cheap bed to sleep in as I spend my whole day in the park. I will not be staying here again unless
Manager Response: We are happy that our location and proximity to Disneyland suited you so well, although it's a pity that you didn't enjoy your second stay with us as much as the first. We are very pleased that you found your room to be clean on both occasions, but are sorry that you found the bed to be harder than you would have ideally liked. Rates fluctuate in our hotel, as they do in all hotels in the area, and we are confident that we are always competitive with other similar hotels in this area. We hope that this means that we will welcome you back to our hotel the next time you're in this area. Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: The hotel was within walking distance to a Denny's restaurant and small convenience store, and the Convention Center. Quite and clean. The Downtown Disney was also within walking distance. A lot of families walking around which made me feel at ease when walking alone.
Manager Response: Hi Karen, We were delighted to welcome you to our hotel recently, thank you for choosing to stay with us. We are really happy to hear that you enjoyed your time with us, and that you felt comfortable on your own in the area. Our location is hard to beat, and it's great to hear that it suited your needs so well. We hope to welcome you back again soon! Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: The entire reason we booked here was for the free continental breakfast that was included (staying for a Disney trip, and not wanting to spend the money on 3 Disney meals a day) there was NO breakfast available. We walked in to see a toaster with a loaf of bread, and a pot of coffee. That's IT!  Besides that, the room was also smelly. Like, bad harsh chemical smell. We had to leave the window and door open for the first few hours! The bathroom is also super small.
Manager Response: Hi, and thank you for your feedback. I am unsure where you saw free continental breakfast advertised, as we do not serve breakfast at our hotel, nor do we advertise the fact that we do. We apologize on behalf of our booking partners if one had not updated that information that was made available to them, and we are sorry for the inconvenience that this caused you. We are happy to serve fresh coffee to our guests as they head out in the morning, but this is the extent of the offering that we provide in the morning. Again, we are sorry that you received wrong information, and now that you have our most up to date information on breakfast, we hope that you will stay with us again if your have another opportunity to visit Disneyland. Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Great location, great service. We'll definitely be back!
Summary: The hotel has a great location. Our room had two queen beds, mini fridge and a microwave. The room was big enough for our double stroller, and all of our stuff. Beds were very comfortable. The manager is very helpful, detail oriented and polite.   Good for families. No breakfast, only complimentary coffee in the mornings. It's located close to a Coco's Bakery and a Denny's.
Manager Response: What a lovely review to read! We are delighted to have met your needs so well, and that you enjoyed your stay with us so much. It's great to hear that you intend to stay with us again - we can't wait to welcome you back! Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: As repeat visitors, we have nothing but rave reviews for this hotel. Management has always been so kind to us whenever we need a little favor. (I.e. parking our car at his hotel for free before we're able to check in so we can still play at the parks!) The rooms are clean and the beds are SO comfortable, it's always slightly disappointing to return to my own bed at home! It's a very short 10 minute walk to the entrance of Downtown Disney. There's also several restaurants within a very short walking distance if you need to grab a bite. We've tried many of the hotels in the area and we always return to Anaheim Discovery Inn!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us once again. We appreciate your loyalty and your continued trust in our hotel and our staff. Rest assured that we will do everything it takes to make us deserving of your loyalty; we hope to welcome you back many more times in the future. Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: Thanks for helping with this memorable trip. My kids and I had a great time! I felt safe and comfortable being there. Everyone on staff was very nice and the kept up on the property. It was easy to get back and forth to the parks at a reasonable price!
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to be your host on your recent visit. Thank you for your review, and in particular for mentioning our staff, who always try to take the very best possible care of our guests. We are happy that everything was to your liking, and we look forward to welcoming you back again! Best Wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: Discovery Inn is close to Disneyland about a 10 - 15 minute walk.  They are very accommodating, and helpful.  This is where we stay every time we go to Disneyland.  Rooms are clean and pricing is a good value.  We are out of the room most of the day at the parks and I am comfortable walking back to the hotel at night.  I feel safe.
Manager Response: We're really delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us. We aim to provide all of our guests with a clean, comfortable room in this great location, and we're really happy that's what you received. We hope that you will have an opportunity to visit us again - we'd love to welcome you back. Warm regards, Hotel Management

Summary: We needed an inexpensive clean place to stay within walking distance of Disneyland. This place fit the bill perfectly. The staff was friendly and helpful. The rooms were clean and the beds comfortable.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to leave your review. We were delighted to have you stay with us recently, and we are equally delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay so much. It's great to hear that you appreciated the value that we provide in this location. We hope to see you again soon! Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: The room was very clean and the management extremely helpful. It is within walking distance of Downtown Disney and both parks, so it was convenient. Discovery Inn has all the amenities necessary for a shorter or longer stay.
Manager Response: Hi Leslee, I am pleased to hear that you found our location to your liking, and that you had a pleasing stay with us.
