Cleanliness and providing an excellent level of customer care are very much priorities for us, and we are happy that you were pleased with these aspects of your stay. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back to our hotel soon! Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: We booked this hotel because it was within walking distance to Disneyland and we got a great price through hotels.com.  We really didn't expect much but were pleasantly surprised.  It was a great room, neat, clean and recently remodeled.  It was perfect for our trip to Disneyland.  The staff was very accommodating!  They even let us park our car in the parking lot so we could head over to Disneyland before checking in.   We have already recommended them to others. We will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Hi, and thank you for your review. We are delighted that we exceeded your expectations, and that you enjoyed your room so much. We are always delighted to get positive feedback regarding our fantastic team, so thank you for that! It's great to hear guests say that they will stay with us again, we hope to welcome you back soon! Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: Had a wonderful stay at Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites! The room was clean and comfortable. Perfect location for a short walk to disneyland. Check in and check out was quick and easy. Would highly recommend!
Manager Response: Hi Emma, Thank you very much for your recommendation! We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us so much, and that our hotel met all of your needs. We hope that you will have an opportunity to visit Disneyland again, and that once again, we will be your hotel of choice. Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: Awesome Service, really close to Disneyland and easy to get in and out. Nice pool area and everything was pretty close to where we were staying.   Heaps of stuff to do around the place and also had heaps of panflets for you to look at :)
Manager Response: Hi, It's great to hear that we were such a great accommodation option for your for your Disney visit! We are delighted to hear that you were so happy with your stay, and that you enjoyed your visit to this fantastic area! We hope to welcome you back soon! Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: My stay at this hotel was awesome. It's really close to Disneyland and by some good restaurants. The staff is very friendly and helpful. I will be staying here again and I will tell my friends. Great hotel to choose.
Manager Response: Thank you for your awesome review Lisa! We are just delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us so much, and that you found our staff to be so helpful. It's great to hear that you intend to stay with us again, and we appreciate your recommendation to your friends, thank you! Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: We'll go back every time we're at Disney! Great for young kids
Summary: The staff at the front desk was very helpful, friendly, and accommodating. We have two young children, ages one and four, and this hotel was very convenient for a number of reasons. First off, we were able to park directly outside our room door when we arrived. This was extremely helpful in loading/unloading the kids and their things. Second, being on the ground floor! This goes along with the first, but it was so nice to be able to walk in from the parks(very short walk, excellent location!) and just wheel the stroller in the door. Third, the layout of the room. The room had two beds. One in the regular set up, in a larger space with a television, refrigerator, microwave, alarm clock, and phone. The second bed in the room was in its own little room. Bonus- no windows in the
Manager Response: What a fantastically detailed review - thank you! We are just delighted to have met the needs of your family so well, and we are just thrilled to hear that you intend to stay with us on any future Disney trips that you make. We hope that you'll have an opportunity to come back soon! Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: Great price for how close it was to Disneyland. The workers were awesome especially at 2 in the morning, they were very professional and just all around great. Whenever we go back we will definitely be staying here again.
Manager Response: Hi Monique, We're delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us, and that you benefited so much from our great location. Thanks very much for your review, in particular your comments about how friendly our staff are. We really hope that you'll visit this fantastic region again soon, we can't wait to be your hosts! Best regards, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for
Summary: Anaheim discovery inn & suites was a decent place we stayed at to keep costs at a minimum. It was a couples trip to sleep for a night and get to explore the wonders of Disneyland and California adventure. There was unfortunately a few hairs in the bathroom shower that made me feel uncomfortable, but great value and we barely were at the motel anyways. Decent motel.
Manager Response: We are happy to have met your accommodation needs at a reasonable price for your Disney and California adventure, although we are very sorry to hear of the hairs in your shower. This should obviously not have happened, and we apologize for any discomfort that it caused you. We hope that you will get to explore more of this wonderful area on a future trip, and that we will be your hotel of choice. Thank you for your feedback. Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: We loved how close it was to Disney! Pretty divey, beds are hard as a rock, but if you go hard at Disneyland like we did all day, you're tired enough at night that you'll sleep well anyway. Floors were super dirty too, but honestly we needed somewhere affordable, close to Disney, and just somewhere to sleep at night since we opened and closed the park every day we were there. We did love the flexibility with checking in late.
Manager Response: Hi Brittany, We are most fortunate to have Disneyland right on our doorstep, and we are happy to have provided you with such a convenient place to stay for your Disney trip. We are very sorry that the floor in your room does not appear to have been cleaned to our usual standard, and we will discuss this with our housekeeping team to ensure that this does not arise again. We hope that you will have an opportunity to visit Disney again soon, and that we will be your hosts when you do. Thank you for your feedback. Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: Need something close to Disneyland, which is clean and friendly, this is your place. I stay here often and have never had any complaints. It is close to the park and easily accessible. They are knowledgeable about special programs at Disneyland Resort and I have recommended them to many of my friends, with no complaints.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5-star review! We are thrilled to hear that you always enjoy your stay with us, and that you have recommended our hotel to so many people = thank you, we really appreciate that. I look forward to sharing your kind words with our team, and hope to welcome you back again soon. Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: Descent place to leave your suitcase and go have fun at the theme parks  Furniture needs to be cleaned  Beds were very comfortable  Appliances were nice to have but to noisy. We moved ours to the bathroom while we stayed  Very close to down town Disney  Staff were friendly   Would stay again if I were to go to the parks
Manager Response: Hi Richard, It's great to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us, and that you found us to be such a great location to visit Disneyland from. We are happy that you found our beds to be comfortable, and trust that you were well rested each morning for a busy day! We always love to hear guests say that they would stay with us again, we hope to welcome you back soon. Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: Stayed here for our disneyland trip room looked like it was renovated was very clean and spacious it has a microwave and a small fridge with television when we were out our rooms were cleaned each day and it was a short walk to disney theme parks it also has free parking with free WiFi and a small pool would definitely stay here again
Manager Response: I am pleased to hear that you find our location to your liking. We really are ideally placed for visiting both Disneyland and the Convention Center. We appreciate your feedback, and we hope that we will be your hotel of choice when you are next in the area. Next time you visit Anaheim, CA please call us direct 714-533-4505.  best, Hotel Management

Summary: Manager is friendly and helpful.  Hotel is a close walk to Disney. Hotel beds are comfy. We always stay at this hotel. Very nice staff. Double rooms are large. Always well kept up. Manager always goes above and beyond for the guests.
Manager Response: Hi Rebecca, We're delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us, and that you benefited so much from our great location. Thanks very much for your review, in particular your comments about how comfortable and clean your room was, and how friendly our staff are. We are delighted to be your hotel of choice when you visit Disneyland, and we hope to remain so for future visits! Best regards, Hotel Management

Summary: This room was everything we needed: comfortable bed, very clean, walking distance from Disneyland, and free parking and wifi! The manager was very accommodating and welcoming as well. We will definitely be coming back.
Manager Response: Hi James, We appreciate you taking the time to leave your review. We were delighted to have you stay with us recently, and we are equally delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay so much. We hope that you will stay with us again if you get another opportunity to visit Disneyland, we would love to welcome you back! Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Great hotel for Disneyland/Anaheim Convention Center
Summary: I've been using the hotel for a few years whenever I go to either Disneyland or events at the Anaheim Convention Center. The hotel is within easy walking distance to both, and the owner/manager (Nitesh) is very friendly and accommodating.
Manager Response: I am delighted to hear that we have been part of so many journeys that you've taken, for both business and pleasure. I hope that you will stay with us many more times on forthcoming trips. Our staff are always ready to welcome you, and we thank you for your loyalty. Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: Amazing stay. I would recommend it anytime,as rooms are clean,friendly staff,close to all amenties. The wifi connection was great.If i needed help with getting around to or to find something the staff and management are their for you.
Manager Response: We're delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us, and that you benefited so much from our great location. Thanks very much for your review, in particular your comments about how friendly our staff are. We really hope that you'll visit this area again, and that you will allow us to be your hosts! Best regards, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Great hotel for staying at Disneyland!
Summary: Due to an early flight, we arrived at the hotel a couple hours before our room was ready. The manager was allowed us to change and offered to hold our bags for us while we got lunch. When we returned, we were gratefully pleased to hear that our room was upgraded from a queen to a king. The room was very clean, and was cleaned nicely each day that we stayed. The hotel is on the backside of Disneyland California Adventures which makes walking to Downtown Disney very short. For the park entrance, and returning back to the room, I recommend the ART shuttle. It's about $5 a day and picks you up/drops you off right in front of the neighboring Best Western Stovall's. There is a pool with lots of seating and lounging chairs, but the shade covers the pool for a good portion of the day.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us so much! We are always happy to facilitate our guests as best we can, so thank you for acknowledging our efforts to accommodate you by providing you with somewhere to change, looking after your bags, and upgrading your room. We appreciate your detailed feedback, and we are particularly pleased that you mentioned how helpful the manager on duty was, by helping you with directions and transport options. It's also great to hear that you enjoyed the facilities in your room. We hope that you had a fantastic time at Disneyland, and we hope that you will have an opportunity to visit again. We would love to be your hosts on your next visit! Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Great Stay, We will be staying here again.
Summary: Great place to stay. So close to Disneyland and Downtown Disney. The room was clean and well furnished. The air and heat worked well. Nice and quiet so you never heard other guests or cars in the parking lot. Price is very reasonable. We will stay here again for sure.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to leave your review. We were delighted to have you stay with us recently, and we are equally delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay so much. It's great that our location and our property suited your needs so well. We love to hear guests say that they intend to stay with us again, we can't wait to welcome you back! Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: Thank you it was a nice stay close to Disneyland and very convenience. I would recommend this hotel to any one. The staff was friendly and curiously. They had a Continental breakfast and were helpful with directions of California's
Manager Response: We are just delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us, and that our property was such a fantastic place to base yourself for exploring Disneyland. It's great to hear that our staff were so helpful to you. We hope that you had a really great trip, and we hope that you'll get an opportunity to come back to Disneyland - we would love to be your hotel of choice. Thank you for your review and your recommendation! Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: Had a wonderful stay thank you I would most likely coming back my kids loved it everything was perfect everything was nice and clean and loved how everyday we got clean sheets and towels thanks again see you soon
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to leave your review. We were delighted to have you and your family stay with us recently, and we are equally delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay so much. We hope to welcome you back the next time you are in this area! Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: Hot water stopped working and the front desk attendant started to check the rooms. Instead of knocking on our door she decided it was okay to let herself in even with our "privacy please" door hanger on the door. I would of appreciated a knock especially because it was in the evening and we were getting ready for bed. She walked in on us in our underwear and it was very embarrassing
Manager Response: We are very sorry that we had a water issue during your stay, and that you were put in an embarrassing situation. Our policy is to knock on any guest door prior to entering, regardless of whether or not they have the privacy sign on the door. It seems that our front desk clerk knocked gently, but we apologize profusely for the embarrassment that you felt.  Thank you for your feedback, we do hope that the remainder of your stay was enjoyable, and that you will choose to stay with us again in the future - we would love to welcome you back.   Best wishes,  Hotel Management

Summary: I really enjoyed staying at the Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites. Very friendly staff and a comfortable room. Nothing was too much trouble. Close to the Convention Centre, Disneyland and shopping. What more could you ask?
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your comfortable room, and that you found our staff to be so friendly. Our location is definitely a big advantage, and we hope that you made the most of it! Thank you very much for taking the time to leave your review; we hope to welcome you back to our property very soon! Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: Stayed for a night and double room was decent. Bathroom is compact. Parking space is limited so ask if any convention is happening around time of visit or you lose a spot. Overall, I would come again.
Manager Response: Hi, We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us, and that you would choose to stay with us again. We hope that you enjoyed our location, and our proximity to Disney, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back again soon! Thank you for your review. Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: The hotel is overall pretty nice and the staff was very friendly and was very helpful with some rescheduling issues I had to make due to the storm that had just come through. They were very nice and helpful about it and convenient.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to be your host on your recent visit. Thank you for your review, and in particular for mentioning our staff, who always try to take the very best possible care of our guests. We are happy that we were able to help you rearrange your plans, we do try to accommodate and facilitate our guests in any way possible. We do hope that we will welcome you back to our property again. Best Wishes, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Discovery Inn review for Disney Vacation
Summary: Don't bother staying here. The guy at the front desk was alright but that's about all that was good about this place. The room smelled terrible, felt dirty, bed wasn't comfortable, no counter space in the bathroom, TINY bathroom... just don't bother with this place, pay a little more for something WAY more comfortable.
Manager Response: We are very sorry that our property did not meet your needs during your recent stay. It's a shame that you didn't voice your dissatisfaction to us during your stay, and we could have offered you an alternate room. Thank you for sharing your feedback with us, we do appreciate it. Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: Free parking! Free Wi-Fi! Great location! Manager was nice. Beds had a pillow top and it was very comfortable.  In regards to the location, it is close to the back entrance of Downtown Disney. Easy access to the park by monorail and it will drop you off right into Tomorrowland.
Manager Response: Thank you for your stellar review! We're glad we could provide you with a pleasant and comfortable place to stay, with free parking and wifi in a convenient location for visiting Disney. We hope to welcome you back again soon next time you are in the area. Thanks again. Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: SImple yet comfortable. Service with a smile from all staff. Spacious rooms, plenty of storage, basic necessities. Great location - close to theme parks, public transport and amenities. Sparkling pool, always clean. Neat premises all round.
Manager Response: What a lovely review! Thank you for taking the time to go into so much detail to demonstrate all of the facilities that pleased you. You had the experience that we want to provide for each and every one of our guests. We do hope that you'll be back to stay with us again soon. Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Another great stay at Anaheim Discovery Inn
Summary: We returned to the Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites this month for our vacation at Anaheim. Again we experienced a pleasurable stay.  From booking direct with the management team through to our departure, everything went smoothly and the friendly staff are only too happy to assist. The Anaheim Discovery Inn will be the first preference for our next trip to Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you Wayne for your lovely review! It is always a pleasure to welcome you back to our property, and we are delighted that, once again, you had a great stay. We are already looking forward to welcoming you back again! Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: 3 day stay was a pleasant one. Management was helpful and available. My room was clean with microwave and fridge inside which was nice. Very affordable with good location. I will stay here again for sure.
Manager Response: I am happy to learn that you enjoyed the value of our hotel and the amenities of our rooms. We appreciate that you have acknowledged our efforts to provide a hospitable experience for our guests. Thank you for taking the time to share your positive experience. We look forward to welcoming you back again. Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Good value for money, great location.
Summary: This was a short walk to the conference center and Disneyland, it was good value for money. There isn't an airport transfer, but the Disneyland shuttle comes by. No breakfast, but there is a fridge in the room and they have coffee in the morning.
Manager Response: Thank you sincerely for your feedback. We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us so much, and that we provided such great value for you in this location. We hope that you will make a return trip to this area - we would love the opportunity to welcome you back! Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: You Get What You Pay For
Summary: We spent two nights and the first night realized there was not a working bathtub. Wanted to take a bubble bath and couldn't. Then the maid left our room unlocked while we were at the park all day. The next morning we saw a roach crawling on the table you eat on. Sorry but we won't be staying here in the future.
Manager Response: We are sorry that you did not have a perfect stay with us. It is a shame that you did not let us know about the bathtub during your stay - we would have been happy to offer you an alternate room. We apologize if your room was left open, this was obviously a mistake by one member of staff. We work with pest control experts regularly to ensure that we do not have an issue in this regard, and we are checking all rooms immediately after your comment. We would love the opportunity to give you a fantastic stay with us, and hope to welcome you back at some stage. Thank you for your review. Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: Easy to locate and easy accessible. Very clean and spacious rooms, quiet area, friendly, helpful staff and most importantly only a short 10 minute walk to Disneyland. Would definitely recommend and stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your lovely review! We're glad we could provide you with a pleasant and comfortable place to stay, in a fantastically convenient location to Disneyland. Thanks again for recommending us, we appreciate that sentiment, and we hope to welcome you back again on your next Disney trip! Thanks again, and Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: The only thing nice about this "hotel" is the location to Disneyland, which was the purpose for our visit. I wasn't expecting perfection, it was only $100 a night, but, I would have liked to stand up straight in the shower. Shower head only good if you're 5'5 or shorter. The linens were thin and scratchy, the fridge made noise all night. And they have shutters instead of black-out curtains so you could see the parking lot  lights all  night and the sun in the morning.
Manager Response: Whilst it's great that you enjoyed the value that we provide and our proximity to Disneyland, we are sorry that we did not meet your expectations during your stay. We appreciate your feedback, and want to thank you for taking the time to leave it. Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: I’ve been coming to this hotel for several years now. The new owner - a very friendly Indian gentleman has done a very good job in improving the facility. He has decided to upgrade gradually everything. This January we had a Wifi cover in the whole area (in the past only close to the reception). Morning coffee and the light breakfast is not advertised or charged but is served every morning from 06:30 am. Our room contained all necessary gear to survive a business trip or a MickeyMouse weekend do - fridge and microwave saves money on a junk fast food. If you are not used to dwelling in a Hilton style hotels - this is for you.. Jan Adam/Prague
Manager Response: Hi Jan, We are just delighted to read your review! We have worked very hard over the past while to improve our product and service for all of our guests, and it really is lovely to hear that it is noticed and appreciated by a long-term guest such as yourself. We appreciate you taking the time to leave your feedback, and we hope to welcome you back many times in the years to come. Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: The breakfast is a joke. There is some bread and a toaster. After check in it was realized that my booking was actually for the same date in 2017 rather then 2016. The payment was processed upon check-in and I was given my room. Upon returning from Disneyland at 8pm with my pregnant wife we found we were locked out of our room by management who demanded a 40% increase of payment of what was signed off in the morning. I understand that this was my mistake, but management had accepted me in at that rate. I was basically being extorted by the hotel as it was getting late and they knew I had limited options. Overall I think it speaks to the character of management. A typical hotel would help someone out rather then extorting them. Note that although there is free parking it is
Manager Response: Sean, It's a real shame that the error in your booking got your stay with us off to such a bad start. Our rates fluctuate according to many things, and we apologize for the fact that we didn't confirm the appropriate rate at the time of your check-in. We understand your frustration that this wasn't done, and we are sincerely sorry for the inconvenience that was caused to your and your wife on your return that night. Thank you for choosing to stay with us, and for providing us with your review. Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Great little diamond in the rough
Summary: Doesn't look like much from the outside but it's a comfy and clean room great place to lay your head at night.  Friendly staff.  Walking distance to Disneyland and California adventure. Didn't use the pool as it was cold and looked dirty but everything else was clean and great.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your feedback Rebecca. We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us so much, and that we were a convenient base for your Disney trip. It's great to hear that you enjoyed your clean, comfortable room, and that you found our staff to be so friendly - you had exactly the experience that we want to provide for every guest. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back again very soon! Best wishes< Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Great value for a Disney escape!
Summary: Staff were helpful, room was clean and bed was comfy. An easy 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland. Super convenient and the man on reception was very friendly and helpful. My smoke alarm was beeping and he fixed it immediately!
Manager Response: Hi Claire, thank you sincerely for your lovely review, and thank you for appreciating the fact that little inconveniences can happen from time to time, but we fix the problem and resolve the issue as quickly as we possibly can. We appreciate your understanding. It's great that you enjoyed your stay with us so much, and we hope to welcome you back again soon. Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: Great room for the money! Clean, can park in front of room, comfortable beds and sheeting.   Nice staff.    Small pool by the road but clean and an extra perk.  A big thumbs up!   Will stay here again.   A secret little find in an expensive world.
Manager Response: Thank you for your lovely review! We're delighted that we were able to provide you with such a great place to stay at a reasonable price, and that you enjoyed your visit so much. We hope that you 'll find a reason to come back to your secret find very soon! Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: I stayed here on two occasions and I loved the privacy. You couldn't hear anyone in the adjoining rooms, it was the right place to rest your head after a long day! Clean rooms, honest staff, I really couldn't ask for more.
Manager Response: We are delighted that you had a wonderful stay with us and that you found our staff to be friendly and the hotel to be so clean and private. Thank you for your feedback,  we hope to welcome you back again on your next visit to the area. Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: Well I feel that all the Hotels at Anaheim are overpriced. Obviously it 's just the price you have to pay to go to Disney. Nothing about the Disney, Anaheim location is priced very well. That being said, the Discovery Hotel was very nice and accomadating.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review. We are pleased to see that you found us to be a nice, accommodating place to stay for your visit to Disney. We hope that you had a wonderful time, and that you will stay with us if you make another Disney trip. Best Wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: The front desk staff members were very friendly and let me check in early after a long bus ride.  Room was clean and comfortable and on first floor, which was convenient.  The building was an easy route  to the Disney parks which was great since I was traveling alone and didn't want to get lost at night.
Manager Response: Hi Kelly, We are so happy to read that you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for mentioning our front desk team - we are always delighted to allow our guests to check-in early when possible, and it's great that we were able to facilitate you in this way. We hope that you had a wonderful Disney visit, and we hope that you'll make a return visit very soon!  Best Wishes, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Good value close to the park
Summary: This place is great for its proximity to DL. Definitely will be back. It's not a fancy hotel, but it serves its purpose. The room with 2 queen beds was actually 2 bedrooms with 2 separate beds. It's an older motel and it shows its age gracefully. They are doing upgrades in the bathrooms.  Very clean and comfortable beds with pillows that don't go flat. You are greeted in  the  room with a very nice fragrant smell on arrival,not a musty odor.   A few cons : the 12" deep counter in the bathroom was slanting down and difficult to put anything on. The top mount handle for the toilet was tucked under the edge of the counter and difficult to flush.  Nitesh, the GM, was very nice and check in was painless.  Will be back in the future.
Manager Response: Hi Don, Thanks a million for your kind words - we obviously love getting this type of feedback. It's great that you enjoyed your stay with us so much, and that you benefitted from our location and our complimentary amenities. We hope that you'll make a return visit very soon. Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary: Overall excellent hotel very near the Park within walking distance. We were able to leave the park to freshen up and go back within 30 mins. Only downside is the $100 hold on card that took a few days to be be returned.
Manager Response: It's really great to hear that we were such a great location for your Christmas Disney trip, and we hope that you and your family really enjoyed the holidays. We're sorry that you were inconvenienced by the hold on your card, we do release this immediately at check-out, but unfortunately some banks can take a number of days to release it back to the customer. We hope that you weren't too inconvenienced by this. Thank you for choosing to stay with us over the holidays, we hope that you'll be back again during the year! Best Wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: This is my 4th time staying at this hotel and i have yet to have any problem with it. It is close to everything you would need and there are restaurants close that are open 24 hrs and is within walking distance to the Disneyland parks. The management had been very friendly every time i have been there and after my first visit, my room has been upgraded at no additional charge. I have already booked my room there for both my visits next year and i will look forward to many more in the coming years. If you are looking for a good room at an affordable price i would definitely suggest this hotel as it has everything you would want.
Manager Response: Hi Walter, Thank you for your feedback! We always love hearing from guests who stay with us frequently, and we're delighted to hear that you have two more visits planned already! We're delighted that you appreciate the upgrades that you've been given, we're delighted to do this for regular guests whenever it's possible. Thank you for choosing us, and we can't wait to welcome you back later in the year! Best Wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: Owners were so nice and helpful with room and parks information and room was very clean and comfortable. We even got upgraded for free, a nice surprise after much difficulty with airlines. Would go again!
Manager Response: We just love making our guests stays as pleasant as possible, and we're really pleased that we were able to do that for you after you had problems with your airlines. We appreciate your comment about our comfort and cleanliness - this is our priority for all of our guests. Thank you for choosing to stay with us, we hope to welcome you back again very soon. Best Wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: I've stayed here many times with varying groups of people and every time is a pleasant stay. The beds are very comfortable, the rooms are clean, and the location is fantastic! We've stayed at many Disneyland area hotels and this is the one we come back to and recommend to our friends.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your feedback with us. It's really great to hear that you had such a wonderful stay, and we always love getting feedback from regular guests. Thank you for recommending us, and we hope to see you back again very soon! Best Wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: The motel seems to be newly renovated, and everything looks great! It was quiet and safe, and very close to the Disney attractions. The staff was also very friendly and helpful. During the last day, we checked out in the morning, but was still going to Disneyland for that day, we were allowed to leave the car there till night time. Free parking! Overall, it was a great experience.
Manager Response: Hi, We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed our hotel, our location, and our hospitality. A lot of our guests tell us that they just love staying with us on their trips to Disney, we like to facilitate our guests when we can, by allowing them to park in our lot on the day of their checkout. Thank you so much for your review, we sincerely hope to welcome you back again soon.   Best Regards,  Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Excellent service and clean place to lay your head
Summary: This is an older hotel. I wanted convenience and comfort and I got more. Staff was great to my kids and helpful. It was a ten minute walk to downtown Disney. The walls are thin so people need to be considerate of neighbors. Pool was clean but cold. I appreciated the warm coffee served every morning as I was there with my three little one's. I would definitely return and recommend. My daughter didn't like the plastic cover on her mattress but lived with it, I didn't have one on my bed. The beds were comfortable and the shower was warm.
Manager Response: We are delighted that you had such an enjoyable stay with us, and that you took the time to leave us such a positive review. We are pleased that you agree that our rooms are very comfortable, and that our staff are fantastic. We'll be sure to pass your comments onto the team, and we hope to welcome you back to the hotel again soon.   Kind Regards,  Hotel Management.

Summary: Best place to stay to go to Disneyland: close enough to walk to the park, and leave your car at the hotel (avoiding the high price of parking at Disneyland and dealing with over-crowded shuttles. The management is friendly, personable, and attentive. This has been our place to stay when at Disneyland and will remain so.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing to stay with us for your recent visit to Disneyland. We are delighted that we were able to be such a great base for you, and that staying with us allowed you to avoid the inconvenience of parking and shuttles We are delighted that you intend to come back and stay again - we hope that we'll be welcoming you back very soon. We're looking forward to it already!   Best Wishes,  Hotel Management

Summary: Worth serious booking consideration.  Close to several freeways and nearby restaurants (fast food to gourmet price range/selection).  QUIET location right on Katella!  Easy walk to Disney, convention center and Honda center.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with such a great review. Our guests generally love our location - as you say, we are close to so many amenities. We hope that you'll come back to stay with us again soon!   Best wishes,  Hotel Management

Summary: We stay here for 3 nights and had a family room. The rooms are not huge , but the are clean and safe. The staff were very helpful to us when it came to ordering a cab, getting extra blankets and giving directions. This is by no means a fancy hotel , if fancy is what you want do not stay here. If you are looking for clean, safe , close to Disney and nice staff at a decent price then this is definitely a win !
Manager Response: We always love getting reviews that mention our friendly staff! We pride ourselves on providing the best possible service to our guests, and we're so happy that this was evident to you. We would love you to stay with us again the next time you're in the area.   Best wishes,  Hotel Management

Summary: Our room was clean, albeit very basic. Two beds, a refrigerator, microwave, and a bathroom. The rooms are small but for this visit they served their purpose : clean, inexpensive rooms near the park. Only upon looking for my son's missing toy did I find that the mattress and box spring covers were stained pretty badly, but that was on the last day so I didn't find much point in saying anything. The other room on our reservation had a few beetles or something hanging around, but it was on the ground floor and it seemed like the door seals had a gap so that's probably why. One of our towels had holes in it, that surprised me. Front desk staff wasn't overly friendly nor were they unfriendly. It was just very basic.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for providing us with such detailed feedback. It is comments such as yours that help us to improve the offering that we provide to our guests, and we will certainly look into all of your comments to see where we can improve. We are happy that you found your room clean - this is a basic standard that we aim to provide to all of our guests without exception. Thank you again for your review; we hope that you will give us an opportunity to restore your faith in us the next time you're in the area.   Best Regards,  Hotel Management.

Summary: If you're going to Disneyland, this hotel is a great location! You can cut through the lobby of the Grand Californian and be in California Adventure or downtown Disney within 5-10 minutes walking. The rooms are dated, especially the bathroom, but they are clean! Can't really beat the price of this place!!
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing your recent stay with us. We are delighted that you found us to be such a great location - all of our guests generally feel the same. We aim to be a clean , comfortable, affordable option for our guests, and we're really happy that we met this standard for you. We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit Disney - hopefully you'll get another opportunity soon!   Best Regards,  Hotel Management.

Summary: I spend two nights. Easy to access to disneyland park, and very safety. Spend most time in disneyland, but it's worth to stay this hotel. Easy to go back to hotel to pick up clothes. If you want breakfast, you can have coffee and bread at the front office.
Manager Response: It's great that you found us to be such a great location to base yourself for your Disney visit. We're delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us, and we hope that we'll have the opportunity to welcome you back again soon.   Best wishes,  Hotel Management.

Summary: What a great hotel. Great rooms, clean and tidy with friendly staff and one of the best spots in Anhaiem. A few doors down is Coco's Bakery - a great priced meal anytime of the day and it is a 10-15min walk to the Disneyland Resort (Downtown Disney, Theme Parks). I will be back to stay here. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Thanks very much for taking the time to leave us such a positive review. We're delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us so much, and that you found us to be such a convenient location. It's always great to hear guests say that they will visit us again - hopefully it will not be too long before we get to welcome you back.   Best Regards,  Hotel Management

Summary: Great room for the price!!!  Friendly staff.  My only complaint would be other guests a little loud.  Loved having an extra bedroom.  Very clean.  Free Wifi and parking a bonus.  Very short walk to Disnelyand :-)
Manager Response: Thanks a million for your kind words - we obviously love getting this type of feedback. It's great that you enjoyed your stay with us so much, and that you benefitted from our location and our complimentary amenities. We hope that you'll make a return visit very soon.   Best wishes,  Hotel Management.

Summary: We checked in a little after midnight last Wednesday/Thursday morning (Thanksgiving). Our room REEKED of cleanser, to the point that you could taste it. But after a longer than usual drive due to holiday traffic, we didn’t call down to try to switch rooms as we’d requested to be next door to the rest of our party and it was approaching 1am by the time we were breaking out our inhalers. Strike one. Friday night we came back to our room to find it in disarray, many things had been moved around and our window was wide open, we quickly noticed the carpets were wet. NOT a pleasant feeling to suddenly have wet socks. The ironing board was tripped over in the bathroom (it had previously been in the “closet nook”). I am all for cleaning the carpets, don’t get me wrong, but return and
Manager Response: We are very disappointed and sorry to have dropped the ball on so many issues during your recent stay with us. Your experience is not at all typical for our guests, and we really regret the fact that you left with such a poor impression of us. We are looking into all of your comments to ensure that the issues that you raised are addressed and do not recur. We would really appreciate the opportunity to restore your faith in us, and we really think that we could do that if you came back to stay again. We would love to show you the type of stay that the vast majority of our guests receive. Thanks again for your feedback, we do appreciate it. Best Regards, Hotel Management.

Summary: Great hotel! I will stay here every time I go to Disneyland. Staff was friendly and had everything I needed. Close to restaurants and walking distance to the theme parks and downtown Disney. Stayed here for a few days and it was perfect
Manager Response: Hi there, we are so pleased to read about your stay with us. We are really delighted to see that everything was to your liking. We hope to welcome you back again next time you visit the area. Thank you for your review!  Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: I truly enjoyed our stay at the discovery inn. We were able to park directly outside of the room, and it was raining so it was nice to have the access to the car. My wife is disabled. He provided extra pillow for Janice which was also very much appreciated on a very busy night. The room was comfortable had a great heater and we enjoyed it. I personally like the fact that we got so many channels on television.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are pleased to read that we exceeded your expectations, and our staff was very helpful. Thanks again, we look forward to welcoming you back again soon!  Best,  Hotel Management

Summary: Great room for the price.  It was just my wife and I and we got a two bedroom unit.  Comfortable bed and you couldn't ask for a better location with Disneyland walking distance and two good family type restaurants just steps away.
Manager Response: A hidden Jewel? That's quite the compliment, and we're beyond flattered. Nothing gives us more pleasure than to know our guests had a wonderful stay with us. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon next time you visit Anaheim.   Best wishes,  Hotel Management

Summary: Clean room with no major complaints, do wish the tub had a stopper for ice/ epsom salt bath after the race. We stayed here for the Avengers half marathon weekend. Convenient and easy access for the race.
Manager Response: Hi there, thank you for your review and for your feedback. We will definitely look into it! Hope you enjoyed the race! We hope to welcome you back again next time visit the area.  Best, Hotel Management

Summary: Good place to stay if you are looking for a cheap price and close to disneyland its just 15 min walk and the restaurants are just 5 min drive and some you dont need to drive its close to the lodge and its only 20 min drive to knotts berry
Manager Response: Your title for this review says it all:) thank you so much for your review. We hope you will give us another opportunity to host you when you are in the area next. We hope to make you next stay even better!  Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: The hotel was within walking distance of the park (about a mile), not too noisy considering location, close to food, clean rooms and easy check in when we got there. We would definitely stay here again in the future!
Manager Response: Wow! we are really delighted to read wonderful comments. Thank you so much for taking the time to write to us. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!  Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: just stay somewheres else not worth it
Summary: they have roaches. when i told the front desk the told me they did not have any. the management is a joke and will lie to you about doing anything about a credit, just a nightmare of a experience. and there breakfast of just a loaf of bread and butter.
Manager Response: Dear guest, we are shocked at your remarks regarding your recent stay with us, and we want to reassure you that your experience is not typical of what our guests receive, and we are taking your comments very seriously. We are sorry that you saw a cockroach. We work with pest control experts regularly to ensure this does not happen. Please know that we have checked all the room thoroughly again and found no indication of this issue. As for the complimentary amenities, we do not offer breakfast, but we do offer fresh coffee in the morning from 6:30 AM to 9:30 AM.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Great value very close to Disney
Summary: I enjoyed staying here. Friendly staff, very close to Disney and affordable. The bed was a pillow top, and I slept very well. It was quiet and comfortable. I would recommend Discovery Inn, I'll be staying here again.
Manager Response: We're really happy to hear that you found us an affordable place to base yourself in Anaheim. If there's one thing we want, it's for you to have a good night's sleep in our little home away from home. I hope this means you'll be back again someday on your next visit.  Best, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: It's a place to sleep within walking distance to the park.
Summary: The room was fine. Nothing exciting. The furniture was mismatched and outdated, but it had a refrigerator and a bed. Since we were spending our entire day at Disney, it simply served its purpose of a place to sleep. For this - it was fine.
Manager Response: Hi Mike, we're really happy that you enjoyed your stay with us, found our hotel and amenities perfect for your needs. Hope you had a wonderful visit, we are looking forward to your next visit to Anaheim area.

Summary: Disneyland is a 15 minute walk from the hotel or a 10$ cab fare.  There are affordable dining options close by and a 2am liquor store is a 5 minute walk away.  The room was clean but the cleaner smell was so strong that it stuck to all of my belongings. The room was equipped with a fridge, microwave and air conditioner. The air conditioner gave off a very bad odour though and we could not leave it on.  There was also a TV in the room and free wireless internet. The beds were relatively comfortable. The pillows just need to be replaced.  One surprise I had was that the doors to the rooms are accessible outside and I was expecting the security of a locked hotel.  This made the rooms less private as well because the windows faced the parking lot and there are no elevators so we had
Manager Response: We're really happy to hear that you found us an convenient place to base yourself in Anaheim. We hope that you enjoyed your trip to Disneyland, and that you will come to again soon. Thank you for your wonderful review.  Best, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Great price for such a convenient location
Summary: Wow, I cannot say enough about this hotel. Yes, it is a little older but for the price and convenience of this location you can't get much better. We were traveling from out of state and arrived about an hour before check in. They we so nice and let us check in early after our long drive without charging any extra. We asked for recommendations on nearby places to eat, and the gentleman that helped us gave many options to choose from. It is literally across the street from the park, and a short 10-15 min walk to the gates of Disneyland. My only complaint would be the mattress quality, but I have a hard time sleeping away from home anyway. I will definitely stay here on our next trip, thank you again!
Manager Response: Dear Anony, thank you so much for taking the time to share your five star experience with us. We are so happy our amenities and location were able to accommodate your needs. We hope you enjoyed your time exploring and we hope to see you in the future. Thank you for choosing our hotel.

Summary: Not a fancy place by any means, but clean and cheap with friendly staff. Stayed here for a trip to Disneyland. Had no need for a fancy place. Would only really be sleeping there. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for such a kind review. We are delighted to see that you enjoyed all aspects of your stay with us. Our aim is to provide comfortable stay with great amenities to all our guests, so I am glad we achieved our goal on your visit. We hope this means that you will stay with us again next time you visit   Until next time, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Great Location, saves your $'s for other things.
Summary: This is a simple motel with rooms, a pool and just across the road from Disneyland. When you spend all your days and often nights in the theme parks, why waste money on a fancy high end room. We just wanted somewhere clean and safe to sleep to refresh ourselves for the next day. It's an easy walk to the Disneyland Parks and had almost everything we needed.  There are plenty of places to eat around here, just walk down the street. Downtown Disney is also only a block away.  The only additional thing I would have liked here was a room safe, so I didn't need to carry passports and travel docs with me every day. Alas at this budget price you can't have it all.
Manager Response: Hi there, we are so happy to hear that you found us an affordable place to base yourself in Anaheim. We're glad we could provide you with a pleasant and comfortable place to stay. Our goal is for our guests to feel as if they're at home, and it sounds like we achieved that. Thanks again for recommending us. We hope to see you again soon -- we're eager to improve your experience.  Best, Hotel Management

Summary: It was perfect for a 1-2 night stay. Shower was nice and clean, and there was an extra lock on the door for safety. The bed was pretty stiff but for a couple nights, it wasn't so bad. The 10 minute walk to Disneyland made it worth it.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback about your stay at our hotel. I'm glad that you found our location convenient and hope you were able to explore the area! We can't begin to tell you how much we appreciate your wonderful review, and we can't wait to serve you again!

Summary: I appreciated the location of the hotel to Disneyland.  Although it was a short trip to the amusement parks and local eatery it was a decent room.  There was no luxury to the room, the bed was hard and would have appreciated more towels.  The customer service was good. It was a place to sleep.
Manager Response: Dear guest, it's good to hear that our service and location exceeded your expectations. As for the towels, if you ever need more, you can always give us a call, we'd be happy to send more towels to your room. Thank you for your review, we hope you'll give us another chance to show your how pleasant your stay at our hotel can be!   Best, Hotel Management

Summary: I would of given this hotel 4 stars if there was a coffee maker in the room. Very quiet and comfortable.  Manager was extremely friendly and accommodating! We needed a roll away added to our room. He supplied it without hesitation. Even gave us a discount. A+ for service!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We are happy that you enjoyed your stay, and that our staff made your stay wonderful. We will look into getting coffee machines in the rooms - thank you for this suggestion. We look forward to welcoming you back when you are next in the area.  Best, Hotel Management

Summary: Great value for the money, Well kept property.Friendly staff.I have stayed in several hotels/motels in the Disneyland area over the years. This property was a nice quiet conveniently located and comfortable Motel.
Manager Response: So happy to hear that you found us an affordable place to base yourself in Anaheim. We're really happy that you enjoyed your stay with us, found the staff friendly and your room to be clean and comfortable. We hope that you enjoyed your trip, and that you'll make return trip again in the near future. Thank you for your review.  Best regards, Hotel Management

Summary: What we need this room for was just a place to sleep and shower before going to Disney. It's less than a 10 minute walk to downtown Disney. It was decent enough that I'll probably stay there again if needed. Again I also got a really good online discount so I'm not sure if I'd pay over 110 a night for a room. I only payed around 60.
Manager Response: We are pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay with us and found everything about your stay to your liking. We are delighted to hear that you will be staying with us in the future. If there is anything we can do to make you next stay more comfortable, let us know. We look forward to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: We didn't really like the room set up and the bed and pillows were terrible uncomfortable. I doubt we would ever stay here again because of this. The bed had some plastic liner underneath that kept us up all night. Overall we woke up tired and soar from sleeping here.
Manager Response: Our goal is for our guests to feel as if they're at home, and it sounds like we did not achieve that on your visit. Thank you for your feedback about the pillows, we will look into this. We hope you'll give us another opportunity. Thank you.

Summary: We were warmly greeted by Anaheim High School's tight end receiver who gave us the keys to a great room!  The decor was welcoming, the availability of a refrigerator and microwave was appreciated, and the room was clean and nicely decorated.  Great price for the accommodations that we had!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review - we really appreciate it. We're happy that you enjoyed your stay with us, and that you found the room to be clean. Our guests really love the amenities like refrigerator in the room, so I am pleased that you found it to be useful as well. Thanks again, we'd love to welcome you back the next time you're in the area!  Warm regards, Hotel Management

Summary: only a 10 minute walk to the Grande Californian hotel and into Downtown Disney, nice to have a mini fridge and microwave so we could bring fruit and water to disneyland (there is a grocery store about a 15 minute walk up the road
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We have a fantastic location with amenities like mini fridge, microwave etc, so we are glad you enjoyed these benefits. Next time you're in town and need a place to stay, just give us a call. Thanks for your review!  Best wishes,  Guest Experience Team

Summary: My husband and I stumbled upon this gem by accident while planning a Disney trip. What we found was a very clean, very comfortable room for a great value. We have stayed here 5 times in the past 18 months and it's always a pleasant stay. It's a quick walk to the parks through the Grand Californian hotel and Downtown Disney, it's also close to a few family restaurants. The general manager has always been accomodating, allowing us to park our car at the hotel so we could enjoy the parks before check in time, or holding our luggage for us until we had to catch a flight when we wanted to play after check out time. We have stayed at many budget hotels around the Disneyland/Convention center area and this has been our favorite by far.
Manager Response: A gem? That's quite the compliment, and we're beyond flattered. Thanks for choosing us. It is always a pleasure to be your host. Thank you for your continued support. We look forward to welcome you back again soon.  Best, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: It was the accommodation of Disneyland use
Summary: Breakfast will be available,  it is perfect. It was also good close to Disneyland. And laundry that does not, of the nearest laundry is far was troubled a little.It was good because the cleanliness was also normal.
Manager Response: Dear guest, we're happy your stay with us was pleasant from staff to location. Our great location puts guests right in the area they want to be, and we're glad to hear that you enjoyed that amenity. We're looking forward to your next stay with us. Thank you for your review.

Summary Heading: Good value if u are just using it as a place to crash
Summary: Great easy location to DL! Nice owners. Trying hard to make people feel welcome and comfortable. Overpowering air freshener. Pilly sheets. Great location. Easy walk to DL.  Located next to local restaurants and a minimart too.  I would go back if the price was right.
Manager Response: Dear guest, thanks for your feedback, we are sorry to see that you feel that hotel was only good enough for a short time. But, we are really delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us and found our location to be perfect for your needs. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Managers friendly and accomodating.  Reasonable pricing and near disneyland and anaheim convention center (walking distance to both) cant beat this place for the price. Id recommend it for a quick getaway
Manager Response: Thanks for the kind words. We're happy to hear your stay was enjoyable -- from the rooms to the location. :) We'll be sure to pass along your wonderful comments to the rest of the team and we hope you and your family enjoyed your trip to the Disneyland.   Best regards, Hotel Management

Summary: Staff was friendly, helpful and curtious. Upgraded our room to a family suite no rxtra charge. The room was clean. Walking distance to the park. What more could you ask for at this price. Will stay here again next time for sure
Manager Response: Thanks for the kind words. We're happy to hear your stay was enjoyable -- from the rooms to the location. :) We'll be sure to pass along your wonderful comments to the rest of the team and we hope you and your family enjoyed your trip to the Disneyland.   Best regards, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Good location if bed bugs were gone
Summary: This location is good approximately 15 minute walk to downtown disney and staff were friendly and would help me out whenever I needed. I believe I had bed bugs but staff appeared shocked and going to fix it. The bed was not completely comfortable felt like plastic underneath but was a very basic place with all the essentials.
Manager Response: none

Summary: MANAGEMENT WAS AWESOME TOOK CARE OF ALL OUR NEEDS AND VERY FRIENDLY. When we needed a scooter they had the information we needed to rent one for a few days. I highly recommend for the price and location right at the park.
Manager Response: Dear guest, we're happy your stay with us was pleasant from staff to location. Our great location puts guests right in the area they want to be, and we're glad to hear that you enjoyed that amenity!  We're looking forward to your next stay with us!  Best, Hotel Management

Summary: The gentleman that runs the hotel is awesome- he's available anytime (even at 4am) to check us in. He even stored a ring I'd accidentally left behind in his safe til we returned a month later. Rooms are clean and spacious. Easy 10 minute walk to the park.
Manager Response: We are always here to help, Danielle. We are delighted to hear that we made your stay comfortable and pleasant. We're glad we could get you items returned to you. Thank you for your kind words. We hope to see you soon again.  Best, Hotel Management

Summary: Only faults could pick was lack of room safe and the pillows are not very nice to sleep on other that lovely location was very impressed with anaheim and to say it was next to disneyland was very quiet even by the pool which was next to the main road
Manager Response: We're pleased that you enjoyed your stay. There's nothing better than knowing that you've found a safe, clean, and comfortable place to stay during visit to Disneyland. Thanks for choosing us. If you're ever in the area again, we'd love to welcome you back again.  Best regards, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Nice Little Hotel Next to Disneyland
Summary: Staff were very friendly. We were able to easily find parking (which can be an issue with other small hotels in the area) and park there 7 hours before check-in time since we got there at around 10am. The walk to Downtown Disney and the parks is short and pleasant. We walked back and forth a couple of times with no issues.  The room itself was pretty basic but clean and not bad. My fiancé and I booked a room with a single queen bed, and to our surprise there was an extra room inside that had bunk beds! Too bad it wasn't one of our trips with multiple friends trying to all cram into one cheap room, this would have been perfect! However it's something to note if you have children. The room looked a bit old, especially the counter in the bathroom, but it didn't really affect us.
Manager Response: From your room to convenient location it was our pleasure to make your stay with us as comfortable as possible. If you ever need more shampoos and lotion, feel free to reach out to us, we'd be happy to bring them right over. We hope you had a wonderful time at the Disneyland, and we look forward to seeing you again next time. Take care.  Best, Hotel Management

Summary: The rooms was clean and spacious. It wasn't noise and the rooms were smoke free.  I liked the fact that it had a small refrigerator,  a lot of hotels have take  out this wonderful feature.  Close to Disneyland,  you can't beat that!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review - we really appreciate it. We're happy that you enjoyed your stay with us, and that you found the room to be clean. Our guests really love the amenities like refrigerator in the room, so I am pleased that you found it to be useful as well. Thanks again, we'd love to welcome you back the next time you're in the area!  Warm regards, Hotel Management

Summary: It was our first time to Disneyland and we wanted it to be magical without spending a lot on a room we weren't going to be in often. This was it. The price was good for the location, it was clean, and the staff was friendly.
Manager Response: Dear guest, we were pleased to be your host during your first visit to the Disneyland. We are glad to see that everything was to your liking! Thank you for your review and we look forward to seeing you again.   Until next time, Nitesh K. General Manager

Summary: I would recommend this place to anyone who plans on starting multiple days and is going to spend most of the day at Disneyland. The walking distance is about half mile from Disneyland. It's quiet and safe
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. Our guests love our proximity to Disneyland - it's so easy to get from her to there. We're happy that we were a good fit for your needs. We hope that we get the opportunity to welcome you back soon!  Best, Nitesh K. General Manager

Summary: This was a last minute booking so you get what you get. The location is the only reason to stay at this hotel. The room felt outdated and didn't look dirty but felt dirty. The bed was hard and the pillows were awful. They double booked my room so after I was asleep, another couple came and tried to get in. Glad I bolted the door. This place isn't awful but it isn't great.
Manager Response: Dear guest, I am shocked at your description of your stay with us, and I have to say that it does not sound at all like our normal standards. Our front desk staff accidentally wrote wrong room number for another guest and because of that they tried to use the key at your door. As you know, we found out and we fixed it right away but we would like to apologize for your inconvenience.  I do hope that you will give us another opportunity. I am confident that you will have a trouble-free and thoroughly enjoyable stay on your return.

Summary: The inn was very close to disneyland. It literally took 10 mins to get to the park compared to other places ive stayed at. The room was nice and was given what i reserved. Had mini fridge and microwave.  The staff was very helpful and nice. And  Besides the mishap that happened with the electricity in our room to completely shut down, my stay with this inn was great. I would definitely come back again here with my next trip.
Manager Response: Dear guest, we're really happy that we were able to be a good base for you while you were visiting Disneyland. We're also delighted to hear that you enjoyed our comfortable room and found our staff to be so helpful and friendly. We will be delighted to pass on your comments to rest of the team. We hope that you enjoyed your time in Disneyland, and that you will come back soon again. Thank you for your review.  Best, Nitesh K. General Manager

Summary Heading: Leave as far as you can
Summary: Do not stay here!!! Unless you enjoy the super dirty bed cover with unknown "furs" and horrible service experience!! The staff is so terrible!! He mixed our room keys with the others, and at about 12am someone tried to break in our room ( just like the horrible movie you've seen) we were freak out and terrified and someone stop twisting the door knob until we knocked the door. After a few minutes the phone rings,( d*mn front desk) he sounds nervous and asked me who i am, and said i've enterred the wrong room, should be the room next to our present room. I felt horrible and wonder why because the room key i got is exactly the same as the room i've entered!!!he wants us to switch the room and i refused and told him you should simply switch the room to the person who try to break
Manager Response: Dear guest, we apologize for the mix up. Our service staff had prepared another room for your but since you had taken 214, our system showed that room to be still open. Not knowing about what happened our front desk wrote that room number for another guest and because of that they tried to use the key at your door. As you know, we found out and we fixed it right away but we would like to apologize for your inconvenience. Thank you for your feedback - we will certainly be investigating your issues, and ensuring that we have processes in place so that they don't occur again. I do hope that you will give us another opportunity. I am confident that you will have a trouble-free and thoroughly enjoyable stay on your return.

Summary: If you're looking for a easy hotel next to disneyland or in the aneheim area...Go here! Family and independently owed call the hotel directly for best service. We've stayed here since 2015.   Been more than ten stays.  Won't go anywhere else.
Manager Response: Dear Rachel, we always love to hear from returning guests! Thank you very much for your wonderful review and for your continued support. It is our pleasure to be your host on your visits to the park. Please do let us know if there is anything we can do to make your next stay even better. Thanks again, Rachel. We look forward to welcome you back again soon!  Best, Nitesh K. General Manager

Summary: The Discovery Inn is a home away from home. I've always experienced such friendly and professional service. The Discovery is clean, convenient and is in a perfect location. The staff have always been great!
Manager Response: Dear Elias, thank you for staying with us and your kind review. It is so great to hear that you felt "home away from home", that is the compliment we strive for. We are glad that we could make your stay homely and that we could be of your service during your recent visit. Thanks again.  Until next time, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: CLEAN AND JUST 10 MINUTES WALK TO DISNEYLAND
Summary: unfortunately no tea/coffee making facility in room.  coffee only from office.  If you  returned from the park after 8.30pm, office was closed so no tea or coffee, microwave in room  would have been better replaced with coffee facilities as there were no plates, eating utensils any and no laundry facilities
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We are happy that you enjoyed your stay, and our convenient location. We will look into getting coffee/tea in the rooms - that's a good idea! Thank you for this suggestion, we look forward to welcoming you back when you are next in the area.

Summary: Very close to the parks as well as nice eating places. Ample parking. The front desk manager is great, he gave great tips for visiting the Disney Land. Would have loved to get breakfast at the hotel and won't mind paying extra for the same.
Manager Response: Dear Vikas, Thank you for your review! We love to hear comments like yours - many people have this experience when they stay with us but don't take the time to leave a review, so thank you! We'd love to welcome you back when you're next in the area.  Best regards, Hotel Management

Summary: Room was very small bed was very uncomfortable we woke up with body aches and room smelled old like somebody's grandma but worst. We are very Unsatisfied I have payed the same price for a better hotel than this.
Manager Response: Dear guest, thank you for you staying with us and sharing your feedback with us. I'm shocked to read that you found such a smell in your room. This is honestly not a complaint that we have ever received before, and not a complaint that anyone else had during your stay. I can only assume that it was an isolated, short-term issue, pertaining to your particular room. I wish that you had told us about the problem, so that we might either have rectified it for you, or changed your room. I hope that it did not upset your trip too much, and we do hope that you might come back - I have no doubt but you would have the usual, excellent experience that the vast majority of our guests have.

Summary: We stayed at the Anaheim discovery for seven nights. Although it isn't a luxury hotel by any means, but it fit our budget and I'd go back again. The room was clean and the bed comfortable. We had great service from the front desk.  It's about a ten or fifteen minute walk from the hotel through the Grand Californian and Downtown Disney to the parks.
Manager Response: It's really great to have a guest who stayed here for 7 nights give us such a great review! We're delighted that you enjoyed your stay so much, and hope that you felt really at home. We'll be sure to pass your comments to front desk team, and we really hope that you'll be back again soon!

Summary: The Location was great...The price was a good value... However the hotel room was very small & not modern. The pool was very cold because it is always in the shade of the other other hotel. Also, the website picture of the hotel was false advertisement of the fireworks being able to see from the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear guest, thank you for staying with us and for your review. We are so happy that you found us a convenient and affordable place to stay close to the park. Please know that you can see the fireworks from the hotel clearly, however due to weather conditions, they may have been cancelled during your stay. We hope that you enjoyed the trip to the park, and we hope that you'll make return trip again in the near future! Thanks again.

Summary: Looks very modest but the rooms are really nice, nothing fancy but all furniture in great condition and with a nice style in decoration, the manager really kind help us with information about other places to visit while there, we went to Huntington beach and had great time and food. After the visit to the park the room was clean and ready for us to rest from the day in the park
Manager Response: We're pleased that you enjoyed your stay. There's nothing better than knowing that you've found a safe, clean, and comfortable place to stay while visiting Disneyland. Thanks for choosing us. If you're ever in the area again, we'd love to welcome you back.

Summary Heading: Great Value and space,  very close, friendly staff
Summary: 3 bed rooms with lots of space, very clean and nice, upgraded from a 2 bed for a great price, totally worth it. this place is walking distance to disney.  Staff was very courteus and informative.  Will stay there again anytime!!!
Manager Response: Vianka, thank you for your review! We love to hear comments like yours - many people have this experience when they stay with us but don't take the time to leave a review, so thank you! We'd love to welcome you back when you're next in the area.

Summary: From a noon time early parking request to a late check-in and check-out. All of our needs and expectations were meet. All with a smile and a yes we can do that for you sir. The separate bedroom was great.
Manager Response: We could not be happier that we were able to provide such good service for you in such a friendly manner - we are renowned for our staff and it's really great to hear that you had such a good experience. We will be sure to pass on your comments to them. We really hope that you have an opportunity to visit us again.

Summary: This motel is a little dated, but clean and well kept. The man on arrival was helpful, parking was good, and our room was very comfortable and clean. We would definitely stay here again if we were coming to Anaheim, it was good value for money.
Manager Response: Dear Petrina, we're really delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us and that you would come back again. We aim to provide all of our guests with a clean, comfortable room, and helpful and friendly service. and we're really happy that's what you received. We hope that you will have an opportunity to visit us again - we'd love to welcome you back.

Summary: This hotel is clean and the staff is friendly. They have a nice outdoor pool.  The rooms are spacious.  I enjoyed my stay. It is also centrally located near the Disneyland attractions. I recommend staying here while you are visiting Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear Caitlin, our two priorities are cleanliness and providing helpful and friendly assistance, and we're delighted that you had a positive experience on both fronts. We do have a great location, and our guests find us a very convenient location for their Disney experience. Thank you for your recommendation - we hope that you'll be back to stay with us again!

Summary Heading: Does what it says on the tin!
Summary: This hotel is ideal if you are just wanting a cheap, basic stay within walking distance to Disneyland. It isn't flashy but the service from the staff was good; they let us leave our bags on our day of checkout. There is a great breakfast place just a couple of doors down and then it's about a 20min walk to Disney itself. We were perfectly happy staying here!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. Our guests love our proximity to Disneyland - it's so easy to get from her to there. We're happy that we were a good fit for your needs, and we will pass on your comment to our staff - they are always prepared to do anything they can to assist our guests and make their stay more enjoyable and stress-free. We hope that we get the opportunity to welcome you back soon!

Summary: Title says it all. Spur of the moment overnight Disneyland trip. Only $80 for the middle of summer. Had two separate rooms in our one room and was pleasantly surprised. Staff was readily available for our super late midnight check in.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights, no problem with parking, rooms were clean and comfortable, bathrooms are a bit tired, no safe in the room, wifi was pretty good and reception were helpful. 15 minute walk to Disneyland, lots of restaurants and bars within a 10-12 minute walk but recommend Tiffy's diner just 2 minutes walk from the hotel. (Tiffy's great for dinner and breakfast).
Manager Response: We're delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us, and that you benefited from our great location. Thanks very much for your review, in particular your comments about how comfortable and clean your room was, and we really hope that you'll visit us again.

Summary: Recommend this place for any trip you plan on taking. My family and I stay here 4-5 times a year on our trips to Disneyland and other trips. Staff is very friendly and the rooms are clean. We wouldn't plan a trip until our rooms are booked here first.
Manager Response: It's always great to hear from regular guests! We're thrilled to be your go-to place when you're in town, and are delighted that, once again, you enjoyed your stay. We can't wait to see you again!

Summary: This hotel is great if you're going to use it just as somewhere to sleep & shower while visiting Disneyland. It's about a 10-15min walk to downtown Disney but it's quite a nice walk. Dennys is a couple hotels down from the hotel and CoCo's Bakery on the corner I'd recommend for breakfast. The hotel is a little run down even though photos show it to be recently renovated. I found the bed was extremely firm - I hated it, my husband loved it. Each to their own. The bathroom was big enough to shower and brush your teeth. Mould on the bath was a little off putting. Microwave & fridge available in the room. Ice & vending machine outside as well. We arrived at 9:30am after a 16+hr journey from Australia. The young guy at the desk said we could check in early from 11:30am.. We went down
