Manager Response: Thanks very much for taking the time to review your visit to our hotel. We 're really happy that we were able to accommodate your early arrival and allow you to access your room early. We aim to exceed our guests' expectations, and I hope that on this occasion we did. We'll be sure to pass your comments onto the front desk clerk who assisted you. We think we're a great place to base yourself for experiencing Disneyland too! It's great that you enjoyed all of the amenities in the room - it's a pity that you didn't enjoy the bed as much as your husband - it's very hard to suit everyone when it comes to the hardness of beds! We really hope that you'll have an opportunity to come back for another visit soon.

Summary: Probably the sole reason you'll end up at this motel will be visiting nextdoor Disneyland, and for that purpose, I must say it's a perfect fit. Now don't expect any of the 'fancier' amenities (such as fitness rooms, shuttle transport, breakfast, ...) that you'll get at Disney's hotels or at their so-called 'good neighbor' hotels. But if you, like us, spend all of your day at a Disneyland park (we visited California Adventure), you really don't need anything more than the Discovery Inn. It's close by, about a 15 minute walk to the parks' entrances. It's economical at below $100 for a standard King Room. It's clean (enough), although our bathroom gave off an awful stench, probably coming from the sewer. Interior decor seemed relatively updated. I did feel, however, that some of
Manager Response: We're delighted that you found us to be a perfect fit for your needs recently, and that you had such a great sleep. We think that we are a reasonable and very comfortable base for families to explore Disneyland from. I'm sorry that  you found a smell from your bathroom - this is honestly something that we have heard before, and it may be that there was an issue that we were unaware of during your stay - we apologize for any inconvenience that this caused you. We hope that you'll choose us if you get the opportunity to visit Disneyland again, we would just love to welcome you back!

Summary: We arrived at around 9am from Vegas. Spoke to the gentleman at the front desk. He got me checked in and room keys and directed us where we could park so we could head out to the theme park, even though our room wouldn't be ready until normal checkin 2pm. Gave great and easy directions to getting to the park; clean rooms and bunkbeds for the kids!
Manager Response: We're delighted that we were able to give you such a positive experience - we always try to make our guests' stay as comfortable and easy as possible, and we're really happy that we were able to facilitate an early check-in for you. We'll be sure  to pass your comments onto the front-desk clerk who assisted you. We hope that you'll find an opportunity to come back again!

Summary: Very good value place.  I booked this cos it is walking distance from Disney. And since I was out the whole day, all I really needed was a place to sleep and shower. Only complaint is they don't have conditioner so don't forget to bring your own. Front desk was very accommodating. Travelocity says it doesn't provide breakfast but there is coffee and pastries every morning. I would stay here again :)
Manager Response: Thanks very much for your review. We're really happy that you enjoyed your stay with us,and enjoyed our proximity to Disney. It's a shame that you didn't ask at the front desk if we had conditioner - we stock an array of products there to assist guests who may have forgotten some little essential item - but we trust that it didn't upset your stay too much. We're delighted that you would stay again, and we really hope that we will welcome you back at some point.

Summary: Convenient location, I was able to walk to downtown Disney in less than 10 minutes. I was also able to book last minute, and room wasn't terrible. The place is definitely out dated but still tollerable. With old decor but new tv.
Manager Response: We're sorry that you felt that our hotel was a little dated, but we're glad that you liked our great location, and that we were able to accommodate you at the last minute. We appreciate your feedback, thanks very much for taking the time to review us.

Summary: Got lucky and stayed here for work 3 weeks in a row, and will definitely be staying here again when Imback in the area. Nitesh and his staff are great.  Great place and great prices.  Thanks againNitesh !
Manager Response: It's really great to have a guest who stayed here for 3 weeks give us such a great review! We're delighted that you enjoyed your stay so much, and hope that you felt really at home. We'll be sure to pass your thanks and comments to Nitesh, and we really hope that you'll be back again soon!

Summary: The beds are comfy , accesible to park  shuttle . Good parking spots . Rooms are small an smelled like the toilet has never been cleaned , almost throw up when I first opened the door. Not coming back .  .
Manager Response: I'm happy to read that you enjoyed so many aspects of your stay with us; however I'm shocked to read that you found such a smell in your room. This is honestly not a complaint that we have ever received before, and not a complaint that anyone else had during your stay. I can only assume that it was an isolated, short-term issue, pertaining to your particular room. I wish that you had told us about the problem, so that we might either have rectified it for you, or changed your room. I hope that it did not upset your trip too much, and we do hope that you might come back - I have no doubt but you would have the usual, excellent experience that the vast majority of our guests have.

Summary Heading: Staff are very friendly an accommodating
Summary: Great stay, we went to the park for 2 days and they let us leave our car at the hotel. Staff are very friendly and helpful. Everything is very close including a mall and the park. Short walk to both. Free parking is awesome
Manager Response: We're so happy to be able to offer our guests the amenity of free parking, so it's great that you used it. We're delighted to hear that you found our staff so friendly and helpful, they really make our hotel what it is, and we'll pass on your comments to them. Thank you for your review, and we hope that you'll be back to stay with us again!

Summary Heading: Not the best, but not the worst
Summary: This is a pretty basic motel. Our room was pretty small, but it was clean. Parking lot is pretty tight. The tv remote didn't work, the ironing board was broken (we probably could have gotten both things taken care of easily if we had asked, but it was very late and we were too tired to bother), and the "freezer" didn't actually freeze anything. It's walking distance to disneyland and staff was very pleasant and friendly. if you want something cheap and simple, and a little better than motel 6, this a good place to stay.
Manager Response: We aim to provide our guests with good quality, budget accommodation, and that's what we do for the vast majority of our guests. Unfortunately, it sound as if we dropped the ball on a number of small issues during your stay, and we apologize sincerely for that. You are right; the issues could have been sorted out easily if you had told us about them, but to be honest, we should have spotted them before your arrival. We hope that you'll visit us again, I have no doubt that you will experience everything in your room working as it should. Thank you very much for your feedback - we really appreciate it.

Summary: This hotel is great for people with Disneyland annual passholders. It is clean, nice rooms, and the new owners have made many improvements.  Easy five minute walk to the park. Lots of parking and next to two restaurants. I have recommended many of my fellow passholders and they all agree. It is perfect.
Manager Response: We're delighted that you enjoyed the improvements that we made to the hotel, that's great to hear. We think we've got a great location too - all of our guests walk to the park. Thank you for recommending us - we really appreciate that, and we hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: After catching Dusneyland express to discovery Inn our room wasnt ready as we arrived early the Inn was happy to store our luggage until or room was ready. This gave us time to explore. Very clean comfortable room close to Disneyland downtown and various resturants that provided free wifi
Manager Response: From friendly, attentive service to complimentary WiFi and convenient location, it sounds like we were the perfect fit for your hotel needs. We'll be sure to pass along your kind words to the rest of the team. It was our pleasure to be your host during your recent visit, we hope we will get another opportunity to welcome you back. Thank you for your review.  Best, Guest Experience Team

Summary: It's very convenient. Highly recommend to families visiting the Disneyland parks. The walk to the park is about 15 minutes and is on very safe route. The Coco restaurant is very nice and with 1 minute of walk from the hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We have a fantastic location for guests visiting the Disneyland, so we are glad you enjoyed that benefit.  Next time you're in town and need a place to stay, just give us a call. Thanks for your review!  Best wishes,  Guest Experience Team

Summary: Price is right!  Nice clean room with comfortable bed. Manager was kind and helpful. Great location within walking distance of Disneyland, convention center and so many restaurants. Would recommend for a great affordable getaway.
Manager Response: Thanks for reaching out and for your wonderful review. If you're ever in the area again, we'd love to welcome you back again -- we're eager to improve that rating. We look forward to making your next stay even better. Thank you.

Summary: Great place to stay at, when the price is reasonable. Rooms are very clean. Hotel is very secure. Staff is very friendly. It's a very short walk to Disneyland Resort and Downtown Disney. I would stay here again, if the price was right.
Manager Response: Thank you for your stellar review. We're glad we could provide you with a pleasant and comfortable place to stay. We are glad to be an affordable place for travelers visiting Disneyland and other local attractions. Thanks again for recommending us. We hope to welcome you back again soon next time you are in the area.  Best regards, Guest Experience Team

Summary: the room was nice. The hotel lacks curb appeal but I was surprised by the quality of my room. The room was divided into two small rooms which was perfect for me and my co worker.  I would stay there again. I would also consider taking my family there.
Manager Response: We aim to provide clean, comfortable and pleasant stay for all our guests, so we are really happy to see that we achieved our goal on your recent stay. Thank you for staying with us and taking time to review us. We hope to welcome you back again soon.  Take care, Guest Experience Team

Summary: The hotel was ok and within walking distance to Disneyland/California Adventures. A more substantial continental breakfast would have been nice. They only offer coffee, toast and muffins. Overall it was good for the price.
Manager Response: Dear K G, thanks for your feedback. We're sorry our breakfast wasn't quite what you were expecting -- we'll definitely follow up to see what changes we can make to improve.   Still, we're glad you enjoyed your stay, and we do hope to see you again next time you're staying in the area!

Summary: Great value for a nice room so close to the park. Would stay again. Beds were nice and rooms were clean. Non smoking but had a area close by if that's important. Reception was nice and very helpful...
Manager Response: We're delighted that you had a great experience with us, and we couldn't be more excited that you'll be returning in the future. Thank you so much for your wonderful review. Take care!  With gratitude, Hotel Management

Summary: 10 mins walk to Disneyland and Disney adventures through the California Hotel. Great and comfy enough to sleep after exhausting day in the park. The breakfast choices is what you pay for. Muffins and coffee but there is a nearby restaurant to eat in. The only complaint is the smoke alarm started intermittently going off and woke us up. I reported to the front desk and said he'll change the batteries but did the same thing the next morning.
Manager Response: Thanks for reaching out --While we're glad you enjoyed your stay with us, we are sorry about the alarm. Please know that we have fixed this issue. Thanks again for your review, we look forward to welcome you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Excellent Location, Very Quiet, We would stay here again!
Summary: We got the King Bed room at an awesome rate on Expedia, so we decided to why not try the place. I came here with my bf this past Memorial Weekend, and we overall enjoyed the stay here at Discovery Inn. The location is awesome! The hotel is small but very quiet, which was great. Finding parking was never an issue which was refreshing, since we stayed on a busy holiday weekend. The room was very clean and spacious; although, the bathroom seemed a little dated. When it got too stuffy, the AC worked like a charm! The employees were very nice as well. We would gladly stay here again!
Manager Response: We're happy that you had a great experience with us, and we couldn't be more excited that you'll be returning in the future. If there is anything we can do to make your next stay even better, please let us know. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: The room was ok. You get what u pay for. Location was great. Right across from Disneyland. Someone that worked there tried to walk in our room at about 10 at night which was kind of weird. If we wouldn't of had the saftey chain on they would of walked right in on me and my husband. They should have better communication with the front desk. They should know if a guest is in a room or not. I understand it was a honest mistake but I don't think I'd be staying there again. I gave them 3 stars because the man at the front desk was very nice.
Manager Response: Dear guest, we were truly distressed to hear about your stay with us. According our system, the room was available. One of our staff made a mistake and forgot to change and update this in our system. This was our mistake, please accept our apologies. Please know that we have brought this to our staff's attention to ensure this does not happen again. We sincerely hope you will give us another opportunity to restore your confidence in our hospitality. Thank you.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: The room was clean, just sort of run down. Needed some updates and fixing, like where the paint was peeling, and the towel rack was coming off the wall. The sink counter was stained and the bed felt like maybe the springs were broken in some spots. But the room itself was very clean, nice light temperature appropriate bedding, good multiple door locks. tv, mini fridge, and AC were all good. We didn't make use of the pool but it looked very nice. Walk to Disneyland wasn't that bad and there are bus stops nearby for those who might have trouble walking the distance.
Manager Response: Happy to hear you decided to stay with us when you were in the area. We're glad that your time here was comfortable and that you enjoyed many aspects of your stay with us. But we are disappointed that we weren't able to knock it out of the park for you. We appreciate your feedback and we'll be sure to make the necessary improvements for the next time you're here. Please do let us know if there is anything else we can do to do make your stay even better.

Summary: I stayed here last year whilst on my own travelling the united states. I am a huge Disney fan and as I was on my own wanted somewhere close at a good price. I got exactly what was on the tin.  It was clean. Air con and heat if you like, fridge and microwave, bath and shower, storage. Huge double bed. Location fantastic, I spend 3 days and 4 nights here. If you get up early enough by reception you can have morning tea or coffee and a light bite of pastry.  Reception were always very helpful. There's a wall Mart down the road I went to to buy a few items, as I was travelling couldn't afford to eat in Disney ever day. Recommended. Thank you
Manager Response: It is great to hear from returning guest! We're glad that the customer service you received was just as pleasant as your accommodations. We know that rest of our team will be just as flattered as we were with your kind review. We hope to see you soon again.

Summary: Hotel is in walking distance of themeparks, allowing you to go back and forth during the day, laundromat within walking distance, pool was good, wifi wasnt fantastic, pillows were pretty hard and not soft ones
Manager Response: Glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! Thanks for leaving a great review. We hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: Perfect location just walking distance of Downtown Disney and the room was perfect. We did not have any rooms above ours so that was really nice we did not have to deal with people stomping above our room.
Manager Response: We're happy your stay with us was pleasant from staff to hotel room. Our great location puts guests right in the area they want to be, and we're glad to hear that you enjoyed that benefit. We hope to see you soon again!

Summary: The only convenience with this hotel was it was close to Disney land. The front desk were not very knowledgeable on different question ask.  They serve coffee at a certain time but went to get some and they had none.
Manager Response: Happy to hear you decided to stay with us when you were in the area.  But we are disappointed that we weren't able to knock it out of the park for you. Our aim is to make make guests feel at home and guide them during their stay here. We are sorry that we weren't much help. As for the coffee, it was our fault, we were in a process of refilling it during that time.  Please do let us know if there is anything else we can do to do make your stay even better.

Summary: The hotel location couldn't be better less then one block away from Disneyland Dr. The room was clean and quiet. I wasn't expecting breakfast so was nice during the morning have cup of coffee and some muffins.
Manager Response: Juliana, thank you so much for your wonderful review. We are really glad to see that you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope this means that you will stay with us again next time you visit the area!  Best, Hotel Management

Summary: There was no coffee maker in the room and the wifi and TV were not accessible. I had my 4 year old grandson with me and there was no plug for the tub so he had to take a shower. The personnel were courteous and helpful. The breakfast was packaged pastries and coffee which was a disappointment.
Manager Response: Dear guest, we are sorry that your stay with us was not the best. We do not have breakfast however, we do offer grab-n-go breakfast for our guest in the lobby so they can pick up something quick before they head out to the park. We are sorry about the TV and WiFi. Please know that we will follow up with our internet provider to ensure this does not happen again. We sincerely hope you will give us another opportunity to restore your confidence in our hotel. Thank you!  Sincerely,  Hotel Management

Summary: Hotel was in a good location directly across from Disneyland theme park , accessible and walking distance to resturants etc, reasonably priced , rooms were basic but clean.  Would be considered about a 3 star
Manager Response: Dear Pauline, we're happy your stay with us was pleasant from staff to hotel room. Our great location puts guests right in the area they want to be, and we're glad to hear that you enjoyed that amenity.  We're looking forward to your next stay with us, we are confident we can do a better job next time. Thanks!

Summary: Desk clerk was kind, the coffee in morning in the lobby was good. The room had clean soft white sheets, with white towels folded fancy. Very convenient across the street from Disneyland, literally. And close by walking distance to several restaurants such as Denny's and Cocoas. A smaller hotel, but price was lower than the others around. I would come back.
Manager Response: From staff to room to amenities, looks like we were the perfect fit for your hotel needs! We are really happy to hear that you will come back on your next visit. Hope to see you soon!  Thank you, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for a Disney trip
Summary: I'm a regular to this hotel, besides its location which is walking distance from disney ( and i mean walking not miles away, even is closer that Disneyland's parking lot ) you can even see the rides from the California Adventure Park, the check in is efficient, fast it does not take time to check in here. I stay here all the time i come to Disney. I live in Palm Springs so after a full day of fun is nice to have a hotel close by. Is also safe police is always moving around katella ave for safety. They offer a little continental breakfast in the morning, don't ask me what it is, we are not really fully awake when this happens.
Manager Response: It is great to hear from a regular guest. There's nothing better than knowing that you've found a safe, clean, and comfortable place to stay during your travels. Thanks for your continued support. We look forward to welcome you back again soon, and we hope you'll get to fully enjoy our breakfast on your next stay!  Until next time, Hotel Management

Summary: Good experience, short 15-20 min walk to the parks. Had a small issue with the AC being turned off while we were gone but other than that it was a great affordable place to stay for two adults and our two young children.
Manager Response: We're glad we could provide you with a safe and comfortable place to stay. Our goal is for our guests to feel as if they're at home, and it sounds like we achieved that. Please accept our apologies for the AC. We hope this won't dissuade you from being our guest again.   Thank you for your review!

Summary: My family and I stay here for every Disney trip we take. You can't beat the location as it is only a short walk to the Disneyland Resort. The management as well as the staff are delightful. I recommend this place to everyone who is visiting the area.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear that we are your go-to place for you and your family. This means a lot to us. Thank you for your wonderful review. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon.   Best, Hotel Management

Summary: Very recommended everthing in good conditions  Close to the parks food nice area  Friendly people  Safe Clean  Comfortable bed  Close to park and restaurant  We had a really good experience  Very very recommended and the price is the best!!!!!!!!!!
Manager Response: We're glad that the customer service you received was just as pleasant as your accommodations. We know that rest of our team will be just as flattered as we were with your kind review. We hope to see you soon again.

Summary: This is an older hotel and as such might not appeal to all travelers. I found it to be clean and comfortable, the office staff helpful, and the location offers easy access to the parks. The room has a refrigerator and a microwave so it was easy to bring our own food and snacks to enjoy.
Manager Response: From friendly, attentive service to clean and comfortable rooms it sounds like we were the perfect fit for your hotel needs, Rhonda. We'll be sure to pass along your kind words to the rest of the team and appreciate your feedback. Hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: My husband and I got an excellent rate for our 4 night stay in this motel for our 3 day pass to Disneyland/California Adventure. Located only 1/2 mile from the park. The motel was very clean and wonderful staff. We'd definitely stay there again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your stellar review. We're glad we could provide you with a pleasant and comfortable place to stay. Our goal is for our guests to feel as if they're at home, and it sounds like we achieved that. Thanks again for recommending us. We look forward to your future stay with us.  Best regards, Hotel Management

Summary: Went for Memorial day weekend. Had no problems with parking room was nicely kept and had everything we needed! Walking distance to Disneyland and restaurants. No complaints will definitely be returning!
Manager Response: We're happy that you had a great experience with us, and we couldn't be more excited that you'll be returning in the future. Thank you so much for your wonderful review. Take care!  With gratitude, Hotel Management

Summary: Good location,  great price but forgot about continental breakfast,  go take a real breakfast next bloc. Cleanness is very good but facilities are little bit "tired" next to pharmacy,  restaurants and disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for your feedback about the facilities. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us and found our location to be just perfect. We hope that our service and location will keep us on your radar for your next visit. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: We stayed two nights in a King room. Check-in was on time, room looked and smelled very clean upon entry, bathroom was spotless, no bugs, no creepy crawlies, no weird stains or odors, A/C worked great, TV has a good selection of channels, microwave and fridge definitely came in handy, and there's a liquor store/market down the street from the INN and very good non-chain restaurants at the other end of the street. Perfect way to celebrate turning 30. Pool was refreshing and clean. There is no hot tub, but we didn't mind since the weather was quite hot during the day and night. Disneyland, California Adventure, and Downtown Disney are just a short walk from the INN. The walk is beautiful. At night, the trees are all lit up. Staff was nice and accommodating. I would recommend this
Manager Response: Tom, we're so glad everything was to your liking. Yes, our location is perfect walking distance to a lot of fun activities. It's great to know you loved your night stroll around our area. Can't wait to have you back again next time you're in California.    Thank You,  Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites at the Park

Summary: Ran by very friendly couple, great price for a nice place to stay with the family, and within walking distance to disneyland. Also had a plus of microwave and fridge and no parking fees. Coffee available in the morning and was a quiet stay for us.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: I have stayed at better hotels.
Summary: My room faced the west in direction.  I suggest if you are not into privacy, this is the place for you.  Advantages, the room smelled and looked clean, however, I thought I walked in to Motel 6, only difference it has a more upscale feel to it. Management was good, however the night one didn't take to kindly to waking up.  The TV shuts off when you close your eyes or go to the bathroom?? HUH???!  I laid down on the bed--yes I was tired--I closed my eyes, and off the TV goes.!!??  That's a new twist when the TV gets jealous, lol!  I love the fact there are PLENTY of restaurants with in walking distance.  Honestly, I would rather do Motel 6 than this place. Now the negatives:  It looks like an complex, that was renovated.  The curtains don't close all the way, so very little
Manager Response: none

Summary: I am usually the first to say, "Just stay cheap in Anaheim, you will never even be in your room."  With the amount of travelers Anaheim gets, and the urge for hotels not to maintain properties, places like this are common. Bugs, the cheapest, thinnest sheets imaginable, and a room smaller than what you would get in Manhattan. Very sketchy, couldn't even sleep in our room.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Perfect distance to all Disneyland Properties, especially for a Race Weekend!
Summary: We stayed here for the Tinkerbell 1/2 Marathon race weekend.  It was a 10 minute walk from door to corral! Location wise, you can't beat this hotel.  Good value for the room and price we paid during a busy weekend.  This is a no frills hotel, so don't expect it to be fancy.  The fridge and microwave were a nice addition.  Basic room and bathroom but clean.  Our only issue was that the toilet was not flushing all the way the day before we left.  We let the front desk know, he assured us that it would be addressed, but it never was.  This would've been a huge problem if we had not checked out the following day.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Nice and clean room. Manager was very helpful.  Very clean and good swimming pool opene from 9 to 9. Very great experience. Bed was bit hard...by back was bit tight when I woke up next day. But over all great experience.
Manager Response: none

Summary: After reading some of the good reviews here, we decided to try this accommodation out due to its close proximity to Disneyland and decent price. However, after staying here for a night (we had booked and paid for 3), I wish I had spent a little bit more because this place was just... for a lack of words... disgusting.   The first sign was when we arrived and they said that our room wasn't quite ready because they were had exterminators out spraying pesticides in each room. We were glad the they allowed us to check into the room shortly afterwards and had the exterminator skip our room.   Once inside the room, one of the first things I do is to check the bedding to make sure there aren't any bed bugs. None... whew. However, I noticed  couple of yellow stains in the middle of the
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great value for money.  Not new but it is very clean and tidy.  Excellent location. Highly recommended.  Staff were very helpful and cleaners were excellent everyday.  Very close to food outlets, laundry, Disneyland and free ways.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We wanted to do Disneyland on a budget and this place did it for us.  We took 2 ground floor rooms, for 5 people.  Older building but very clean.  The larger compact refrigerator and small microwave were perfect for our use.  In room coffee make would have been nice.  I later found out that coffee and muffins were available in the office.  Easy 20 minute walk to Disneyland entrance, when going through Disney Grand California Hotel.  Free parking and we never had to move the car.  My wife noticed that 2 rooms near our room were wheel chair accessible.  In room A/C worked great but has typical noise.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great Price, Friendly staff, needs carpet on floors.
Summary: Price was great for room. Close enough to walk to downtown Disney, only 3-4 blocks. Staff was very friendly and helpful, check-in was quick. The room did not have a working fan in the bathroom though, and the floors were not carpeted, leaving the bare floor dirty. All our feet and socks were black from walking on the floor. Overall a safe, quiet, well priced hotel. Surrounding hotels charged a "resort fee" and fee for parking, which Discovery Inn did not. Was also only 2-3 blocks away from a Walmart (on Euclid) so we were able to buy food for the week and souvenirs for very cheap.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I'm writing this review to warn folks about bedbugs. I woke my first morning covered in them and it unfortunately ruined my trip because I was constantly itchy, despite being on Benadryl. It was embarrassing because they were on visible locations, and of course it took a lot of time out of my trip inspecting my luggage and clothes at my new hotel (do it in the bathtub if this happens to you). There was the added expense of the new hotel and the band-aids, Bendryl, anti-histamine lotion, etc. Opposite of relaxing.   The proprietor was very kind, and immediately refunded me for my stay. I watched as he and another employee went straight to my room with flashlights as I was driving away. Apparently the previous owner had a bedbug infestation and the new owner outfitted the rooms
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very nice hotel for a good price- and within easy walking distance to Disneyland. Parking is always available even though the lot is small. We've stayed here a number of times and will stay again! Nitesh the GM of the hotel is great- it's a pleasure to see him in the morning and he's super friendly!!!
Manager Response: Dear Valued guest, we'd like to thank you for your honest feedback. We are pleased to hear from you about having an enjoyable experience with us and while visiting the area. We hope to see you in any future stays.

Summary: The room was great beds comfortable, the staff are friendly and helpful,located very close to  Disneyland. There are decent places to eat nearby. The rooms are very clean.The only thing that is irritating is how long this review has to be. I would recommend this motel due the air prices and convience
Manager Response: Dear valued guest, thank you for taking the time to participate in our survey. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you again on any future stays.

Summary: The location is walking distance to Disneyland and California Adventure. Air conditioner was extremely loud so we had to turn it off to sleep, but comfort and cleanliness of room was good. The price was good and affordable. We would def stay here in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for the feedback! We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay! We hope you return again!

Summary: This hotel isn't very fancy, but it was clean, and nice.  The beds weren't very comfortable, but when you're tired, you will sleep.  The bathroom was too small, and I prefer the vanity to be separate from the bathroom itself, but this was just an overnight trip, and it was just my husband and I.  I booked a room with a King size bed, although it seemed smaller than a King, it was still roomy.  A big surprise was when I saw another room with bunk beds in it.  It would've been perfect if we had our kids with us, but because we didn't, it seemed like a waste.  I would most likely stay here again, but if we take our kids, I would definitely want a bigger room with a separate vanity, which I know they have.  The reason we were there was to attend a quest/scavenger hunt game at the
Manager Response: I'd like to thank you for your amazing review! We appreciate your honesty and are happy to hear you keep returning and we are still leaving you with a memorable experience.

Summary: This motel was nice and quaint, real close to parks and the convention center which is convenient.  The pool is small but or girls had it all to themselves because the time we travelled the property was very quiet.  The owner of the motel visited us to make sure our stay was going well and that was appreciated.  The only reason for the 4 out of 5 ranking is because there was no breakfast provided, that would have made this trip perfect!
Manager Response: Wow! I'm glad to hear your amazing feedback and honest opinion. We do our best to ensure every visit for guest is pleasant. I'll be sure to pass along the amazing feedback to the entire staff and Management. Visit us again soon!

Summary: The hotel staff was very friendly and accommodating. The room was clean and ready for our arrival. The park is only a 10 minute walk from the hotel, also within walking distance of a liquor store and numerous dining options. We will definitely be staying here again when we find ourselves in Anaheim in the future.
Manager Response: Dear valued guest,  We appreciate your honest feedback and would like to thank you for choosing our place for you to stay while visiting Disneyland. We are pleased to know you had a great time and we did aim in satisfaction. We hope you choose to stay with us again.

Summary: Nothing fancy here, but when visiting the parks, do you really need a fancy hotel? It provided a quiet clean place to rest our heads for the night and that's all we needed! Couldn't get the TV to work for some reason, but it really didn't matter.  Staff was friendly and very helpful.  The proximity to the parks and Downtown Disney is the best part of this hotel, as it's only a short 10 minute walk up the street. Thanks for the great stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time out of your busy schedule to review your stay at Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites. We are glad to hear you enjoyed you stay here with us. We do apologize for the TV issue. Thank you for letting us know, we will have this resolved. We hope you make us your Anaheim choice of stay whenever you come visit.

Summary: This hotel is a good deal for the price. Its within walking distance to Disneyland parks, and there was no additional charge for parking. The bed was ok, but the pillows were awful (hard and flat so bring your own if possible). The rooms were older but clean. There was a refrigerator in our room which was nice. We would definitely stay here again for the price we paid given the proximity to the parks (but we'd bring our own pillows!).
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time out of your busy schedule to review your stay at Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites . We are glad to hear you enjoyed you stay here with us. We do apologize for the Pillow issue. Thank you for letting us know, we will have this resolved. We hope you make us your Anaheim choice of stay whenever you come visit.

Summary Heading: Excellent location to convention center, staff was very attentive
Summary: My host Jay was extremely helpful throughout my stay . The rooms were clean , well kept and had a microwave and mini fridge which came in quite useful. The hotel is located less than a 1/4 mile walk to the Hilton/ Convention ctr in Anaheim. Jay will print your boarding pass and I even had some faxes sent thru with no extra charges. I would have preferred a more reliable wifi as they were in progress of fixing things but it was acceptable for my needs. There are no fees for parking a vehicle. I expect to book there again for next years' Natural Products show in March 2017.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to participate in our feedback survey. We are pleased to know you enjoyed your stay. we do our best to ensure every guest receives 100% of our services. We hope you choose to stay with us again on any future stays.

Summary: It was the very last hotel available in Anaheim for Valentines Day.  It was very reasonable.  We showed up at 8:30 a.m. and got checked in (obviously the room would not be available until after 2:00pm, but we got to park there and walk to Disneyland, which was just a couple of blocks up the street!).  It was clean and very quiet.  We will be back soon!
Manager Response: Dear valued guest,  We appreciate your honest feedback and would like to thank you for choosing our place for you to stay while visiting Disneyland. We are pleased to know you had a great time and we did aim in satisfaction. We hope you choose to stay with us again.

Summary: More then 20 years we go to the NAMM Show (music trade exhibition) in Anaheim. Over the years we’ve stayed in many hotel in the neighbourhood. They’ve gradually became very expensive. Then we’ve find this hotel few years ago. We were pleased with the reasonable pricing and close distance to the Convention Centre and Disneyland. But the hotel was dirty and it was impossible to contact the owner (who gave us his business card) for a possible booking.  Now the establishment is under a new management which has improved the overal quality of service. Rooms are newly redecorated - cheap but clean, equipped with microwave, fridge, iron, hairdryer and new big HD cable TV - what a change. On top of it we!ve got a light breakfast with coffee which is not even advertised..!!  The new
Manager Response: Thank you for the amazing review! I'm pleased to hear that our renovations are being noticed and our efforts to improve our establishment are recognized. We hope you visit us again so we can continue to surprise you with our efforts to ensure complete satisfaction and amazing experiences added to your visit.

Summary: This hotel is very nice. My mom and I always stay here every time we go to Disney. The hotel staff is very friendly. I'm on oxygen 24 hours a day and they help me out alot with my tanks and everything. We won't stay in any other hotel. We like this one and we feel at home there.
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty! We love hearing about returning guest who contribute to our efforts of satisfaction. We do our best to ensure every person is happy from the beginning to the end of their vacation. We hope to see you again on your next trip!

Summary: With the Canadian dollar exchange rate we wanted a cheaper place to stay but still wanted to be close to Disneyland. We looked at reviews on this hotel and they seemed good. When we got there we shocked to see just how close it was to Disneyland (2 blocks away from the Grand Californian which you can walk through to get to downtown disney).   We gave this hotel 5 stars because for what we paid it was great. It was a small room but was very clean with newly painted walls. All we needed was a clean bed and bathroom, a tv and fridge/microwave and that's what we got! While it is a motel layout you will find many hotels within walking distance to Disney are the same.   The staff were very friendly and the day we checked out they let us keep our car parked for free while we went to
Manager Response: Wow! Thank you for the five stars! We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us! We aim to make sure we don't add unnecessary stress to your trip. I'm amazed to hear you were pleased with our effort to update our property. Please visit us again soon!

Summary Heading: On a budget & just what we needed
Summary: First off, I gave this motel 5 stars because it satisfied our needs. Now, if you're picky about your hotel and are expecting Hilton/Holiday Inn- do not book! My husband and I stayed 4 nights for a trip to Disneyland. We got an awesome deal since we were on a budget, and just needed a place to sleep and shower. It's about 15 minute walk to get to the Disneyland entrance, and there's also an ART transportation bus right outside next door at the Best Western that costs $5 a day per person. The front desk guy, Jay was extremely helpful and welcoming upon our arrival and can answer any questions you might have. We even got a free room upgrade to a king bed without even asking! You can see the Mickey Ferris wheel right outside the hotel and even the fireworks at night. I would stay
Manager Response: Wow! I'm so happy to hear we were able to exceed your wishes and extended some offers to you to contribute to your trip! We understand our guest are here to experience Disneyland and have a stress free vacation, so we make sure we do our best to make sure you are happy throughout your trip. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: I've stayed here many times since I started going to Anaheim on a semi-regular basis. It's a good no-frill hotel and within easy walking distance to the main gates at Disneyland, as well as to the Anaheim Convention Center.
Manager Response: I'd like to thank you for your amazing review! We appreciate your honesty and are happy to hear you keep returning and we are still leaving you with a memorable experience.

Summary: Above all the Anaheim Discovery has a very friendly staff! From the manager to the cleaning service, I always feel genuinely welcome! The location is perfect for those who desire a convenient walk to the Disney parks. The rooms are always clean and the staff is very efficient if you need anything, The Discovery is truly a hidden gem in Anaheim! I have and will continue to be a loyal guest! I highly recommend the Discovery to all travelers to the Anaheim area.   It is always nice to wake up and get a cup of coffee from the front desk area and be greeted by the manager, This just doesn't happen at any hotel/motel/ Inn but then again the Discovery is not just any place, it is an amazing place!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for the feedback! We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay! We hope you return again!

Summary: Clean, comfortable room  for a very reasonable rate. Hotel staff very friendly and accomodating.  Within walking distance to Disneyland/ California Adventures,Dennys and Co Cos restaraunts.  Just park, check-in and enjoy! Thats what makes Anaheim Discovery Inn and Suites one of the best places to stay for a great Disney adventure!
Manager Response: Wow! I'm glad to hear your amazing feedback and honest opinion. We do our best to ensure every visit for guest is pleasant. I'll be sure to pass along the amazing feedback to the entire staff. Visit us again soon!

Summary: This is the best hotel i have stayed at since i go to Disneyland a lot. I stayed there during the Christmas holidays and when i checked in i got upgraded to a better room than i booked and everything was great.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time out of your busy schedule to review your stay at the Anaheim Discovery Inn. We are glad to hear you enjoyed your overall experience with us. We hope you visit us soon, we would like to hear from you again. We hope you make us your one stop destination whenever you are in town.

Summary Heading: Nice place for the money you're spending!
Summary: Nice place for the money you're spending! We stayed here because it was a really good deal, and because it's so close to Disneyland Park. The hotel was clean the staff was nice and we didn't have any issues while we were staying here. There wasn't a lot to offer, just a bed a clean shower and a TV if you wanted it. A very basic hotel room. However we weren't really looking to spend a lot of time  In our hotel anyway, so it worked out perfectly. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Phebe D,  First of all, thank you for choosing us for your stay. Secondly, I would like to thank you for such wonderful review! We strive to make our guest feel home away from home and to make their stay as pleasant as possible. We are delighted to hear that you had such a great stay and that you will visit us again when back in California. We sure are excited to see you again!  Once again, thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate you taking the time.

Summary: Many of the rooms including the one I was in have been newly renovated their extreme and clean comfortable fresh bedding New Orleans good air conditioning and heating and just across the street from Disney's California Adventure Park
Manager Response: Hello, We'd like to thank-you for participating in our feedback survey. We'd like to thank-you for all your honesty. We do our best to ensure every guest receives 100% satisfaction. We are pleased to hear we have succeeded our standards during your stay. We hope you choose to stay with us in any future stays.

Summary Heading: The best location outside of the Disneyland Park
Summary: On our third visit to Anaheim, we chose the Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites due to the location and price. The previous two hotels were ok but we have been very impressed with our two 4 night visits. The rooms are extremely clean, serviced well each day and the staff are friendly and helpful. Location is fantastic if you're visiting Disneyland or Downtown Disney frequently. We'll be recommending this hotel to our friends and sure to return ourselves.
Manager Response: Hello, We'd like to thank-you for participating in our feedback survey. We'd like to thank-you for all your honesty. We do our best to ensure every guest receives 100% satisfaction. We are pleased to hear we have succeeded our standards during your stay.

Summary: Rooms are not like pictured on their website. Chairs were dirty, the bed skirt had dirty stains and room had a horrible smell. The room just felt dirty!! Door had a gap on bottom which made the room cold!! Just wouldn't recommend this hotel at all. My rating would be 0 out of 5!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us feedback. We apologize that your recent stay did not meet your expectations. We appreciate your comments and will share these with our team so that we can continue to improve our services. We look forward to welcome you back and provide a pleasant stay. Thank you.

Summary Heading: Excellent value for money and a great location for Disneyland visit
Summary: A basic hotel but very good value for the price.  We only needed a bed to sleep in at the end of a long day at Disneyland.  Wifi was good.  Lots of good dining options close by.  A short walk to Disneyland and if you already have a pass even shorter access via the grand Californian entrance to Disney California adventure.  Had a room with two queen beds and was surprised that room is split into two different rooms which gave extra privacy not normally expected from a room in this price range.  The free parking was a bonus, even during the day after checkout which saved even more money to spend at Disneyland. Staff was friendly and accomodating.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to participate in our feedback survey. We are pleased to know you enjoyed your stay. we do our best to ensure every guest receives 100% of our services. We hope you choose to stay with us again on any future stays.

Summary Heading: Fantastic location to be near Disneyland
Summary: Really great place if you are wanting to visit Disneyland, and there are plenty of eateries and bus stops near by.  Management very willing to solve any issues that may arise. Large rooms, well serviced, unfortunately no laundry for guests use.  Not the quietest street, but just take your ear plugs and it all works out.  Nice pool fur guest use.
Manager Response: Dear valued guest,  We appreciate your honest feedback and would like to thank you for choosing our place for you to stay while visiting Disneyland. We are pleased to know you had a great time and we did aim in satisfaction. We hope you choose to stay with us again.

Summary Heading: Great budget hotel for all Disney half marathons (that no one knows about)
Summary: I've stayed in this hotel three times for different Disney half marathons. The hotel is an incredibly short walking distance from the start and finish lines. It's also easy enough to walk to the parks. My friend and I ran a half marathon, walked back to the room, walked back to California Adventure an hour later, did a full day in the park, and walked back to the room with no problems.   The rooms are clean and the staff is helpful. We had a problem with our room due to the shower and they moved us into another. I won't lie, it's old and has the problems of an old hotel, but for the price (especially when everywhere else is sold out) and the location, you can't beat it. It's been quiet all three times I've stayed there, so I can't comment on thin/thickness of walls.   If you're
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, We appreciate you taking the time out of your day to complete our survey. We would like to apologize once again for the troubles with your shower and we are happy to know one little set back did not ruin your vacation. We are pleased to know you enjoyed Disney marathon. We congratulate you for such a great commitment. We hope you choose to stay with us again.

Summary: Looking for an inexpensive place within walking distance to Disneyland? This is the place.  GREAT value, VERY clean, Welcoming with LOVELY owners and staff.  We're on our second stay and we'll be back for sure.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to participate in our feedback survey. We are pleased to know you enjoyed your stay. we do our best to ensure every guest receives 100% of our services. We hope you choose to stay with us again on any future stays.

Summary: Great place to stay.  Right across the street from the park.  rooms were very nice.  fresh paint, new furniture and the price was great.  there was a Cocos on one side and a Dennys on the other side.  will definitely stay there again.  free coffee in the mornings.
Manager Response: Dear Valued guest, we'd like to thank you for your honest feedback. We are pleased to hear from you about having an enjoyable experience with us and while visiting the area. We hope to see you in any future stays.

Summary Heading: great stay and only a 15 minute walk to disneyland
Summary: we were looking for a inexpensive place within walking distance of disneyland and we found it. the room and the grounds are VERY clean and the service is great. we felt very safe here and it was quiet. Jay did a great job at check-in and check-out and  he was very helpful. I have already recommended Anaheim Discovery Inn to two of our friends.
Manager Response: Hello, thank you for participating in our feedback survey. We are pleased to hear we have fulfilled our guests standards. I will be sure to express with my staff the delightful compliments your expressed. We hope to see you again! Once again thank you for staying with us .

Summary: Had the nicest experience here. Only stayed one night but the owner upgraded our room and allowed us to park our car there the whole next day after checking out so we could go to Disneyland. Really nice man.   Room spacious, pool good, beds comfortable and hotel clean. Obviously not 5* but we only paid $75. Bargain. Would stay there if we return to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear valued guest, I'd like to thank you for taking the time to participate in our feedback survey and sharing your honest opinion. We take pride in helping our guests receive full appreciation. I'm glad you enjoyed your self and stay while visiting California. We hope you return again and look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Great location for Disney Land visit
Summary: We had two queen size beds in our room which was plenty of space for 4 people a little bit of a wait at the bathroom but not too bad. The bathroom is spacious we had to queen size bed in a room what was plenty of space for 4 people little bit of a wait at the bathroom but not too bad. Bathroom is space and all the appliances were new toilet thing new shower new shower head resort wonderful. The property also has a small pool if you're into swimming and it is very easy walking distance to Disneyland maybe 10 to 15 minutes Downtown Disney.
Manager Response: Dearest Guests,  We appreciate your honest feedback and greatly appreciate the kind words you have expressed. We do our best to ensure every guest receives the best service from all of our employees. We here strive to make our guests feel comfortable. We hope you choose to stay with us again on any future stays. Have a nice day.

Summary: My wife and I took a kids free week to the happiest place on earth. We needed a cheap, safe place to stay near Disneyland and found that the Discovery Inn was just that. Yelp reviews were mixed but the ones more recent were mostly good. We weren't looking for the Hilton, but we wanted some comfort. This place was great! The staff is always enthusiastic and helpful. The beds were great to pass out after a hard day at the parks, and the proximity to the parks was perfect. Recommend this place 100% to anyone looking to go on a budget.
Manager Response: Hello, thank you for participating in our feedback survey. We are pleased to hear we have fulfilled our guests standards. I will be sure to express with my staff the delightful compliments your expressed. We hope to see you again! Once again thank you for staying with us .

Summary Heading: best value hotel of our stay
Summary: We ( myself and husband and two teenagers) have recently completed a drive-a-little-too-much tour of the Californian coast. This was the best value hotel of our stay. Our two bedrooms were comfortable, well located and adequately appointment. Nothing flash, but we decided to save our money for the locations were we might spend longer in the room; a fancy Disney land hotel would have been a waste for us.  It is just the kind of place we would have stayed in with our own parents thirty years ago. Great value!!!
Manager Response: Dear valued guest, We'd like to thank you for taking the time to participate in our feedback survey. We take pride in ourselves to ensure every guest receives 100% satisfaction. It's a heartwarming feeling to know we have accomplished just that. We appreciate your honest feedback and hope you choose to stay with us again.  Thank you.

Summary: The good: This motel was conveniently located close to Disneyland, a very quick (5 minute drive to the car park), about a 20 minute walk. The room itself was clean and comfortable (although the carpet could do with a steam clean). Car parking was good, but did get very full one out of three of the days we stayed. There are a few places to eat close by if walking, and even more if driving. I'm not sure whether this is a pro or a con for this motel, but we went out for a full day, when we returned we had a brand new toilet. The entire toilet had been replaced, but noone had notified us before or after. It was only because I noticed the flush had changed from a handle to a button and of course it was much much cleaner! That meant they had contractors in our room during our stay
Manager Response: Hello, thank you for taking the time to participate in our survey we deeply apologize for the inconvenience in regards to your toilet being replaced. It shows on our records we call your room but no answer again i would like to apologize on this. I would like to apologize on the breakfast we have remove breakfast 8 months ago and some booking engine have not yet update i will look into this and thank you for letting us know about your motel thank you. We hope you can give us the opportunity to improve our weakness this stay for any future stays you have with us.

Summary: The gentleman (Jay)at check in and out was great help ...we only had problems with the microwave and they replaced it promptly. The fridge took a little longer than usual to get the drinks cold but it did work so...no other complaints. The room had plenty of space and beds were decent comfort.had tv and remote were great!and air conditioning  was perfect! So overall it was nice and decent for a good price :) name on card I received says Nitesh.
Manager Response: Hello, Thank you for taking time to complete our survey. I'd like to thank you for your kind words and I hope we will be seeing you again for any future stays.we take pride in ensuring our guests receive 100% satisfaction. I am pleased to know that we have. Have a nice day.

Summary: Quick summary...affordable, convenient to Disneyland from the Downtown Disney side, clean and super friendly. A nice family-run operation, and they will do what it takes to make your stay pleasant. Comfortable beds. Wifi worked. Would definitely return.
Manager Response: Hello, We'd like to thank you for your kind words. We appreciate our guests to the fullest and thrive on assuring each guest receives 100% satisfaction. We'd be more than honored if you do choose to stay with us for any future stays.   General Manager.

Summary: Large clean room, 15 min walk from Disneys main entrance.  Some food places near by, including cocos right beside which is awesome - cheap large meals.  Our room was really big, had good air con and a large bathroom and comfy bed.  The only reason I give it four stars is because the reception is not very helpful at all. We asked questions like how to get to LA and the receptionist had no ideas except how to get to the airport via shuttle.  The wifi is TERRIBLE. It worked once during our 4 night stay but we were here much anyway.  If you're on a budget and want to be near Disney, this is a good place to stay.
Manager Response: Hello, I would like to thank-you for taking the time to participate in our survey. We appreciate all your kind words. I would like to apologize for the WiFi connection, at the moment we are in the process of changing networks for a faster and more stable connection for all guests to be able to connect. I would like to apologize on behalf of reception who you encountered when you asked for directions. That is indeed very unacceptable, and I will be speaking to all my agents as they are suppose to be knowledgeable of attractions and destinations for all tourists. We appreciate your honest words, and hope you choose to stay with us in the future.

Summary: I booked at this Hotel because of reasonable cost and location. My daughter had a cheerleading competition at the convention center and of course, while here we had to go to Disneyland. I wanted to park my car and walk everywhere I needed to go. After I booked the room I read some reviews and became quite concerned but had a plan B should the poor reviews be accurate. Thankfully I found this hotel perfectly met my needs  in everyway. The staff was exceptional. The room was clean and pleasant. And the location couldn't have been anymore convenient. Within walking distance to every imaginable want and need. I would not hesitate to recommend to family and friends. If you want luxury and 5 star amenities go pay per night elsewhere what I paid for 3 nights . Otherwise this is the
Manager Response: Hello, Thank-you for participating in our survey. We appreciate your honest words and hope for any future stays you decide to stay with us. Have a nice day.

Summary: This was a 5 night stay and we chose it because of its convenient location to the Convention Center.  It is also convenient to Disney. We were conventioning all day and most of the evenings so all we wanted was  a clean place to sleep.  The room was very clean and the staff was friendly and responsive. When we discovered our microwave did not work it was immediately replaced. They don't advertise a continental breakfast but coffee, small muffins and whole wheat toast are available in office.  We supplemented this with food items we brought, and the microwave and fridge in the room enabled us to eat breakfast in the room.  If a larger meal is desired, it's a 4 minute walk to Denny's or a 2 minute walk to Coco's. More expensive dining is within walking distance. Rooms are in the
Manager Response: Hello, We'd like to thank-you for participating in our feedback survey. We'd like to thank-you for all your honesty. We do our best to ensure every guest receives 100% satisfaction. We are pleased to hear we have succeeded our standards during your stay. We hope you choose to stay with us in any future stays.

Summary: Acceptable for a low price.  Nothing great, but if you just need a place to sleep, It's fine. Room was sparse but clean.  Had a small refridgerator and microwave. One small desk, 2 armed chairs.   No dining table.
Manager Response: Hello, On behalf of our entire team we'd like to apologize for falling short of your satisfaction. I do apologize for your room missing the dining table.I will be sure to have housekeeping and my maintenance men double check all rooms to ensure there is a table in each room. We appreciate your honest words towards your experience. I am very pleased to hear we were able to meet significant standards. We hope you choose to stay with us in any future stays.

Summary Heading: Needs Renovation but DOES THE JOB for less than $100
Summary: On a whim me and my BF decided to take a last minute trip to DL. Found this place for under $100 p/n. BED IS COMFY! SHOWER FELT AWESOME! Very roomy. This place is extremly outdated and needs renovation but it does the job and staff is very friendly. For 1 night to just sleep you can't beat the price. About a 15 minute walk to the park. Have fun!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience on your recent stay at the Anaheim Discovery Inn & Suites. On behalf of our entire team I would like to apologize for not exceeding your expectations. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we will be using the feedback you gave us to implement improvements  in the future.  I hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you with better remodel room.  If I can provide any assistance please do not hesitate to call me directly at 714-533-4505.

Summary: We had roaches, roaches and more roaches. Complained and nothing was done, not even a apology. We even took 2 LIVE roaches to the desk clerk! Charged my card upon check in and would not refund my money when I tried to check out the first night which left me unable to go elsewhere. When I spoke to NITESH, the manager, he said it was not common however we had 2 rooms and both rooms had roaches. I told him I would be notifying BBB and he told me he would tell them I was using the 'F' word and being racist so to go ahead and call as he had a witness! I did not use one foul word nor did I say a word about his ethniticity. Please take my word...DO NOT STAY HERE!!!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Location to Disneyland is good but that is all. We had two rooms and found roaches in both. Management not willing to help in anyway. We took roaches we killed into office and all they could say was that is bad but they could not do anything about it.  recommend to anyone.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I decided to surprise my daughter with a last minute trip to Disneyland. I booked this room in route and figured...it's not what I'd usually book, but for a few hours of rest at a reasonable price, I can't go wrong. BIG MISTAKE! Unless you enjoy sleeping with BUGS. Yes, our mattress was infested with BED BUGS! We couldn't fulfill our stay and drove home.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Cancelled my confirmed reservation without telling me
Summary: I can't tell you what this hotel is like. Unfortunately, I had to cancel the trip. To my surprise, when I called (in plenty of time) with my confirmation number I was informed the reservation had already been cancelled. Guess my family and I could have slept in our car in the parking lot.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here September 21-24. Walking distance to Disneyland. We were meant to get a two room suite but because our bus got us there early and we wanted to check in all they had was a single room with two queen beds. The beds were comfy, and really big. We didn't have any problems with bugs or stains. Heaps of channels on the TV as well. If I was to go back to Disneyland, I'd definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was the most disgusting place I have ever seen! There were beer cans on the floor, stains on the carpet, crayon markings on the walls, holes in the sheets, no comforter,the fire detector was hanging on by a thread, stickers on the wall and a door leading into the neighboring room that was only closed because there was a small coffee table in front of it! The walls were also paper thin and we could hear the conversations of the people hanging around outside. All of the observations I mentioned happened within the first five minutes of arriving. When we called up to the office, the manager or whoever it was, arrived at our room and when asked about why the room was in such disarray he responded by saying, "We are currently renovating." This place doesn't need renovations, it
Manager Response: none

Summary: Just got home from vacation with family from staying at this hotel. It was the filthiest, stinkiest, ant and cockroach infested dive I have ever seen. I had ants crawling on me sitting in the middle of the bed, cockroaches crawling on the clothes in the bathroom, there was no hot water nor water pressure to take a shower, the floors were filthy, the room was filthy!!! The swimming pool water was dirty and not properly cleaned. We were stuck here for 3 days and 2 nights with no other place available to go.  The ratings on this hotel is deceiving, yes it may be cheaper, and it may be close to Disneyland, but this place should be closed down until they get rid of the bugs and filth and repair the the many problems that this place has. I would NEVER stay there again and NEVER
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Cockroach hotel is the proper name
Summary: We just got home and we stayed at this hole and was stuck there for 2 nights.This place is worse then terrible. I would rate it 100% ants, 100% cockroaches and 100% filth. This place stinks so bad I have to wash everything even what should have been clean clothes. My 7 year old granddaughter was joined in the shower by a cockroach scared her to death. Do your self a favor and stay out of this place. Just like going to skid row!!!!!! Oh and no hot water!!! Got no sleep to busy watching for ants and roaches!!!! Should I go on........
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great location without the price tag
Summary: Great spot for visiting Disneyland - it's right across the road from one of the actual Disney resorts, without having to pay the huge prices. The front desk was able to organise a ticket and ride to/from the front gate and made it all very easy. The first night I was there, the TV was out as their provider was being changed, and the lady at the desk told me after I'd checked in. It would have been nice to know ahead of time. The shower wasn't the best, but the room was clean and the bed was comfortable. The car park was also full the first night I was there, and I had to park in the driveway
Manager Response: none

Summary: We recently stayed in this hotel and found roaches on our walls and in the corners.  I will never stay at this hotel again.   The pool was not open yet and was yellow as they were still cleaning it.  Food was okay but the whole place needs to be updated.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights and found it very good.....yes some of the rooms are tired and need refreshing but the new owners are on to this already and we saw them refurb 3 rooms whilst we were there. we had two of the rooms at the back and although not refurbed they were both more then adaquate, fridge, microwave, beds comfy, plenty of hot water, clean towels. We had no problem with parking. Pool area was good and quiet. Five min walk to downtown disney and ten to the parks. Now i have to say i was very worried about staying here after reading some of the reviews and my dad can be most fussy(he likes a quality hotel) but we both agree that we would use again if we returned, after all it is somewhere to sleep after a day at disney.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Do Youself a Favor - Don't Stay Here
Summary: This is undoubtedly the absolute worst facility I have every stayed at!  The room is totally run down, ripped carpet, broken furniture, etc.  Then, when I turn on the bathroom faucet I get nasty debris floating up from the drain.  I try and overlook this since it’s just my son and I staying.  In the morning, the breakfast is a joke; a loaf of bread to make toast, mini-muffins and a small jar of orange juice.  When making toast, the smoke detector goes off and I’m told you can’t adjust the toaster past setting 2 or it sets off the alarm.  I get back to my room and find the toilet no longer flushes. After calling the front desk I’m told they can bring me a plunger to use.  What a joke.  Never, ever stay at this facility!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Okay so, I stayed for only 1 night in room #102-2 rooms down from the office so I was very happy that there was no one on top of me and by the grace of God, my neighbors on both sides were quiet!  The room itself was very nice, it was clean and it looked like it had been updated.  I have NO complaints about the cleanliness at all!  The bed was pretty hard, but for me, that is a good thing-for someone who does not like hard beds, you wouldn't have been happy.  The TV was an older tube TV, for some reason the cable was disconnected so I reconnected it and the reception wasn't perfect and it really only got about 10 channels and none of them were any children's channels.  It wasn't a problem for me because I spend most of my time online but if you watch a lot of TV or if your kids
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Incredibly Reasonable and Right Next to Disneyland
Summary: First and foremost, you can't getting any closer to Dizzland from the south.  This property was just acquired by new owners: very nice people.   They are upgrading the place and very accommodating.   We parked our car here FOR FREE on a Friday morning without checking in, NO PROBLEM.  We didn't check in until midnight, NO PROBLEM.   Compare prices.  This is a steal at the price.   Face it, if you are going to Dizzyland, all you need is a place to park the car and a place to calmly sleep.  This is it.      Clean, pleasant and QUIET!  Thank you!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Room was to be non-smoking, but even with heavy air freshener, it smelled of smoke. no hot water in tub, and shower head did not work. Toilet sounded like airplane engine when flushed (my son's comment).
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is, by far, the worst hotel I've ever stayed in. If sleeping on rock hard beds is your thing, by all means stay here. But if not, pay the extra 50 dollars and stay anywhere else. The door didn't lock. The decor is outdated. The tv was from the 90's and the remote didn't work. Good thing I was there for disney, not tv. But sleeping in that bed made my experience at Disney sub par because sleeping on that bed ruined my back. We ended up getting six extra comforters to add padding. But it didn't help. DON'T STAY HERE. THEY TAKE NO PRIDE IN THEIR BUSINESS. THE 56 DOLLARS WE PAID WAS OVER PRICED FOR THIS HOTEL.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Came here for a weekend with my husband and a friend. The hotel is what you pay for, but for the free parking and the fact that you could throw a football to the main gate of Disneyland it was worth it. Staff is very friendly, and they have a small muffin/toast breakfast we took back up to our room. If you have to complain about not having a shuttle, maybe you need to use your legs more often! Overall: great for Disney on a budget!
Manager Response: none

Summary: This place is horrible we killed 6 mosquitoes and still have a lot of bites from it. The place is filthy and the room smells so bad. The AC did not work and all the paint are chipped and dirty. Never again!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is straight up nasty. Do not stay there if you have kids. This place really needs to be renovated, the owners are nice but try to make excuses for its terrible state. If you don't mind breathing moldy air, getting the "heebie-geebies", showering in a dirty tub, walking on filthy carpets, killing gnats, and blocking the previously broken door with your luggage to feel safe---take your family somewhere else!
Manager Response: none

Summary: A bit of a walk from Disney but  there's a shuttle bus that operates frequently, it's a short journey and pretty expensive considering the distance. It's about a 20 minute walk to the Disney gates. Friendly check in and clean rooms
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel should be renovated and cleaned, it is unfair to post pictures and offer a good deal for a room that should have been cleaned, painted, updated etc. etc. etc. I booked this hotel through Expedia and let them know that I was very disappointed. I stayed in nearby hotels before for similar price, in simple but clean rooms. This hotel should be closed down and renovated quickly. The only good thing about it was its location.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Not a lot for your money!
Summary: Seemed clean and close to the convention center but the shower was cold and the facilities not updated.  Breakfast was just some store bought doughnuts and coffee ... not worth walking to the front for.  I'd spend the extra $20 a night and get something with a more responsive staff and motivated owner.
Manager Response: none

Summary: took my girlfriend to Disneyland for Valentines Day. I chose this hotel for it's price and mostly for being a 5 minutes walk to Disneyland. I liked the pictures and read reviews saying 'clean' and thought it couldn't be that bad. It was so gawd awful, we decided to get a refund and drive back home. We decided it was not worth the money to be miserable all night. The list for things that were wrong go on and on. The room smelled like bleach, outlet casings were literally broken off the walls, a leaky faucet that wouldn't stop leaking, walls and carpet was dirty, bed was unbearable, looks crummy and unsafe. I would love to post the pictures i took of the room. To top it off, Priceline wasn't very helpful at all through this ordeal. It took about 45 minutes to get a hold of someone
Manager Response: none

Summary: If your not picky just looking for a place to stay with no ammenties then this place will suit you fine. It was clean rooms are outdated looks like they are trying to upgrade them little at time. It takes about 20mins to walk to the Monorail in downtown Disney. Longer to the front entrance but not bad at all.             There is no coffee maker in the room the refrigerator did not work. You can walk to the office and get coffee there and they do offer muffins or danish until 9am.        I want to be fair so If your looking for a budget hotel then this is average to good for that so I rated it as such. Keep in mined if your looking for any amnenties or plush type rooms or beds look elsewhere.
Manager Response: none

Summary: After all these negative comments in TRIP ADVISOR I almost decided not to take this hotel. But I wanted a low cost hotel to take part in a conference, and this hotel was the only location left that was both low cost and close the convention centre. So I took the risk. I did not regret it. True, the hotel is basic, no luxury, but all I need was there and in good condition. For 58 USD per night (all included) I had a spacious room with fridge and microwave oven,  a (simple) breakfast, free internet, and all the other things you expect. What more do you want for this money?
Manager Response: none

Summary: First off this hotel was a complete waste of money. Yeah we paid $120, but still a waste. Our shower did not work, the light were all burnt out, and hanging by wires. The management was horrible, could not understand one word the guy was saying. He charged us 2 times for the room, and it was an act of Congress to get our money back. We found porn DVD's in a drawer when we did our check out walk around, very unprofessional for a "Family Friendly" hotel. What if my kids found these videos? Stay away from this hotel, do not watse your money. We also saw numerous cockroaches. Definitley will not stay here again!!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were  a little unsure but the price deal seemed pretty good!  We stayed there 5 nights and some people in our party extended their stay...  It is a walking distance to downtown Disneyland, my seven year old who does NOT like walking much, did walk back and forth from the pack everyday!   It is not a 5 star hotel BUT it is quite pleasant and the service was spectacular! Small continental breakfast was a nice touch. It was also very quiet at night....which we loved...  We got a group rate so no complaints there...the best prices around....believe me i checked as this trip was planned months in advance...  It is closer to some restaurants and other stores...  The owner i think, was pretty nice, informative....it is convenient  once you are done with the parks and want to do
Manager Response: none
